title: Weather data & microclimate :
description:
Weather, at a microclimate level. Get your hyperlocal weather forecast, with precise current conditions and hyper-local updates from your closest weather station. With weather data from over 250,000 personal weather stations and a proprietary forecast model, Weather Underground gives you the most precise weather forecast at a truly hyper-local level. Discover about current conditions, get weather data from our Nexrad network, customizable weather alerts from NOAA and much more, thanks to our Nexrad hurricane and storm tracker and Doppler radar technology. You‚Äôll always be prepared.

5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD WEATHER UNDERGROUND

- Weather alerts and storm radar: get severe weather alerts for your position and trust our hurricane tracker and storm radar for severe weather news - you'll always be prepared for your microclimate, whether it's extreme rain or a surprise drought.
- Hyperlocal weather conditions: track current conditions from your local weather station, as well as hourly/daily forecasts up to 10 days in the future, which include chance of rain and precise weather news.
- Most detailed local weather data: get updates with the best weather data including weather maps, local Doppler radar imagery, temperature updates, ‚ÄúFeels Like,‚Äù wind speed, wind directions, today‚Äôs rain accumulation, humidity, and pressure.
- Other geographical data: discover more information and get news about your local weather and microclimate with our air quality index, UV index, sunrise & sunset times at your closest personal weather station.
- Customized experience: set your app with light & dark modes and various map types and units.

DISCOVER THE UNIQUE FEATURES OF WEATHER UNDERGROUND

Interactive weather maps with Nexrad radar technology & severe weather alerts:

- The most interactive weather maps on mobile allow you to select from different precise weather overlays, personal weather stations, Nexrad radar, NOAA and satellite imagery, heat and temperature maps, and rain accumulation.
- Sophisticated weather visualizations with hi-res satellite & cloud cover imagery from GOES-16, powered by data from NOAA.
- Keep an eye out for extreme weather with our hurricane tracker and storm radar and always be prepared with severe weather alerts.

Hyper-local forecasts driven by accurate weather data:

- Over 250,000 PWSs report the most accurate local weather conditions. Visualize precise weather radar imagery for your very own microclimate.
- Made to fill in the gaps between the airport weather stations that other weather services rely upon to generate forecasts - meaning our data is generated from actual data points in your neighborhood. So you get real time rain accumulation, a precise pollen forecast and temperature info reflecting your local current conditions.

Subscribe to Premium!

- Upgrade and remove all ads from your weather app by purchasing an annual subscription.
- Access Smart Forecasts: set your ideal weather conditions for your outdoor activities and we‚Äôll tell you when to go.
- View Extended Hourly Forecasts up to 15 days in the future.

You can cancel your Weather Underground subscription anytime through your Google Play account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

-----

Privacy & Feedback
- Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://www.wunderground.com/company/privacy-policy
- Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: https://www.wunderground.com/company/legal‚Ä®
- If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at support@wunderground.com.

summary: Weather radar, hyperlocal tracker and weather maps: follow your weather station

scraped_reviews.content: Everything I care about in a weather app, and nothing I don't. The paltry couple of dollars it takes to go ad free are nothing, compared to the amount of information it brings in just a few taps. And the only times I've ever had problems with this app are on old or slow phones. Edit: 2 years later, no changes whatsoever. Still excellent. None of the usual en****tification. Love this app.

Exceptional. I've been with Weather Underground since nearly the beginning when they were Wonderground Weather, I believe. It's very helpful to choose a weather station myself. I live on Lake Huron so a station only 1/4 mile inland can change the report. They used to have a gallery of weather photos, with one chosen as pic-of-the-day. Not sure if they still do that somewhere, but I miss it.

The presentation is great, but I rely on radar to see real term weather. The radar lies because you don't know when it's not updated. I finally understood this when I was caught on a hike in the woods and a severe thunderstorm hit. The radar showed it clear. As I ran home, it finally updated. Since then I ensure the times are shown. Always shut down and restart if you care also. The App should clear each time and have black radar if not reloaded!!

I've used lots of weather apps and this one is hands down my favorite. It has a lot of information but my favorite thing is that the forecast is displayed in a graph which makes it so easy to read at a glance. Some time ago, the desktop browser version switched the hourly mode so it doesn't display in graph form anymore. This is a serious detraction - not of the phone app but of its related desktop website. I still love the phone app and use it daily for planning.

To disable the sounds every time the temperature in the status bar is updated, go to the notification settings and click on "Today's Weather". Then, switch it to "Silent". Works good. Glad to see it was changed to allow the temperature on the status bar! New UI's UX is good. Straightforward and loads fast. Haven't tested radar / storm tracking but I'm in Texas so I'll definitely test it sometime in April ü´£

Good user interface showing ten days' forecasts in graph form. Detailed graphs for wind speed, direction, temperature, humidity and precipitation are available as well. An occasional hang, but usually quite stable and accurate. Here in the Philippines, the radar imagery can be trusted. It's quite accurate. One year update -- Here on the Philippines, it is one of the few apps to give accurate radar imagery. Always reliable.

So far I like the app very much. it works well and provides a lot of weather information. It seems accurate. If I have any criticism it would be the widget is all but useless. It should show two or three days of forecast. A relevant icon with high and low temp would be fine. A quick glance and I would know the forecast. If I want more detail, tap on it and open the app.

11/06/25 been using for 5 years. this is still the best one I've tried, especially for checking real time nearby weather stations that are just up the street from my house or nearby to family and friends. Radar with storm and tornado tracking is helpful. Good app for weather nerds. I like the Air quality pages. the Day and night clock that shows hours of light and dark each day, and the times for first light, sunrise, etc. and the Moon phase graphic too.

Seems to be the most accurate of weather apps I have found. I wish the subscription options were a bit cheaper but I will pay the current price for now, at least. Update: Ease of use gets 1/5, overall rating drops to 2/5 from 4/5. Stop losing my paid subscription. My payment with Google is good for a long time...so why does your app forget that I am a premium subscriber about once a week or so? Clears my smart forecasts and everything. Waste of subscription money if this keeps happening.

Seems to be fairly accurate. I like the fact that you can have radar and pressure fronts on the same map and be able to expand or contract the map to see the whole globe if you want or zoom into your own neighborhood! update...11/11/25 no longer shows location on weather map (radar). Used to have a blue dot at your location.

I've been using WU for quite a while now. I used to have several wx apps on my phone but WU is the only one now since I've read more about how weather changes develop. Its accuracy is just superior to others in my region. And it has several pieces of info that are very important to me and well-presented. I particularly want ambient temperature, dew point, direction of air pressure, hourly weather forecasts for the next 24 hrs, wind direction & radar, and up-to-date warnings from the NWS.

It was my go to source for weather because of the level of detail of the maps and radar. They seem to have removed the barometric pressure relief lines that were on the surface front overlay which is annoying. I'd use those to get a better sense of how the weather was going to move. Now I'm missing an entire data set. I will probably use this app less because of it. The rest of the features are good, but now the app is about the same as the rest.

very accurate. Can depend on the 10 day forecast for planning ahead. Format is eady to use and it has sunrise/sunset times in a pictorial format also showing amount of daylight and nightime. Ads are in a fixed bar so no annoying pop-up s. Been using it for several years now and don't see a need to look for something better.

The maps and radar allow me to navigate around storms while long distance touring on the motorcycle. Absolutely the best. I have complete numerous saddlesore 1000's, honestly some of them might have been missed if I wasn't able to see a storm was ending soon. I was able to see when a route change would allow me to skirt around a storm. Love it.

I really like the data displayed graphically. It's easier to see the relationship between different parameters. For me, it's better than The Weather Channel app (also owned by IBM). The daily & weekly trends are easy to see see at a glance. Update 9/23/25. No longer owned by IBM, but the app is still around. I like it for the same reasons above. I would like to see the % likely rain graph just be a line & the blue fill reflect the predicted inches of rain - if that info is available!

The bad first, I tend not to use it as much as some other weather apps because it's 50% ads far too many! now the good it is in my opinion far more accurate because they have more weather stations supported by non-biased users. The drawback to that is that these weather stations are also tied into the local radar, or so it seems, and because of that is very jittery and unreliable, sometimes the radar is very time sequenced, other times it's not.

The desktop version allows me to pick the weather station .2 miles away with a couple of clicks. The app chooses for me. Idk which station it picks but I assume it's the airport which is almost 6 miles away. This morning the temp difference was 8¬∞ lower there. I can use ANY weather app to find the temp at the airport. If there is a way to pick a station on the app the instructions are not easily found. The location setting is on.

What a pain to get up and running. Also the elevation is wrong and i dont know how to change it. Its says just under 300 feet when it should be closer to 1000 feet. edit....after using this app now for a while now I am taking 2 stars away because it will not stay connected. to my weather station for any length of time and reconnecting is a pain. This app is next to worthless for what I want it for.

I like a lot of the data included in the forecasts, especially the hour by hour breakdown of weather - rain accumulation, windspeed, etc. but the app takes entirely too long to load. every. time. it. is. opened. I am a paying subscriber, but this problem is enough to make me reconsider renewal next year. this has been an issue since IBM bought it out.

I wish I had read more of the recent reviews before I purchased the annual subscription. I used to love this service but hadn't used it in a few years. The app itself is terribly cluttered and difficult to navigate (on Android), and the widget never updates automatically. A widget with outdated information is useless, and the lack of severe weather alerts in the app makes it far less useful since I have to have a separate app for emergency alerts. I want my money back and won't be renewing.

I have tried lots of other weather apps and this is the most accurate one for my area. We are in kind of a little micro climate so it can be a bit tricky and it seems to keep up quite nicely. I paid to have the extra days available to me because of my business and I wish I could pay for more days! they're usually right on with their forecast but they are fluid with the changes as it happens, more so than even the weatherman on the local news station. I don't use any other weather data source!

I switched from the weather channel app over to this one, after they updated their privacy policy, allowing them to sell our information to third parties. Plus, they were annoying with the ads and making it to where you could pay for a better version of it; but this is a review of this app not the weather channel. So far in utilizing this app to monitor weather conditions, it has worked very well! There have been no ads, it loads fast and runs smooth, plus the temperature display looks cool.

I really like this app. it's add supported, but the ads are not intrusive, unlike other apps. I like how it breaks down your precipitation chances throughout the day, as well as overall daytime versus nighttime chances. all told, I've probably used a dozen other weather apps, and the user experience with this one is by far the best

Doesn't offer severe weather alerts. Had a Flash Flood Warning tonight. The app never gave a notification. Why am I paying for a subscription? ONGOING: I wish there was a more readily accessible C¬∞/F¬∞ button or an option to display both. Not everyone speaks both. The app used to show the last few days of historical data. I'd like to see that come back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The subscription is a yearly subscription.

scraped_reviews.content: 6-26-22 Problems seem to be worked out. Always was the most accurate and comprehensive weather service available. Then came the last major app update. It is totally buggy now. Often the hourly forecast doesn't work. Sometimes it helps to shut the app down completely, sometimes you need to restart the phone other times there's no work around. I miss the old Intellicast service, app and format. This is definitely not the same, especially since IBM put their name on it.

This app is a must for weather lovers, the UI is pretty easy to use but a bit finicky when you first install, especially with the Active Notification setting. I don't see that many ads and they don't pop up every time you open the app like my old weather app. overall it is great and I would recommend it for people who love to watch or track weather

Like that I can clearly see temp and rain trends in a single view. Also like visual that gives not only sunrise and sunset but also first and last light The widget is just bad. I have another app installed for that. Having used this for quite a while, I can say that I use this daily to make plans for outdoor activities like biking

like this app, that I can just tap my lock screen & see the info, low temp, high temp, precipitation, clear, cloudy, warnings,.....but the current temperature, it's, well, um, der, oh, there it is, that tiny dot that I have to squint to read, just to the left of the day/night icon. really? you couldn't make it any smaller so I'd need a magnifier to see it? geez, make it at least as big as the day/night icon...which is a given, piece of info.

The radar on this app is disappointing. It is extremely slow in loading and usually lags by 10 minutes or more when displayed. The ability to check real-time radar can be vital during major storms. You won't find it here edit: App continues to be unusable with new moto android over T-Mobile. Loads slowly if at all. Expanded radar never loads. I like the layout. Wish it worked.

A personal weather station was a birthday gift a few years ago. Love it. I always know how much rain fell on my garden. I also love checking on weather in the home towns of family, friends, and travel destinations. Actual conditions in my front yard are often quite different from what is being reported on a standard weather app. WU has a station that's much better. Unfortunately, it doesn't remain my preferred or default location on the app.

Having been a diehard user for over a decade, I'm finally removing it from my go-to apps. Before the IBM acquisition, it would load quickly (maybe unrelated), but now it takes upwards of 10-15s to load. The hyperlocal data used to be good, but now I get average data that is no better than the Samsung weather app. Finally, the radar was one of the best features, but now it struggles to load consistently. New Solution: Samsung Weather (general) and WeatherWise (radar).

it freezes up on occasion, and the radar only shows PAST progression. it used to show a bit of a predicted future, half an hour or so, but it was useful. the subscription is pretty steep, and you only get one widget choice i can find. A dozen apps are available,not much makes this stand out. Google is as good.

The weather seems accurate which is the most important thing. However, the layout of the information is bad. I cant find what I'm looking for and its just a pile of mass amounts of data. Great if that's what you are looking for but I want something a bit simpler and easier to read, get today's forcast and temp and move on.

lately the app has been a little more off. For instance, today it says it is to be cooler than yesterday but it then has a heat advisory with heat index as bad as yesterday. Seems like a contradiction there. Adding to this post: Again, the app is way off! Saying it is another heat advisory but we are having storms and the temperatures have dropped a lot! Cool now. Seems the app is not updating as it should be. Sadly, I may end up trying another app.

I can travel around the States and I can get the weather as I go. can't be beat. I have purchased my own weather station and linked it to Weather Underground. Now I can go anywhere and see and compare the weather where I am to the weather at home. This app is probably the best and most useful one to have on your phone. The radar part is great and provides information of what is going on everywhere. Best app ever. Well here it is almost a year later. July 19 2025 and the Weather App is still #1.

Highly reliable.use it everyday... Used to be what I used to say. They sold out to IBM and now it's is unreliable and crashes frequently.. update they seem to fix the bugs in the system, as reliable as it used to be but the layout isn't quite as convenient to be able to look it rain potential in the time of day at the same time but overall I still find it to be the most reliable weather app because I travel on a bike and I need to know what's up with the weather and I get updates very frequently

The expected data is presented. Over the past years, the hourly data has been surprisingly accurate in the Puget Sound area, the rainfall predictions have been amazingly accurate - that's impressive when a five mile wide squall is either gonna drop a third of an inch or nothing if it misses you. I like seeing the other local weather stations and their data. I'd like to see the 8 second (or so) delay on startup go away (splash screen). I hope the govt doesn't defund NWS weather data.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reaching out.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  While we are working to bring back precip amounts on the graph, until then you can find them here: touch the precip icon next to the current temperature.  This will open the 6 hr forecast page.  You can also find notable precip amounts in the 10 day summary.

scraped_reviews.content: Expensive. To get all of the features, a yearly rental costs $20. It claims to be the most accurate but it isn't--I have 2 other apps that are consistently more accurate and offer a lifetime, 1 time payment that is less than $10. I like the way the information is presented, but it just isn't worth it to me. I will say that battery consumption-wise this is excellent and one of the best.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback. ¬†Sorry to hear our app isn't meeting your expectations. ¬†We‚Äôre currently working on a number of fixes and enhancements. ¬†We hope you will check it out again soon.  Thanks again for your review.

Regards,
WU Product Team

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a huge fan of WU, I even have a home weather station that supplies data to them, but the mobile app frustrates me due to so much data detail being absent. For instance, when viewing the multi-day graphs, the dew point and barmetric pressure are absent. As a result, I'm sticking to the web app.

Good interface but inaccurate and unreliable The graphical interface is the best I've seen to quickly understand what will be coming and roughly when. Accuracy is terrible. Haven't compared to others, but it's poor. I have both the Android and iOS versions of this app and the Android one routinely fails (shows the formatted screen w/ no data) for several days every few months (iOS version NEVER crashes). Very disappointing for Android users.

I used to think this app was pretty reliable, but lately it has become less so. Today, for example, the rain predictions have shifted times and quantities multiple times and by large amounts from a steady 2:00 start thru 9:00, to 1:00-10:00, back to intermittently between 2:00 and 7:00 - and quantities from 0.3" to 1.01" and back to 0.1". In the end, we got nary a drop. The local guy on TV can do that. Heck, even I can throw out random numbers if that's all it takes!

Super accurate. Data taken from private weather stations means that the forecasts from real local data and not guessed from far away weather stations. My weather data is only a block away. Brilliant system. All other services do not do this and their forecasts show it. I have been a fan since it started.

Marginally useful, can't rely on it to show personal weather station data because, you know, Weather Underground. How the mighty have fallen. Definitely not worth paying for. The worst part is there are better third-party apps which can read personal weather data that are not associated with Weather Underground.

Accuracy is usually good - better than other apps. Functionality has deteriorated. The sidebar list of locations (favorites & recent) is blank since the July '25 update. Other features have disappeared over the years (I've used this app 5+ years) such as the ability to reorder elements on the screen. Finding PWS's near you is hit or miss - many have disappeared from the map, but can be found if you know the call letters. Keep old phone 'til you setup app on new phone! [Android, non-paid version]

I use it all the the time. Enjoy the local weather feature. One recent problem that has cropped up is the temperature gradient is now too narrow, showing temperatures up to 200 degrees. Not necessary and makes it very difficult to read. Otherwise the rating would be 5. Update: the problem has been rectified üòä

Updated review. Had this app for years and liked it, but it didn't have real-time weather alerts so moved back to another one that had that feature. After running into bug issues with that one, came back to see if this would work - downloaded and installed it but when I try to open it doesn't open.. at all. It just crashes immediately so I uninstalled. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note10.

I really like the new update. The accuracy is close. The maps and layers work well. But still is missing Widgets and status bar notification's. Also adjustment in the settings for removal of cards like smart forecasts. I don't use them. Hope the missing additions are coming soon after paying for subscription. Update, I switched because now they took my subscription and turned it into a monthly one, very disappointed.

Only 1 widget. Also, when you save a setting, the app prompts you to give permissions, which is fine except when you've already granted the permission and are trying to Save. The app sends you on the permissions loop rather than saving your settings! WU used to be awesome but something changed and it now isn't--even trying to add local weather stations should be simple and available in any decent local weather app. 3 stars- not horrible, just meh.

Ads ads and more ads. it's ridiculous to scroll and scroll to see weather! The 10? day forecast is difficult to understand? numbers are so close together, hard to differentiate between days , highs, lows. I'm a senior and vision not as good as it once was. So MUCH, such variety of information. Maybe it's good that it's available. The other special interests be a menu to choose.

As accurate as any can be. Truth is, nobody ever really knows even a few hours out. lolz Easy access to what they pretend to know, though. Good radar. No future cast radar, but past timeline. Getting rid of the ads isn't too much of a cost, and it's a good idea if you don't like annoyances and slow down. They used to have good widgets, including the radar, but now there's just the one generic widget that's like your common default app. That's the reason for the missing star on the rating.

title: Expedia: Hotels, Flights, Cars
description:
TRAVEL PLANNING MADE EASY IN ONE APP
Plan, collaborate, book and manage your whole trip, from flights, vacation packages, hotels, car rentals, activities, and more. Find inspiration for your next destination, expert tips and personalized recommendations. Book your flight, hotel and more together to save.*

REWARDS ON ANY WAY YOU TRAVEL
One Key‚Ñ¢ members can use and earn rewards** on eligible bookings, including select hotels, vacation rentals, car rentals, activities, and flights. Plus, earn airline miles AND One Key rewards on flights. Move up the tiers quickly to enjoy free room upgrades at select VIP Access properties and more. Signing up for One Key is free and easy! Just download the Expedia app and log in.

MEMBERS SAVE INSTANTLY
One Key members get instant travel discounts on select flights, hotels, car rentals, activities and more. Save 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide with Member Prices and up to 30% when adding a select hotel to your flight.

BOOK FLIGHTS WITH CONFIDENCE
Not sure if you‚Äôre getting our best travel deal? Get an automatic refund when flight prices drop after you‚Äôve booked.*** Members can also track flights and get alerts when prices rise or drop for free.

COLLABORATE AND PLAN WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY
From keeping your travel details organized to easily deciding on the best options with your group, planning a trip is easy on the Expedia app. Save and compare stays, activities and more, invite others to collaborate by voting and commenting on their favorites and when your itinerary is settled, view and manage your bookings ‚Äì all in one place.

DISCOVER TRIPS THAT FIT YOUR NEEDS
- Search flights, hotels, vacation packages, rental cars, attractions, and more
- Book your flight and hotel together for savings
- Choose from over 1,000,000 hotels worldwide, including boutique and luxury hotels, airport hotels, cheap hotels, hostels, BnB, vacation rentals, and resorts
- Read verified reviews you can trust
- Learn more about top destinations with expert-curated tips like best times to go, neighborhoods to stay in and things to do
- Filter for hotels with pools, hot tubs, free airport shuttles, free WiFi, onsite parking, ocean views, kitchens, air conditioning, gyms, and more
- Find family- and pet- friendly vacations
- Sort your search by price, free cancellation or no change fees, departure and arrival time, and more
 
MANAGE YOUR WHOLE TRIP, ALL IN ONE PLACE
- Free cancellation on most hotels****
- All your reservations in one place: view upcoming trip details, hotel information, and maps for directions
- Trip alerts: for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times, and more
- Share travel itineraries
 
Download the Expedia com app now and join for free to enjoy One Key member benefits.

*Savings based on package bookings as compared to the price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary and not available on all packages.
**One Key rewards not redeemable for cash and can only be used on Expedia, Hotels.com and Vrbo. For vacation rentals, US properties only. Excludes taxes and fees.
*** Available for a fee on select flights. Refund will be the difference if the price of your flight on Expedia drops. Gold or Platinum members get Price Drop Protection at no extra cost on select flights. Terms apply.
**** Some hotels require you to cancel more than 24 hours before check-in.
See site for details.

We predict flight deals based on historical data collected from searches made on or by Expedia. These predictions use insights and specifically look at search criteria such as dates, fare class, origin and destination. When comparing predictions for this flight and similar flights, we found that these fares were lower than we would expect. Any changes made to the search criteria may result in price differences and different price predictions.

The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

From keeping your travel details organized to easily deciding on the best options with your group, planning a trip is easy on the Expedia app. Save and compare stays, activities and more, invite others to collaborate by voting and commenting on their favorites and when your itinerary is settled, view and manage your bookings ‚Äì all in one place.

DISCOVER TRIPS THAT FIT YOUR NEEDS
- Search flights, hotels, vacation packages, rental cars, attractions, and more

- Choose from over 1,000,000 hotels worldwide, including boutique and luxury hotels, airport hotels, cheap hotels, hostels, BnB, vacation rentals, and resorts

MANAGE YOUR WHOLE TRIP, ALL IN ONE PLACE
- Free cancellation on most hotels****
- All your reservations in one place: view upcoming trip details, hotel information, and maps for directions
- Trip alerts: for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times, and more
- Share travel itineraries

**One Key rewards not redeemable for cash and can only be used on Expedia, Hotels.com and Vrbo. For vacation rentals, US properties only. Excludes taxes and fees.

Any changes made to the search criteria may result in price differences and different price predictions.

In addition, your book trips are saved and available at any time to review, or if needed, you can share them with others. Also, all of your travelers' information is saved, so it's a breeze to book future flights. Once you are ready to pay, the process is secured and doesn‚Äôt take any time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's great to hear that you find the app easy to use and reliable for the best prices. We appreciate your feedback on features like saved trips and secure payments. Your experience means a lot to us and motivates our team to keep improving. Thank you for sharing!

scraped_reviews.content: Expedia is horrible and I suggest you book a trip or car rental with someone else. They are a third party, which does not have access to the hotels nor the car rental companies. I was so disappointed with the hotel, mold on the shower floors, poor wifi the entire time, room service was horrible. Tried booking a car rental and what Expedia said versus what the car rental company actually had in stock was wrong! I made unnecessary trips to 2 different car rental places only to be turned away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôve had such a frustrating experience. Unfortunately, we need additional details to be able to investigate this further ‚Äì please reach out to our direct support channels at Expedia.com/service with your feedback, so we can investigate and work to improve or address this issue. Thank you for letting us know.

scraped_reviews.content: Normally have loved Expedia. Until I needed a refund. The virtual agent goes in circles, having me select my booking and then asking if my trip was great. It was not. The hotel sent a message to contact the booking agent for a refund. And the chat virtual agent goes in circles. Extremely frustrating. I will book my rooms with someone else from now on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you had this experience with the Virtual Agent and will investigate this issue. If you need help in the meantime, please reach out at Expedia.com/service. After you select ‚ÄúChat now‚Äù, you can ask to connect with one of our experienced agents.

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty good with customer service most of the time. I often find the best prices on their site. Only thing is there ONE cash even though you may have quite a bit of it you can't use it for a flight unless it's covers the whole flight. I think this is ridiculous. You can use any amount off a hotel or a car rental, mostly I book flights.The car rentals can't compare to Costco. The car was $60 more for a 2-week trip in Florida. they are more competitive with that than in the past.

New to Expedia but have had excellent results to date in using it. I used another booking/reservation service for many years until it failed to uncover the disputed record and protect my financial interests after being double-billed for a hotel stay in Georgia. DIscover, my credit card company, comnendably did the investigative work that Priceline failed to perform.

the app automatically adjusts your dates. this has happened twice when the hotel I wanted was full on the same day. They picked an alternate date and didn't tell you they changed it. so when you book a non-refundable room on the day, they pick for you. they don't want to give your money back. I have a chain of emails of them lying and saying they talked to the hotel. they lie and steal your money. If you call the hotel, they will help you and discourage you from using Expedia.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we‚Äôre sorry about this difficult issue and want to help. We aren‚Äôt able to direct message on this platform but would like to look into this. Can you reach out to us at our support channels at Expedia.com/service, with your itinerary details, so we can investigate? We‚Äôre here for you and want to improve your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: it's been a while since I used Expedia - now I know why. how are this still in business with an appalling experience app like this. won't email. won't share trips. won't put trips in calendar. the integration with Kayak is the only thing worse where you cant even see what you've booked. avoid like the plague and. ook direct with hotels where possible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for letting us know, and sorry you experienced this. We‚Äôre looking into this issue and appreciate your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Lesson learned. Do not book flight via expedia. Book your flight directly with the airline Had a flight cancelled due to medical condition. Expedia bounced me to Qantas to handle the cancellation, and Qantas bounced me back to expedia to do it since they are the travel agency. I had contacted expedia several times and eventually they agreed to submit the request on my behalf and requested a medical certificate. I attached the medical certificate in the email and never hear
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we‚Äôre sorry about this difficult issue and want to help. We aren‚Äôt able to direct message on this platform but would like to look into this. Can you reach out to us at our support channels at Expedia.com/service, with your itinerary details, so we can investigate? We‚Äôre here for you and want to improve your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Booking a Car is just wrong! I got a car rental with the hotel stay package, but the pickup is at another airport, 40 mins awy from the hotel when I landed at a airport 15 mins awy from the hotel. I had to cancel it since I can't pick it up and since I'm canceling it last minute to actually get a car rental at the airport I landed on. They charge you the canceling fee I feel so defeated spending more than I should. This is the second time I booked a car with Expedia and had issues. Never again!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for letting us know. We‚Äôre sorry you experienced this frustrating issue. We would like to investigate but aren‚Äôt able to direct message on the app store. Can you reach out to our direct support channels at Expedia.com/service, so we can investigate for you?

scraped_reviews.content: I've not heard back from Expedia or the hotel I booked. I received a covid diagnosis and canceled my booking, but I'm still waiting for confirmation on whether I'll be charged. As an active traveler, I do not recommend their site as this is most frustrating, and there are better, more responsive, option out there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre so sorry you‚Äôve had this frustrating experience. We would like to understand more and see if there‚Äôs anything we can do, but unfortunately, we can‚Äôt direct message on this platform. Can you reach out to our direct support channels at Expedia.com/service, so we can investigate for you?

scraped_reviews.content: Pay extra for the cancellation guarantee as my work schedule can change at a moments notice, had to check out a day earlier, rep from Expedia told me they spoke to the hotel and one night would be credited back after check out. now fighting with them and the hotel. Use someone else. I have had nothing but problems with Expedia.

title: Storytel - Audiobooks & Books
description: Welcome to a wide world of wonderful audiobooks, ebooks, and things that aren‚Äôt books but are still pretty great. Storytel is home to beloved stories, in-depth podcasts, and exclusive Storytel Originals. Whether you listen or read, you‚Äôll find the right story for any moment. ‚Ä¢ Explore a massive library of stories in English and other languages ‚Ä¢ Jump freely from story to story until you find one you love ‚Ä¢ Build your bookshelf and get personalized recommendations ‚Ä¢ Find what fits your mood, like crime, feel-good, or self-development ‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite authors and series ‚Ä¢ Browse and share reviews and reactions ‚Ä¢ Try out that book your friend keeps talking about ‚Ä¢ Discover what‚Äôs trending in the culture LISTEN AND READ YOUR WAY ‚Ä¢ Listen to audio stories on your mobile, tablet, Chromecast, and Wear OS watch, as well as in your car (Android Auto, Android Automotive) ‚Ä¢ Stream stories or download them for later ‚Ä¢ Switch between listening and reading anywhere in a book ‚Ä¢ Listen at your own pace: regular, sped up, or slowed down ‚Ä¢ Set bookmarks and attach your thoughts as notes ‚Ä¢ Drift off to dreamland with the sleep timer ‚Ä¢ Spare those pretty eyes with Dark Mode ‚Ä¢ See your stats and set a Listening Goal KIDS MODE INCLUDED ‚Ä¢ Let your kid find adventure in a space with just children‚Äôs stories ‚Ä¢ Show or hide children‚Äôs books in your bookshelf ‚Ä¢ Set your own pin code for parental control HOW IT WORKS Storytel is available in 25+ countries, including both local and international story treasures in different languages. A subscription gives you access to our ever-growing library of audiobooks, ebooks, and other stories. When a free trial is offered, we will ask you to add a payment method when starting the trial. But don't worry ‚Äì if you cancel before the last day of the trial you won't be charged. The content, languages and subscriptions available may vary by region. Some titles and offers shown above may not be available in your country or selected subscription plan. Terms and conditions: https://www.storytel.com/documents/terms-and-conditions Privacy policy: https://www.storytel.com/documents/privacy-policy Questions? Feedback? Speak to a real person! Reach us at support@storytel.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a wide world of wonderful audiobooks, ebooks, and things that aren‚Äôt books but are still pretty great.

Storytel is home to beloved stories, in-depth podcasts, and exclusive Storytel Originals.

Whether you listen or read, you‚Äôll find the right story for any moment.

‚Ä¢ Explore a massive library of stories in English and other languages
‚Ä¢ Jump freely from story to story until you find one you love
‚Ä¢ Build your bookshelf and get personalized recommendations
‚Ä¢ Find what fits your mood, like crime, feel-good, or self-development
‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite authors and series
‚Ä¢ Browse and share reviews and reactions
‚Ä¢ Try out that book your friend keeps talking about
‚Ä¢ Discover what‚Äôs trending in the culture

LISTEN AND READ YOUR WAY

‚Ä¢ Listen to audio stories on your mobile, tablet, Chromecast, and Wear OS watch, as well as in your car (Android Auto, Android Automotive)
‚Ä¢ Stream stories or download them for later
‚Ä¢ Switch between listening and reading anywhere in a book
‚Ä¢ Listen at your own pace: regular, sped up, or slowed down
‚Ä¢ Set bookmarks and attach your thoughts as notes
‚Ä¢ Drift off to dreamland with the sleep timer
‚Ä¢ Spare those pretty eyes with Dark Mode
‚Ä¢ See your stats and set a Listening Goal

KIDS MODE INCLUDED

‚Ä¢ Let your kid find adventure in a space with just children‚Äôs stories
‚Ä¢ Show or hide children‚Äôs books in your bookshelf
‚Ä¢ Set your own pin code for parental control

HOW IT WORKS

Storytel is available in 25+ countries, including both local and international story treasures in different languages. A subscription gives you access to our ever-growing library of audiobooks, ebooks, and other stories.

When a free trial is offered, we will ask you to add a payment method when starting the trial. But don't worry ‚Äì if you cancel before the last day of the trial you won't be charged.

The content, languages and subscriptions available may vary by region. Some titles and offers shown above may not be available in your country or selected subscription plan.

Terms and conditions: https://www.storytel.com/documents/terms-and-conditions

Privacy policy: https://www.storytel.com/documents/privacy-policy

Questions? Feedback? Speak to a real person! Reach us at support@storytel.com
summary: Big name books and exclusive stories you'll love to listen to.

scraped_reviews.content: It is much better than the other services that I tried like scribed and Audible. With 10 dollar subscription, I can read as much books as humanely possible. However, many books that I wanted to read aren't available in my region. It's annoying to see them being suggested to me. If a book isn't available in my region, it's better not to show it to me at all. Other than that, it's a very good app and I see myself subscriping again soon, once I get out of my reading slump.

I'm really happy with the app, and think that subscription is a good investment. I'd only add a table of contents so listeners could find chapters and concepts easily. Other features could be customize the lapses of time a listener could go back or forward on the book, as of now, you can only do this on 15 seconds jumps. Maybe in the future the possibility to have transcripts in the audio books or the option to do searches by words inside a book. Apart from that, I really recommend it.

I can't choose a country of a language that I speak(English) as it's not even one of the options. I was just looking for an app that would work with my watch and big yikes. I can't try out the app to decide if I'm willing to pay for it because once I picked a country, everything switched to the respective language and was unusable. -10/10 And no, I'm not emailing you about it.

Awesome but so expensive. As a audiobookk addict, I love spending time on this app just finding new interesting titles, listening to all sorts of stuff and actually feeling like I'm learning/reading just as much as my friends despite the fact that I'm "only" listening since I've never been able to find the calm within to sit down quietly with a good book for very long. But the expense? It hurts every month.

I've just started using the app for a few days now and can't say 20‚Ç¨ is too expensive for what's offered. I can tell there are many titles waiting to be released to the app which is a good sign as there are a few popular ones I would love to listen to. I do however have one complaint: There is no report function. I came across a very obviously artificially narrated audiobook yesterday and had no way of reporting it. I really hope this function gets added soon.

Awful. Thankfully I get this app through benefits of my job, as I would NEVER consider paying a direct membership to Storytel. Half of the books are 'location blocked' , including MAJORITY of the top reads & classics. and on the rare occasion you find a book, it has a suspicious hour count (way shorter than expected) I haven't found a suitable book to get into yet but i highly suspect these low hour count ones turn out to be a 'sample' or something... it could have potential but severely lacks

Decent app, but with some obvious flaws. Most annoying is that it keeps forgetting where I left off, forcing me to the next time spend time and effort trying to find my starting point of the audio book. Also cumbersome to change listening book. When my wife has used the service from a different device, my device also for mysterious reason changes to the same audio book. Would never pay full price for such poor functionality.

I gave 5 stars some time ago and still like the app overall, but it's really frustrating that search doesn't work at all! At least for titles in Bulgarian, it doesn't find the books, and if you don't save them in your bookshelf , they are lost forever :/ .

the worst app in he worldÿå 1) there's no Arabic language in the app, even though they do marketing and sales for Arab users. 2) there are lots of bug with contact us, clicking on the button sending users to the page itself, and after filling the form for contacting clicking on send button the page said access denied, also, it's written button down, what does that even mean?!?!?! 3)another catastrophy I can't find books after login, probably cu the lang other than Arabic, the page in another

i absolutely love this app but need some more features 1. add tracking which date how much of which book listened 2. notes taken should be named as either time stamp or chapter name 3. all books are 1 long audio without any chapter to select once you misclick it's a hassle to find the point. and chapter wise audio that make it more efficient. then this will be a 5 star app.
Great service for audio books. This service specially includes books in Bulgarian which is great. The UI is user friendly and simple to use.
The app suddenly stopped working. I can't access my books and the subscription has 17 days to end. kindly do something about it, Asap.

this app is really good it has a vast collection of books in English and Arabic and the price is really great however, I don't like the fact that I paid the yearly subscription and it says it's a limited whenever it said a limited I thought that it will be a limited but there are many great books that I wish to read and it says that the audio format is not available in my region

All over ok app. But, audio output is way to low. I can barely get enough volume to listen. On headsets and in my car i can't get the volume up to actually listen. I have no trouble with any other audio apps.
I can't find an option of English books and audiobooks on my tablet samsung s9 fe plus. Apart from english there are many languages.

1. It is showing 50% off for first 6 months on regional language membership, means 74.5rs instead of 149rs. however at the time of payment it is asking for full amount 149rs. 2. upi payment requests are not received in the upi apps.
Good variety of audiobooks and ebooks in different languages. There are some glitches from time to time which should not be there for the paid price. But in general, a nice app.
Brilliant app, so many books on here and way better price than other apps doing the same thing. No limits to how much you listen either which is perfect.
Sometimes the app keeps buffering even though i have already downloaded the book. I don't know what causes the app to work one day and then to be unusable on the next under the same conditions

A very good medium for those who love hearing stories while on the move or at home. The modulations of story telling are very good. The varying speed option to listen helps to fast track unwanted pages.
nearly every book now on the front page says audio format not available in your region. and there's no way to filter available books. this app is useless, going back to audible
The payment options in the app are very limited. The only available method in Egypt is credit card, but not everyone has one. More convenient and suitable payment methods should be added.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ŸÉÿßŸÜ ŸÑÿØŸäŸÉ ÿ£Ÿä ŸÖŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ∏ÿßÿ™ ÿ£Ÿà ÿ£ÿ≥ÿ¶ŸÑÿ© ÿ®ÿÆÿµŸàÿµ ÿÆÿØŸÖÿ© Storytel ŸÜÿ±ÿ¨Ÿà ŸÖŸÜŸÉ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸàÿßÿµŸÑ ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±ŸäÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ•ŸÑŸÉÿ™ÿ±ŸàŸÜŸä: support@storytel.ae

scraped_reviews.content: i've been using this app for months and, for the most part, love it. you get loads of books (even being in Germany, this has loads of english books. yay!) without limited consumption. i would love if the audiobook speed could be adjusted more (x2 is sometimes too slow). and get rid of ai stories. we don't need ai. it is theft and harms the planet. there are so many awesome ACTUAL HUMAN authors.

I have enjoyed this app so far. However, I found it to be a little bummer when I found the titles I want to read are only available in audiobook. As an old-fashioned reader that I am, I wish it could be available in both versions: e-book and audiobook. The books are curated pretty well, hence I'm anticipating more titles to arrive

I really enjoy using Storytel. But I wish it showed the total number of books in my bookshelf, how many I‚Äôve finished - which are important to track my progress and organize my reading and how many pages each book has. Also, it would be great to create and share book lists like in other popular apps. Hope these features come soon!

I've been a fan and subscriber of Storytel for years, but the recent limit to listening speed has severely crippled my ability to use the app. I co-read a lot (paper book with audiobook) and that requires the audio speed to be quite high to match my reading speed. Now I can only listen to audiobooks at 2x speed, which is not nearly enough to do this anymore. It seems like there is no intention to provide this functionality, and I will have to find an alternative.

need complete books by all authors ..consider adding more books by malayalam author Lajo Jose. his complete works are not there...there are other books too...in English ...like project hailmary , a guide to the galaxy (book series ) etc .

I've used this app for maybe over a year now and although my constant frustrations with limited library, terribly slow readings at 1x speed and series cut short of one or two books, I kept giving it a chance. It was generally ok. However, with the latest update, a limit of 2x max listening speed was introduced, which frustrates me to the level that I prefer to read the book just because it would be faster than this. Sadly after my subscription ends, I will probably have to turn to other choices.
whenever I try to open any book to read the app always shows internet connection error despite having good range and WiFi
Thank you, Storytel, for all the adventures and wisdom your wonderful book collection allows us to experience! Each story opens a new world, enriching both heart and mind...üôè
Horrible! Messing up with the timeline all the time. f.ex. jumps 30min back when playing pause..

Would be great but almost all audio books aren't "available in my country" (USA) making the service moot. Very few originals. Also they are using AI voices instead of real humans on some books. I will be canceling my subscription.

One of the best apps. A huge collection of books and the option to switch between reading or listening at anytime based on what you want. Also it is available across various platforms. Just wish there was a tv version too though.

It's a pretty decent app. I mean... it's good, BUT. They need to work on some stuff. Chapter options in audio are kinda wonky. Search option in ebooks are quite wonky. And they don't respond within the two day maximum they set if you mail them. Also sometimes they have author's filed under different variations of a name making it hard to find stuff. Their series are often not numbered. And I recently found a book missing a whole 3 chapters! No fix, just told me they will see about it.
while am trying to subscribe my amount got debited but it shows error ,kindly refund to the original payment method!

For the price of the app (200 NOK/month), there should be a bigger collection of audio books (I'm thinking particularly of Norwegian). Also, there are no clever way to know/select a chapter of the book from the audio book's interface. You are forced to skip back and forth in the audio book until you find a moment where the narrator announces it. Finally, if there is an audio book and ebook of the same novel/translation on Storytel, reading + listening with synched scrolling would be nice.

I really like the subscription service, the library seems big and diverse enough in the Netherlands. I would always welcome a bigger library, especially in English titles, but there's enough there for now at least. I do think the app could be better. The mechanism for rewinding and finding a position in an audiobook could be a lot better it is especially annoying for very long books. And alternatively or also it would be nice to have more options for skipping back and forwards longer instances. And it seems that it doesn't want me to skip back or forwards in quick succession, which I would find very useful to be able to do.

Variety of books, and good audio readers. But a lot of bugs in this application, it stops suddenly, and sometimes when i want to play a book, it doesn't respond with a message "playback failed, couldn't connect to storytel service" (and it's not a connection problem since all the other applications work very well). It's really frustrating, because i have to keep trying for x minutes to play the book, which is really a loss of time..
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Menna,
We're sorry to hear that! Could you please tell us where you are based?
/Storytel

scraped_reviews.content: The subscription itself is great. However, the app could have been much better. It MUST be possible to save the downloaded books to the SD card - my phone has little internal memory which means that I can only listen to short books, which is annoying. So please fix that, it is not so difficult! If that's an issue with my OS, I'd like to know that too.

Love the platform. There are many many books on it both for reading and listening. The only drawback of the new app update is how we no longer see the progress divided in chapters, but only the progress of the book. With books of 2-20 hours, it's useless to file through the book. I'd like that chapter progress feature back please! Other than that, it's really good!

If you would've asked me a few months ago I would've vividly recommended the app and given it 5 stars because it has a great selection and a lovely mix of Swedish and English literature. However, there have been updates lately and instead of solving the issue that you cannot see and skip chapters in the books (available in other apps), it just gave it a slightly more modern look and blocked half the books because I'm not in the correct geographical area. It also requires quite a bit of battery power, which is not always practical when traveling.  However, the biggest issue is the recent geographical limitations. I specifically chose Storytel.se because of  its choice in both Swedish and English literature and now it's becoming more limited! I acquired their e-reader a few months ago and really enjoy it, but it can be used only with their subscription and I am starting to regret my purchase now that I have less choice in my books. There should be some regulation that a subscription to the Swedish Storytel gives rights to the Swedish books. How else can Swedes abroad get access to their literature? I'm sorry Storytel, I'm a real fan but you need to do something about this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Sandrine. You are welcome to contact us at support@storytel.com if you have any questions regarding this. Best, Storytel

scraped_reviews.content: Not all books are available for users in the US. On a lot of the audiobooks, you get an error message stating "Audio format not available in your region." However, the same audiobook is available in my region on other apps. For example, Julie Trettel's Ravenden Series is available on Audible, but not on this app.
App keeps stopping randomly in middle of a book. It works for 20 mins, no issues. Later it stops every 2-3 mins. Paying for membership, but it doesn't seem to impact experience.

Really delighted with the huge variety of audiobooks in English, and Spanish. A couple of criticisms though: the catalogue is a bit chaotic, I think a much more comprehensive list of tags and categories should be offered. Also, not happy at all about being forced to choose a country and not being able to change; being fairly multilingual, I would be delighted to have access to many more languages. Another thing I would love to do is to scroll between chapters.

Can't listen and read at the same time. Selection is very limited, especially for books in English which is quite surprising. The library isn't curated, and there are many summaries of books and many editions for the same books. The app isn't used enough for it to have many reviews but it would help if they drew reviews from say goodreads or something so that I could get an idea about how good a narrator is or which edition isn't abridged etc. Lots to work on.

I love the app. I usually use it for audiobooks while doing house chores. One suggestion to the makers of the app: it'd be great if it was possible to sort the books in my bookshelf according to their genres, like novels, science, biography, diy, social science etc. It'd be easier to choose what to read next. Because usually I know what kind of book I want to listen next, but it's hard to find it in my endless bookshelf.

Not able to cancel my subscription during the trail period. There is an annoying bug saying that something went wrong, please try again later. I wrote them three days in a row, and they sent only same standard emails and after that stop answering. Totally disgusting support and neither user-friendly nor customer-friendly. I'm planning to contact the commission for consumer protection!

Installed it because I saw an ad and got curious, but it's a TOTAL DISAPPOINTMENT. It doesn't allow you to listen to literally anything, even a sample, without paid subscription. They offer a free trail for 3 days, but requires Credit Card access, as a first time user that has no clue about content quality or the app, why on earth would I bother?! They also have Help center option in the settings menu, but it doesn't even work, I kept tapping, tried restarting app, but with no luck.

Got kind of scammed, wanted to listen to an audio book GROKKING algorithms. Saw on their website as available installed the app. The first thing they asked was to buy the subscription even before I was allowed to search the book. Purchased the premium subscription and was unable to find the book by searching the name. Finally, I found it by searching through the Author's other works, turns out the book is not available anymore and is still being advertised on the website. No support. Cancelled.

Great concept but UX needs improvements. 1. It would be amazing to be able to see the table of contents and navigate through it, while listening to the book. 2. When l preview a book chosen from "My Bookshelf" and I navigate back, I'd like to see the list as I left it, not being taken to the top of the list. 3. When checking book details - copy "Push the text to read more" makes no sense. Maybe "Read more" would be enough? 4. There's no way to "unrate" the book when rated accidentally.

title: Hungry Caterpillar Play School
description:
Hungry Caterpillar Play School offers a calming and beautiful environment for young children ages 2-6. Activities are based on Montessori principles that encourage hands-on and independent learning.

The app is inspired by Eric Carle, a beloved author and illustrator known for his classic children‚Äôs books, including ‚ÄúThe Very Hungry Caterpillar‚Äù. 
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of books, activities, videos, songs, and meditations. 
‚Ä¢ Child-centric learning‚Äîexplore and learn at your own pace 
‚Ä¢ Eric Carle's beautiful and unique art style 
‚Ä¢ Essential early learning for kids aged 2-6 
‚Ä¢ Gentle rewards to encourage repeated play‚Äîcrucial for early learners 
‚Ä¢ Highly praised by parents of neurodivergent children

LEARNING BENEFITS 
ABCs - learn the alphabet and how to read. Children trace letters and learn to spell their name. 
EARLY MATH - explore numbers 1-10. Play games that teach early coding, measurement, patterns, and more. 
SCIENCE & NATURE - activities and non-fiction books make little ones aware of science and the natural world. 
PROBLEM-SOLVING - match pairs, learn shapes, solve jigsaw puzzles, and complete fun quizzes. 
ART & MUSIC - artistic activities include coloring, collage, and building blocks. Experiment with musical notes, explore scales, learn chords, and create beats. 
HEALTH & WELLNESS - practice meditations to calm down, relax, and reduce anxiety. 

FEATURES 
‚Ä¢ Safe and age-appropriate 
‚Ä¢ Designed responsibly to let your child enjoy screen time while developing healthy digital habits at a young age 
‚Ä¢ Play pre-downloaded content offline without wifi or internet 
‚Ä¢ Regular updates with new content 
‚Ä¢ No third-party advertising 
‚Ä¢ No in-app purchases for subscribers

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
This app contains sample content that is free to play. However, LOTS MORE fun and entertaining games and activities are available if you purchase a monthly or yearly subscription. While you are subscribed you can play with EVERYTHING. We regularly add new stuff, so subscribed users will enjoy ever-expanding play opportunities.

Google Play does not permit in-app purchases and free apps to be shared via Family Library. Therefore, any purchases you make in this app will NOT be shareable via Family Library.
