scraped_reviews.content: Hi! My daughter absolutely loves this app. She's had it since she was just 17m or so. It wasn't long before she began to ask for everything on it! While this game is definitely worth any of the subscription levels and is always updating new material--I'm giving it a 3 for the lack of easy tech support. I've tried everything to transfer my child's subscription, with the same email, to this tablet we bought her for her educational apps and I can't get it to transfer. If you could help! Please!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, please contact our Support Team at support@storytoys.com with the Google id used for purchase, the device details and screenshots of error message you see when you try restoring your purchase. We'll take good care of you :)

scraped_reviews.content: 1/2020: Increased rating back to 4 stars. I didn't have time to send an email with account information that I couldn't find, as developer requested, however the app is now working properly. Push notifications to "start a free trial" when we already have a paid subscription keep me from giving it 5 stars. Honestly I'd give it 4.9 though if I could-my son is learning shapes, colors, numbers, letters, and words. At 3 years old, he is really loving this app, and the graphics are seriously beautiful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Update: Hi Christina. We're so sorry you're experiencing problems with the app. Please email us at support@touchpress.com with the Google Play order reference number and we will look into this for you. 

Original: 
Many thanks for your review and your kind words, Christina. We're delighted that Play School is helping your son to learn so much!

scraped_reviews.content: My son really loves the My Very Hungry Caterpillar app so I downloaded this app on my tablet to see if he would like it. I forgot to cancel before the trial was up, which was my mistake, but it's very expensive for what it is. I wish I had remembered to cancel before the $59 was charged. Now not only did I unintentionally pay for it, but there isn't a way to transfer between platforms so I can't put it on his tablet. Update: emailed and confirmed that the app *doesnt* transfer between platforms
scraped_reviews.replyContent: HI Elizabeth. Sorry you're having trouble getting the app onto your son's tablet, you should be able to do so. Can you please email support@touchpress.com with the details and we will look into it for you. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This two yr old loves it. It has a lot of great learning content and with pass, it's all open. There are simple, sweet sounding songs that littles can actually sing along with. Letters and their sounds. Numbers and quantity. Size comparison. Pattern recognition. There's a lot! You won't feel guilty letting your child use this app, there's so much they learn while using it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow! You've made our day! We're so happy you're enjoying the app. This makes everyone's hard work here worthwhile. And now...onto creating the next feature we hope you'll love! ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: Great in many ways and not in others. A lot ot of good educational/learning content but also a lot of video dribble. I constantly have to redirect my child from the read a longs, weird skits etc back to learning games etc. For a paid app you would expect settings, which there are barely any. You should be able to disable certain content, but you can't. Also the DEI is blatantly obviously and highly not inclusive by completely excluding non DEI demographics. Kinda disappointing on those fronts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're not happy and appreciate your feedback. Please email us at support@storytoys.com and we'll look into what we can do in the future to make better ‚ò∫Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Is there a way to restrict what word combinations can randomly occur in mini games? On 2 separate occasions while playing the Uppercase/Lowercase letter matching train game my child encountered the same inappropriate word.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this. We have a filter in the app that blocks inappropriate words, although it covers a wide range of words, we are happy to look into anything that might be missing. Please send us a screenshot to support@storytoys.com and we will update the filter.

scraped_reviews.content: This is an excellent early learning app; enjoyable and educational. It is well thought out to maximize learning as it teaches phonetics along with letters, numerals and number values, has tracing activities for numerals and letters, spacial awareness/direction games, memory, puzzles and much more. The only let down is the price, it's expensive and an ongoing cost rather than 1 off purchase. I wish that great learning tools like this were made more accessible to lower income families.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Many thanks for your thoughtful review, it's much appreciated. We're so glad you've found the learning content so useful for your daughter. Regarding the price, we feel it's very reasonable given the breadth and depth of content. There's also plenty of free content! We certainly appreciate your candid feedback though. üòä

scraped_reviews.content: My child has a very basic name, yet the name selection won't allow his name. why would such a basic name be blocked. It isn't offensive.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Yikes! We're here to fix your problem. Please contact support@storytoys.com and let us take good care of you.

scraped_reviews.content: no where did it say it was gonna cost me 59.99 subscription. absoloutely fuming !!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The subscription price is displayed in app while you sign up for the free trial. We're sorry if there has been an issue. We will absolutely make it up to you, please send us your Google Play order reference number at support@storytoys.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I somehow was signed up for BOTH the monthly membership AND an annual membership. There is no reason I should have to pay twice. On top of that, I never did get the app to open as a member so I assumed it didn't go through. The process was terrible glitchy and not used friendly. I've also had to RE buy expansions on your other apps. For a paid app you need to do better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We're very sorry to hear you've had so much trouble with our app. Please email us at support@touchpress.com with the Google Play order reference number and we'll look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is fantastic, although recently I've been having pop up ads for Disney games appear. I think for an app you are paying $5.49 per month for to have ads is not really acceptable and very frustrating for my young one to use as he doesn't know how to close ads yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It has come to our attention that a pop-up advert for one of our other apps Disney Coloring World appeared in Hungry Caterpillar Play School over the Christmas period. This should not have happened and occurred as a result of a technical error. We are very sorry for this happening and have taken steps to ensure that it will not happen again.

scraped_reviews.content: 3 stars.  5 stars for the content. 1 star for the lame subscription functionality ===== I was still not able to use this app after I was charged with an annually subscription and a monthly subscription.   When I looked through the reviews, I found whole lot of users had similar experience and it begun months ago.    I am so frustrated about this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alan. The other reviews you mention were all resolved by emailing support@touchpress.com. Since we were unable to resolve your issue with the information we were given, we have refunded you in full for your purchase.

scraped_reviews.content: When I first downloaded the app, my son's adored it. But parts of the app seemed to uninstall themselves and then not want to reload. After way too much time and effort, of uninstalling, cleaning my phone and reinstalling, it would work again...for a while. Now my son's don't want to play the game because what they enjoyed playing only works half the time. They're bored of the same content that is very repetitive. This is worth a one time payment, not a monthly subscription. unsubscribing.

Game was fun. But app design was crappy af....How can the dev not do anything for so long despite unending customers complaint is beyond me. The biggest deal breaker was the constant need to Restore Purchase over and over again..When i took it on a flight, I ended up no being able to launch the app because it stupidly kept asking me to restore purchase over and over again and i did not have an internet connection. What's the point of paying a subscription if you can't play without an internet connection? I'd give a zero star if possible. And no, i will not email you for a fix because apparently hundreds of other customers must have done the same with no fix in sight.

There's plenty to do in this app of varying difficulty - and it's just beautiful! I do think the high price tag is worth it - you could easily spend that much on individual apps, to get the same content - I do wish however that it wasn't a yearly subscription and just a one off payment. Feel a bit forced into sending money into the void if you like - it doesn't feel value for money in that respect. Here's hoping my boy will be done with it by then - it wouldn't make any sense to pay again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for your feedback. We appreciate it and will be sure to pass this on to our lovely team. We hope your little will enjoy our app and make the most! :)

scraped_reviews.content: Exceptional set of apps. The games are hugely developmental, engaging and yet simply designed. Everything also looks to be designed with neuro diverse children in mind: there are no screaming / competing characters, loud music, no overload of activity or colours. The songs are beautiful and engaging, the meditations are a great hit with my 3 year old, the books are brilliant for both reading practice and imaginative play. I don't understand people complaining about the cost - so much content!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow! You've made our day! We're so happy you're enjoying the app. This makes everyone's hard work here worthwhile. And now...onto creating the next feature we hope you'll love! ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is fantastic and I don't mind paying for it. However it is not possible (as far as I can tell) to use the app once signed up on a child's profile. I have tried numerous times to allow access to the fully subscribed app on Kindle Kids and now Google Play Family Library and it just won't acknowledge that the app has been paid for. Incredibly frustrating. It‚Äôs a kids app which doesn't seem to be able to be played on a child safe profile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Okay, let's try these steps: 1) Sign into the second device with the Google account used to make the original purchase. 2) Download the app there, and press "restore purchases." 3) Sign back in again with the original account. Still not working? Then this is a job for our support team--reach out at support@storytoys.com

scraped_reviews.content: We love this app! My daughter loved it from the start. I tried other apps but none got her attention like this one did. It's pricey but worth it. She has been learning so much. She loves to trace the letters/numbers and playing with the puzzles. She loves to spin the wheel at the end of the activity. Overall, this is a very interactive colorful app full of great educational content.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow! You've made our day! We're so happy you're enjoying the app. This makes everyone's hard work here worthwhile. And now...onto creating the next feature we hope you'll love! ‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: When the game works, its phenomenal! But getting it to work is frustrating and near impossible. Every time we go into the app, it asks us to subscribe (which we did in October). It used to be reliable, but unfortunately is now a source of irritation for anyone who tries to use it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tara. Please delete the app from your device, switch off your device fully for a few minutes, then re-install the app, making sure it is the latest version. Then tap on "Restore Purchase" on the subscription page. If you are still having problems please email support@touchpress.com with the details.

scraped_reviews.content: Great game, when it works. I have to restore the purchase everytime my child wants to play, so I cancelled the subscription. Now with a month left of the subscription, the game says I have never subscribed and won't let us play. Absolute waste. **UPDATE** I contacted support with my issue. They replied with a request for purchase I.D. and generic instructions for reinstalling on a different platform than the one I listed in my email. I replied with the requested information, and received NO reply
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Stephanie. Please accept our apologies for the delay in getting back to you. As you will see from the email we just sent you, we escalated this issue to our engineering team and were waiting for their fix before we replied, hence the delay. If our email resolved the issue would you consider revising your review?

scraped_reviews.content: I like it a lot, I use it to teach English to my toddler and he enjoys it. My only issue with the app are the ads. I assumed that there wouldn't be any in the payed version but lately some Disney ads have appeared and they're quite annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It has come to our attention that a pop-up advert for one of our other apps Disney Coloring World appeared in Hungry Caterpillar Play School over the Christmas period. This should not have happened and occurred as a result of a technical error. We are very sorry for this happening and have taken steps to ensure that it will not happen again.

scraped_reviews.content: I put this on my daughter's (2yr) tablet as she really likes the hungry caterpillar game. She loves this one too except for the new update which has made the paint brush line go really skinny almost as skinny as the pencil line. My daughter and I find this frustrating as the description about the painting part of the game shows the finger painting and paint brush line to be very thick as it was when we first downloaded it earlier this year. If they fix this then I will rate 5 stars for sure.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Yikes! We're here to fix your problem. Please contact support@storytoys.com and let us take good care of you.

scraped_reviews.content: Constant restore update and download. My son is on the spectrum and loves Eric Carle and his books. He's also on the spectrum. The fact that it would require restoration of purchase and redownload everytime he finished not only brought him to tears but frustrated myself. I don't know what I'm going to do when I uninstall this but I refuse to deal with this. I was happy to pay the subscription but sadly this app is a waste of time. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nene. Sorry you're having problems with the app. Please email us at support@storytoys.com and we will look into it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: We love this Caterpillar! So when I saw this app that we hadn't used before, my 4yo grandson was excited to play. However, it took 2 days of only part download and some games never downloaded at all! WHAT? I PAID FOR THIS? So disappointing... I uninstalled. I'll reinstall once more. I hope the reinstall helps. That's just how much love we have for the Very Hungry Caterpillar
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Paula. Sorry you're having problems using the app. Please email support@touchpress.com explaining exactly that the issue is and we will look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: ***My bank confirmed that Google* StoryToys had charged me $49.99. It was not a hold. The bank said that the payment had gone through so it could not be stopped. I contacted google and they claim that we never got charged for this app so we will not be getting a refund. My bank account says that Google* Storytoys charged us an annual fee and this is the company that makes this app and that is their annual fee for this app. We had to report it as a fraud to our bank account because there is no history of this purchase on my Google account and Google did not want to give us a refund. We were supposed to get a 7 day free trial and we got charged $49.99 on the 6th day of the trial when it clearly says on my account that we still have one more free day. We are very upset about this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please email support@touchpress.com with your Google Play order ref. number as soon as possible so that we can look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Paid for the subscription, but it keeps getting stuck at the free trial stage and then we can‚Äôt even access that.. I canceled my subscription after a month of having issues. It‚Äôs too bad because my twins loved the games.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: HI Tracy. Sorry you're having problems with the game. Please email support@touchpress.com and we will look into this for you and come up with a fix.

scraped_reviews.content: We have a subscription to this and we have paid for the "My Very Hungry Caterpillar" game that has since been delisted from the app store. They removed the latter app from the play store and we can't install what we paid for on a new device. Support won't respond to us. It seems they put the old game behind the subscription paywall which was fine. My kid liked playing both. Now since he cant play one we're unsubscribing to this one. Very predatory/shady. Beware
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Something seems to have gone wrong, so let's find a way to resolve it! Email us at support@storytoys.com and we will find a satisfying solution.

scraped_reviews.content: BEST. WORTH EVERY PENNY! At first I thought Id delete after trial because it seemed too advanced for my 20 month old, but she very quickly caught on and surprised not only me, but my retired school teacher mom who was skeptical of screen time at all. so educational and Im blown away to watch my less than two year old identify letters, numbers and shapes with more repetition then I could alone give her.. she can trace letters and numbers and solve complex tangrams in a snap ! wow !
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Emma. Many thanks for the great review and your kind feedback, we're absolutely delighted that your daughter is learning so much! Would you mind if we quote your review in some of our marketing materials? You can reply here or email us at support@touchpress.com. Many thanks again for the review, from all of us at Touch Press.

scraped_reviews.content: It's great when you can access it! It seems to be the trend that after you pay they screw with it so you have to go through the choosing of subscriptions! I don't know if it's a scam or a glitch but it's super annoying. I'm just irritated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Deenie. Sorry you're having problems with the app. Please email support@touchpress.com explaining the issue and we will look into it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT: Had to completely format the tablet and have my account used first on the tablet. Set up a second account for child as a restricted profile and app now works as intended. Would absolutely be 5 stars if this could be purchased from the store rather than in-app. The app currently only works under a parent account which completely defeats the purpose of having a child account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for updating your review. We appreciate it! :) We understand your concern, should you have any further issues, please email us at support@storytoys.com.

scraped_reviews.content: For as beautifully done as this application is - you can NOT use it 1) use it on a device with parental controls such as Family Link or Family App Libraries and 2) across multiple children's devices that each have an account that has parental controls. For such a beautifully done app that is marketed for children and families, it is absolutely egregious that this app cannot be used on a device with commonly used parental controls that keep children safe. We are absolutely cancelling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're having difficulty with the app. Could you please email us at support@storytoys.com explaining the problem and we'll do our best to help you resolve it. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: It would be good if it worked. Set up the free trial, it unlocked everything once. After trying to play later everything was locked again. Tried several times to reload purchases and rven tried uninstaling and reinstaling. Nothing worked.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we would like to fix this. As we don't have your email address, can you please write to us at support@touchpress.com so that we can help you better. We look forward to your email.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't get it to work on my daughter's tablet via Google Kids profile. Have followed the Restore Purchases steps on a secondary device where the purchase was made on my account (Parents acct), but still does not work on her profile. Unsubscribed and deleted. Would be nice if you could add an option to login via email instead, would have made it a lot user friendly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to see you go, but thank you for your feedback. Please contact our Support at support@storytoys.com so we can look into this for you and assist you with a suitable solution.

scraped_reviews.content: Why are there pop up ads in a paid game? I feel this is inappropriate and frustrating for young children who cannot grasp the concept of what they are able to play and what they are not. Certain elements of the game are very glitchy and other elements are the same as other Hungry Caterpillar apps. Will the adverts be removed as I see from previous reviews this has happened in error before?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're not happy with the occasional pop ups of more amazing apps from us. You can disable this. Tap on the Parent Center located on the top right corner of the app --> pass the age verification --> settings --> More great app suggestions from StoryToys --> off. Please email us at support@storytoys.com if you have any further questions.

scraped_reviews.content: Use to love this app so I decided to purchase it but since September it doesn't let my child load videos properly. He trys to follow the flashing circle and it sends him back to the home page. I emailed u guys about it and u guys said the problem was going to be fix on the November update. It has not been fixed. N now some of the videos won't load.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Yikes! Time for a fast solution! Please contact support@touchpress.com and let us take good care of you.

scraped_reviews.content: my toddler is obsessed but I'm not happy about the price at all seriously I would pay but it's ¬£59 per year i can get an Xbox or playstation game that mine forever for that price as a one off payment sure but per year your taking the piss. I dont care the people who make this app feel its reasonable we are living in a saver cost of living crisis as a one off payment I would definitely support but I'm not going to pay for somthing my child can't keep at that kinda price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for voicing your opinion. While we strive to cater to all, we also understand we might not be for everyone. We do hope your toddler continues to enjoy the free stuff on the app and that you'll explore some of our other amazing Eric Carle apps that might be better suited ‚ò∫Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't work. I did the test trial and the app never worked. I tried to unsubscribe but apparently that didn't work either. Just got charged $6.40 for an application that my child really wants to use but can't. Bummed that I ended up paying. Every single things she tries requires trying to refresh the subscription and then constantly tapping and hoping it works (which is probably won't). Garbage software.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Sorry you're having problems with the app. Please email support@touchpress.com and we will look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I pay for playpass for my family. my son loves this game. it will work on my daughter's tablet no problem and play pass unlocks everything. it will not unlock everything for him. its become very frustrating I just want him to be able to play on his tablet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Yikes! Time for a fast solution! Please contact support@storytoys.com and let us take good care of you.

scraped_reviews.content: every single time we hit the back button to exit a game it takes us back to the home screen where every single time we have to click restore purchase in order to gain access to any of the games it's an awesome learning game when you can actually play it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you're having this problem! We'd love to help, so please contact our support team at support@touchpress.com with the make, model and OS of your device and we will look into it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: We cannot get this app to work on two different phones and a tablet. It will subscribe us and then content remains locked, then when we go in later, we get an error message and have to delete the app and reinstall over and over.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew. Sorry you're having problems with the app. Please email us at support@touchpress.com with the Google Play order reference number and we will look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: The game would'nt work at all. Tried for days to unlock the content I PAID for. Content would never unlock no matter what was done. Uninstall and reinstall. Waited a few days Incase it needed to download and nothing. Nothing but a very sad and disappointed 4 year old and a frustrated mom. Really too bad as we love the other app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Robyn. Sorry you're having problems with the app. Please email us at support@touchpress.com with the Google Play order reference number and we will look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I originally thought this was great and my son loved it, but the trial froze after 15 minutes and then we couldn't get it working again, everything was locked. I then got charged for the app and still remained all frozen. so disappointing
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, can you please try rebooting your device. Please contact us at support@touchpress.com if the issue persists.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is educational for my 2 and 4 year old daughters . There is so much learning in it. I love how it teaches uppercase and lowercase letters instead of just uppercase. I only wish the learning numbers went up to 20 instead of 10.

She loves it and the app in a whole is awesome but sometimes it's glichy and doesn't want to work on some of the activities, gets frozen and for a toddler that's not good but it is teaching her patience along with the pre k games lol glass half full .....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for leaving a review! If you're experiencing issues with the app, please contact us at support@storytoys.com for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: My kid loves this game, but it won't play on her tablet. We use a tablet controlled by family link. We can't restore the purchase If this doesn't work with Google Family Link, then I would recommend using a different mechanism, because your app is for kids. ABC Mouse uses an account setup, and works great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Unfortunately Google doesn't allow the use of in-app purchases with Family Library. You could try the following:
1. Sign into the other device with the Google account that was used to make the purchase
2. Download the app and restore purchases
3. Sign back in again with the other account.
Email us at support@touchpress.com if you need more info.

scraped_reviews.content: In the ABC section tried to input grandson name had difficulty since game would not accept then tried another word which game accepted now it is difficult to change word for name and will not recognize another input.... so that section will be not used.... how can we fix this bug?

scraped_reviews.userName: Quit tryna be me, You're doing a bad job at it
scraped_reviews.content: Ok, so I haven't had the chance to test this with my son yet and thats all due to it saying I have to subscribe 1st, I selected yearly but then it said I was declined. Then I had money in there today and applied then said I was already signed up..so I said to restore purchase and it said i haven't got a subscription yet!! This is upsetting as both me and son play the hungry caterpillar game..hes to cute to ignore lol Please help fix this so I can play with son, only have till the 5th apparently
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry! Something went wrong, somewhere! And while stuff like this happens on the rare occasion, we are fast fixers. Just email us at support@storytoys.com, and we will be sure to rectify the situation to your satisfaction!

scraped_reviews.content: I have a device that is totally dedicated to my kid as a google play parental controlled device. It doesn't have my credentials on it. The only way to install apps there is to put them in via the google family library (a perfectly reasonable method). I was even willing to pay for the subscription TWICE (since it seemed i was to be FORCED to do that), even there, on my childs device it says "an adult has to complete this transaction from their profile" no way of doing this
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Okay, let's try these steps: 1) Sign into the second device with the Google account used to make the original purchase. 2) Download the app there, and press "restore purchases." 3) Sign back in again with the original account. Still not working? Then this is a job for our support team--reach out at support@storytoys.com

scraped_reviews.content: CANCLED and never used! Not able to set up on childs account. And I refuse to log on as my google account on a 3 years old's tablet because nu card is linked to my account instead of his. This app might be seccure but all controls would be unlocked if I do that. Sad
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Okay, let's try these steps: 1) Sign into the second device with the Google account used to make the original purchase. 2) Download the app there, and press "restore purchases." 3) Sign back in again with the original account. Still not working? Then this is a job for our support team--reach out at support@storytoys.com

scraped_reviews.content: Not the worst but it's a monthly subscription at similar prices to Netflix and Spotify. While I don't mind paying once off for quality, monthly subscriptions for a game with only minimal changes here and there is a bit greedy. Someone mentioned good for neurodiverse kids and while I do agree the lack of loud abrasive noises is good, as someone with ASD myself I can say the bright white background is visually stressful. Content is not really any different to cheap/free kids educational apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We thank you for letting us know how you feel and updating your review. We will pass this on to our team!

title: WEBTOON: Manga, Comics, Manhwa
description:
Join the largest manga, comics, and manhwa community in the world with millions of fans and creators on WEBTOON!
 
Why you'll love WEBTOON:
- Access millions of episodes for FREE!
- Explore the world‚Äôs largest selection of webcomics spanning diverse genres like action, romance, thriller and everything in between.
- Now you can read or watch fan-favorite stories like never before with Video Episodes - anytime, anywhere, free!
- Find your next obsession with personalized recommendations and series highlights in the NEW & HOT tab.
- Enjoy global hits like Lore Olympus, The Mafia Nanny, Omniscient Reader, School Bus Graveyard and The Remarried Empress.
- Read familiar favorites and graphic novels like Fullmetal Alchemist, Batman: Wayne Family Adventures, Godzilla, Avatar: The Last Airbender and From Old Country Bumpkin to Master Swordsman.
- Home to the original webcomics behind the TV and film adaptations of Tower of God, True Beauty, Sweet Home and Marry My Husband streaming on Netflix, Disney+, and Crunchyroll and more.
- Engage with a thriving community of fellow enthusiasts and creators by subscribing to your favorite series and making your voice heard through the comments section!
- Unlock premium content like full series access and early episode access by buying Coins

Are you a storyteller at heart? Use our CANVAS platform to publish your own webcomics and reach a global audience. Share your story and build your own community. WEBTOON is where you find your fandom.

Website: https://www.webtoons.com/en/
Terms of Use: https://www.webtoons.com/en/terms

Check out WEBTOON on socials!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/webtoonofficial
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@webtoonofficial
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/webtoonofficial
X: https://x.com/webtoonofficial

scraped_reviews.content: The stories are great if the app lets you read them. Constantly having issues with ads not loading. I've tried the suggested "fixes" multiple times. It's not me, it's you. The app just isn't connecting to the ads server for days at a time. I feel bad for the poor authors who aren't getting ad revenue because Webtoon can't manage their app. I only watch the ads to help out my favorite authors. If the author also posts on another site, I just read it there because this app is so bad.

Was a premium subscriber for a few years, gave it a 5 star rating. They recently changed the premium so you get less of a discount, thus you pay more coins per episode and in exchange you don't get ads and get a coupon for their shop. It was offered as an "upgrade" but is really just them giving me less for the same price. I'd rather watch ads and keep my discount where it was. I unsubscribed. If I get the option to go back to my original plan, I might change my rating, but not likely.

New UI is an absolute dumpster fire. Ads are absolutely everywhere, and you can no longer view novels by what day they release, making it incredibly hard to track down what I was reading and what I need to catch up on. Pop up ads that cover over half the screen now play whenever I open an episode to read that you can't get rid of for 30 seconds minimum.

I use to love this app until they monopolized it. From the forced choices of either buying coins to unlock a 2 minute chapter to not having the chapter unlocked for at least 43 days... You have lost my business and my 5 stars. I will continue to read what is free, and then search the internet for a free version of your webtoons. FYI - A lot of their webtoons that aren't finished on the app, are either finished or have tons of other chapters elsewhere. YW.

I've had to reset my ad settings every single day since the latest update because watching ads to open episodes stops working every. single. day. The ads for webtoons on the home page also always pop up right as you're about to click something and half the time exiting out of those doesn't work well so my 'recents' is now messed up too. It feels like things are just getting more expensive and more intrusive on here and it sucks after having used the app for years to see it turn into this.

I've been reading webtoons for at least 10 years now. I love them! I understand that ads support the authors and are quite necessary, but if you dont remove the 6 second ads from the top of my screen when I open something to read, I will refuse to ever touch this app again. I liked the feel of the app because it feels clean and like I had a choice in watching ads to support. Now, the screen feels cramped for 6 seconds when I open anything to read.

Used to love the app. But it's gone down hill almost over night. Ads that take up 1/4 the screen until they are over, Either having to pay money or watch an ad for every episode ones you used to be able to daily pass. Constantly getting random ones popping up as i'm scrolling which instantly opens the webtoon and adds it to my recommendations even if it is nothing similar to the rest of what I read, etc. Seems the devs are turning it into a cash grab.

I can't tell what I've read anymore. Why have read episodes darkened for as long as I can remember, only to suddenly change it so that the read episodes be lighter than the unread ones. Also, I realize it's probably more of a problem for English, but having every episode being marked with "read" doesn't help when present tense and past tense are spelled the same, so it just looks like everything has been read. I liked it better when only the episodes you read got marked

My last issue was resolved, and I restarted my subscription. However, now there are ads being played for any episodes that are publicly available and "free". As a paying subscriber, you are still required to watch the ads for episodes you previously paid for. What's the point of buying the episodes if you'll have to watch ads when they go up "free"?

A strong issue is that the app has a very frustrating tendency to flash ads for whatever comic it thinks should be read, even if it's strongly not to your taste. These ads also take you to the comic, with only a tiny 'X' to close it. Even with a stylus, it feels extremely imprecise to close, so you tend to get stories added to your list without wanting them at all, and should be fixable by just adding in a "take me there!" button. This makes it feel like a disingenuous way to drive up numbers.

this is still my favorite comics app, but it just got a design overhaul and the layout is the WORST NOW. It's counterintuitive and it's supposed to have been redesigned to help you discover new comics, but they've just made it harder to read ANY of their comics at all. it's a good selection, though draconic about body imaging, but this is going to make me try to see where else I can read the titles I like.

I can't find some. stories in the app. it's not like the one's I'm looking for were removed because when I found a link to the story it sent me to the story on the app and let me read it, they just wouldn't show up when I searched for it in the app. also the free way of earning coins is ridiculous. the app can't even track the progress correctly. just make us watch a butt load of ads to get coins, at least we'd know we're getting them instead of hoping our progress gets tracked correctly.

They took away daily pass and made those daily pass episodes/series cost coins. Some series are stuck completely behind a paywall; it used to be just the last 3-5 episodes. Now it's the whole series. Considering some series are hundreds of episodes, it can get expensive, especially if you're reading many stories that are only accessible with coins (not the case for every story though; some are still free or can be read with ads).

I'm giving a 1 star rating until this is addressed/fixed! I opened the app today and realized that Daily Pass on completed series is gone and now the only options are to watch an advert or spend coins. It's bad enough that series are being locked away under Daily Pass almost immediately when completed but to now require readers to pay to reread--that's disgusting. I'm not going to "buy" them in the app if at any point they can be taken away!

The ad pass is terrible because half the time the ad pass is unavailable and the the times it does work there is a good chance that the ad you just watched won't grant you access to the episode you watched the ad for. I only still have the app and read comics on it because I am just reading the ones that are completely free, no ads or anything. The UI update and is awful!!! Change it back to the old one! This UI hurts not only readers but also the artists and authors of the comics! Pop up ads.

Not sure what happened. I've been using this app for years, the website even longer, and for some reason it's suddenly stopped loading episodes correctly. Different parts will glitch and cause the story to be unreadable. It's driving me crazy, what happened? Also the ads have suddenly gotten much worse. Instead of them being optional to get coins or read new episodes early, they're shoved in your face, too. Disappointing. You're better off finding comics elsewhere online.

I've been on Webtoon since about 2019, most of the stories are genuinely amazing. With that being said though, what Webtoon advertises the most has to be unlocked by ads or coins. Though there are ways to get free coins, they expire after about a week. You could work for a month trying to get free coins, then POOF! They're gone. This is really frustrating. Overall, the comics and authors are amazing, the app, not so much.

Huge disappointment to come back and see every last comic, including finished ones from years ago be locked behind a pay wall. For 40 episodes of just 1 comic, it's $10 to unlock. Definitely not worth it anymore if you're someone who likes to read multiple titles. Webtoon used to be a fantastic place to discover and read new stories with the option to unlock more episodes a week early(up to a point), but it's become yet another cash grab gimmick that forces you to spend heavy for little reward.

This app really used to be 5-stars. Then they added ads, which take time to pop up and you'll end up accidentally tapping the wrong chapter to read. One strike. Then, they updated to where you can't see if you left a like on an episode, which I used to use as a way to see if I finished reading an episode or not. Two strikes. Now, they stopped accurately showing if I have read recent episodes. I see several series have new updates but they don't show unread episodes. FIX IT OR I PIRATE.

Started watching "Sweet Home" on Netflix but cancelled subscription before series ended. Learned it was based on a webtoon, so got this to try to finish the series. The first handful of chapters are free, but then you have to pay or watch an ad for every chapter. That means $30 or over 100 ads. Ridiculous. The app works well and seems to have good variety, which is why it's not 1-Star.

I'm so frustrated with this app. Been screwed over by treasure hunt, again! I did an offer and beat 1k levels of this game. I watched over 1k ads to do this. I had a video showing I beat it on time. They gave me the previous rewards, but not the last one for 504 coins. They gave a list of reasons why I might have been disqualified, but none applied to me. They closed my ticket, and then there was nothing i could do. Can't even try to talk to someone else to get help.

Check if your ad's even work! Tired of the same ad not loading. It eventually let's me exit it, then immediately makes your whole app freeze on a loading screen. Makes me restart the app and I have to wait for the next chance to watch another ad. Oh but then it gives me the same ad so I have to restart your app 20 times in a row(WISH I was exaggerating)!!!! About to just uninstall the app and go to an actual library for real books. Walking to a library would be better then this..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you so much for sharing your feedback. I am sorry to hear that you are experiencing an issue with the app. If you are still experiencing this problem, please send us an email at webtoonsupport@webtoon.com so that we can collect more information from you and troubleshoot this problem.

scraped_reviews.content: To be clear off the bat, I don't mind ads, per se. I'm watching on a free account and I've been on the internet long enough to know that nothing is free without adspace. No my issue is simply not being able to view comics anymore. I'm stuck on a black screen with a rotating green loading bar for every single thing I try to read. Even after waiting 5 minutes, nothing loads. I've tried every "fix" online with no solve. It sucks.

I love all the stories I've read so far! HOWEVER the coin system...what the heck... I don't like it. I read through the story I get so excited and boom...I need coins to continue... so, here's my proposal. either 1. you can give a certain amount of coins everyday or 2. probably the least liked option but! ads to get coins... these are the best two solutions I can think of and most people would love to do this if they can't pay for more coins.

They had the audacity to shove an "upgrade" at me for my subscription which resulted in a basically useless monthly coupon (I have never once purchased anything from their shop) and then REDUCED the discount on the episodes I WAS paying $20 monthly for! Coins are already hard to stretch as is. Episodes used to cost 7, with my plan they went down to 5, and that felt great. But then they bounced me back up to 6 claiming it was a better deal to update my package. Absurd. I'll spend money elsewhere.

SAVE YOUR MONEY! Love the stories available but the app has gotten worse over the last year. Most content is now blocked behind ads and pay walls. A "premium" sub only discounts an episode by 1 coin (used to be 2 coins & they don't tell before you update!). Completed series advertised for unlock at a"discount" doesn't save sub members any more of a discount which makes paying for a subscription useless. TERRIBLE "free" coin treasure hunt feature. It's practically a scam hidden under fine print.

The fact that you need to log in to read the episodes is frustrating. It's even more annoying because on the episodes you are blocked from reading, the episode says watch an ad and you'll be able to read it. Yet even watching an ad requires you to log in. I remember when Webtoon didn't force you to log in, instead you just had to wait a week or less to read episodes. All in all, this app has gotten very limited.

I have not opened this app. I will NEVER open this app. The only reason I installed this was so I'd be able to leave a review telling you your ads are absolutely obscene. They're poor quality, annoyingly everywhere, and intrusive to the point I genuinely believe there should be policy changes between companies and the play store. Not only do you make it purposely hard to click out of. You also, at two separate stages of your ads, force me into both the app store and my browser. That is not okay.

Comics for free! But ads are increasingly annoying. Longer you have the app, the more ads there are. Even after closing an ad, the app automatically opens and takes you to a new series that you didn't click on. Every time the app is opened, an ad opens for a featured comic, click the X to close the ad, and it opens a different comic anyway. Every time. My continue reading is full of comics I don't want. Hit box for X is glitched or they force you to view comics so they get money. It's excessive.

Edit: I didn't think it could get worse, but it has. Now FREE episodes have on screen ads, which load perfectly fine mind you, then episodes that you have to watch an ad for infinitely try to load. It's bad. I highly encourage you support your favorite artists on their KoFi or Patreon, cuz this just isn't the place. I'd give this app 0 stars if possible.

Good places to read good stories, but I have been having issues trying to read them. Now I have to watch unnecessary ads for the free chapters of a story when I shouldn't, and on top of that when I want to watch an ad for an early chapter for a story, it doesn't work and tries to make me buy it instead when I don't have any coins.

I love reading comics on this app and have done so for many years between different devices. but it heavily upsets me that now there are add videos that pop up over top of the comics, especially on mobile because you get to try and read the comic through 1/4 of your screen until you can skip the add. its really upsetting.

I see more adds than comics. Open it up, add, pull up your favorites add, before you open it add, and click on the latest episode add. Going back to the home screen, add. If you don't want to buy coins to see next week's episode its alway a 30-second, but wait, it will take you to the app store regardless, and then you have to wait another 5 seconds for whatever reason. what happened to this app??

ads have become even further out of control. ads on current free episodes, ads that don't load properly, ads that don't count so you have to watch another, and ads that don't have any option to exit. have even had some that tried to automatically install the app they were hawking. episode layouts are weird, and some of my subscriptions, while still on the app have become difficult to access, while things that have been foisted are appearing in the weekly "continue reading" section instead.

I really enjoyed the works that were published on this app, and though I didnt like the update where you had to view ads to access completed comics, I tolerated it. But what really annoys me to no end is the removal of the page likes. I can no longer look for my favorite pages, and this is made especially annoying on comics I've been reading for a long time, where I struggle to find a particular page that I had already liked. I see no reason for it being removed, please bring it back.

I've had this app for about a decade. I absolutely loved it. until: they raised the prices on episodes, then, ALL the ads. the tiny pop-ups that take you somewhere else, the removal of the heart icon that you can see, the intrusive ads that are loud and cover your page, the option to pay $20in coins to own a completed series if you only need one chapter, the daily passes, and the pay to read. I miss the way it was and hate the way it is now. It's too money hungry focused.

Please redesign it to be more user-friendly. As new comics are coming in, there needs to be a way to keep tabs on them other than subscribe or notification. I'm old school, and I depend on the "Daily" tab, so bring back the "Daily" tab! PLEASE!!!! And STOP the pop-ups in the middle of reading comics. I don't mind the ads, but I do mind pop-ups in the middle of my reads. Also, add a selection of what comics we've purchased. I would love to re-read some of the comics I purchased in the past.

Been reading since about 2018. Have been very passionate about webcomics since even before then. This app used to only have ads at the end of each chapter, before the comments. Now it has ads before the chapter taking up half the screen that cannot be scrolled past, video ads between early-access chapters, in-app currency used to buy early access, and paywalls for comics after they're completed. If you want to read Lore Olympus, just buying the physical books is cheaper at this point.

Ordinarily, a decent app. Most of the UI changes didn't bother me. The decision to have ads pop up in the middle of something you're reading if you're away for two minutes. Not great. Those 3/4th of the page ads at load with the (x) button smaller then a keyboard letter? Terrible. You miss the target, get sent there, and you're auto subscribed to something you never wanted to read in the first place. Smaller ads, no auto subscription, and much bigger (x) button, please.

I've used Webtoons since it came out. It went from one of my favorite apps to my least favorite. I was always happy to buy coins to read ahead and support the author and platform. Now, predatory ads popup after every episode ensuring you accidentally click on them. The final straw and the reason im going to uninstall it is because of the ads that take up half of the screen on the beginning of "free" episodes now too. I guess this is the result of the company going public.

Webtoon used to be a fantastic app. You could immediately get into your comics with easy navigation and it costed very little to support if you choose to do so. It was 5 coins to unlock new episodes, and now it's 7 coins. Your "free" coins took months to expire and now they are gone within a day or two. You log in and get pop up ads followed by ads when you read a free comic. All the sudden monetization has been jarring and has felt scummy. It is still good, but a shell of what it was.

This used to be my favorite manga app. Now I am looking for an alternative platform, because the UI keeps getting worse for the sake of making you watch more ads. You can't even use multiple devices properly if you are unlocking episodes with coins or ads. Its also very difficult to track where you left of if you are interrupted while reading an episode and forgot you were reading it. Happens to me a lot. But we have ads in the splash screen that we can't skip. Yay!

This app has been almost completely ruined by the company, now you must click through multiple ads for webcomics every time you open it, scroll through a terribly cluttered UI to find your list, then scroll past an ad when you open an episode. The UI design could best be described as digging through trash to find a morsel. I don't want videos, spam, etc. Just let me see what I'm subscribed to and read.

it's a great app tbh. I like a lot of the choices they've made in comparison to other webcomic apps. but lately, they've been putting ads on EVERYTHING. They are now popping up on free episodes, and they cover half the screen until they are done. I thought that we were past the incredibly predatory and in-your-face ads that plagued the 2010s. Might be time to move on.

I've used Webtoon for years and really enjoyed it. I didn't even mind when they introduced coins. However, these event pop-ups that show every time I open the app have gotten out of hand. Even if I click "don't show again" I get the same pop up next time I open it! I used to use this app several times a day, whenever I had the freetime to read a few episodes. Now I don't want to open it because I dread the pop ups the come up, especially when there's four in a row. Just let me read my comics!

Was a great app, but after a while they've been forcing more and more ads into it. at first it was just at the bottom of the page between the end of the chapter and the comments which was fine, but then they started forcing ads on start-up, and now even free chapters are plagued with them stuck to the top of the screen and scrolling with the chapters. And now there are ads that never end and don't have an X button to close them, so you're stuck, forcing you to close the app.

I've loved webtoon and used it for years. Recent updates include intrusive ads, like videos that take up half of the screen, and a full screen ad as soon as you open the app every time that you cannot close just have to wait for it to be done. I understand you need to have ads for free users but this is getting way out of hand. I read webtoons every night before bed but if this continues I will find something else!

I have been using the app for years now, and have always enjoyed it. Ads were never intrusive or obstructing, but I am now getting ads at the beginning of chapters. I have been paying for premium for a long time and buying coins frequently so the fact I am seeing ads interrupting my reading is unacceptable. Premium needs to get rid of ads, or there needs to be a one time purchase in order to do so. If this is not fixed soon, I will stop reading new novels, as this is ruining my experience.

I've been with webtoon for a long time since I was in high school, but now I am finally done and looking for alternatives. These new ads that they are doing don't even have an X that pop up after 30 seconds to unlock an episode, requiring you to exit and close the app, then re-open it. This is unacceptable, and I will be looking for alternatives to this app. Update: I just went back to catch up because I HOPED they would fix these ads, but I JUST GOT ANOTHER ONE OF THESE TYPES OF ADS.

The ads are the tip of the iceberg. I've had this ap for several years and when I first downloaded it, it was all free. Now you spend more on coins than you would to buy a comic and the ads that pop up when you're in the middle of a good read is obnoxious. Should have just started as a paid app like Tappy Toons instead of attracting readers to the free app and then slowly taking that away.

title: Sygic GPS Navigation & Maps
description: Sygic GPS Navigation & Maps is innovative GPS navigation app with monthly-updated offline maps and with precise live traffic & speed camera alerts, both updated in real time. It‚Äòs trusted by more than 200 million drivers worldwide. Offline 3D maps are stored on your phone for GPS navigation without an internet connection. We update the maps multiple times per year for free, so that you can always rely on Sygic GPS Navigation. NAVIGATE ANYWHERE, EVEN WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION ‚Ä¢ 3D Offline maps of all countries in the world, from TomTom and other providers ‚Ä¢ Free map updates multiple times per year ‚Ä¢ Voice-guided GPS navigation with precise directions and spoken street names ‚Ä¢ Millions of interesting Places (POI) ‚Ä¢ Pedestrian GPS navigation with walking directions and tourist attractions (POI) ‚Ä¢ Satellite Maps - search for your target address, point of interest or favorites in the satellite view.* ‚Ä¢ Customize your navigation arrow. Try everyday car, van or even formula. ESCAPE THE TRAFFIC ‚Ä¢ Avoid traffic jams with the most accurate real time traffic information with data collected from more than 200 million users worldwide* ANDROID AUTO CONNECTIVITY ‚Ä¢ Just connect your phone to your car's screen and stay focused on the road ‚Ä¢ You can use your car's touchscreen, knobs, or buttons to control the app STAY SAFE ‚Ä¢ Advanced safety features make driving in unfamiliar territories easier ‚Ä¢ Speed limit warnings show you the current speed limit and the upcoming speed limit changes ‚Ä¢ Dynamic Lane Assistant guides you into the correct lane ‚Ä¢ Head-up Display (HUD) projects navigation onto the windshield of your car, making driving at night safer ‚Ä¢ Sign recognition detects speed limits from traffic signs as you drive ‚Ä¢ Dashcam records the road ahead and automatically saves video in case of an accident ‚Ä¢ Real View Navigation is an augmented reality feature for even better and safer driving experience ‚Ä¢ Cockpit shows you the real time performance of your car. ‚Ä¢ Real time route sharing lets you share your estimated time of arrival & current position on a map* ‚Ä¢ Wrong-way warning (in partnership with Bosch)**. If you are driving in the wrong way or someone is driving in the opposite direction, we will warn you.* SAVE MONEY ALONG YOUR ROUTE ‚Ä¢ Park easily with parking place suggestions and live info about prices and availability* ‚Ä¢ Set your fuel type and fill up for the best price with live information about fuel prices* ‚Ä¢ Avoid speeding tickets with Speed camera warnings* ‚Ä¢ Save money on roaming charges with offline maps Do you want to find out how it feels to have Premium+? Try our 7-day trial for free and discover all Premium+ features. After that, you can decide if you want to prolong your subscription or use basic features only. Should you have any questions, please visit sygic.com/support. We are here for you 7 days a week. If you like our app, please leave a review or spread the word at sygic.com/love. Thank you for your support. *Please note that this feature requires an internet connection. Note: Sharing videos from Dashcam is forbidden by law in these countries: Austria, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Slovakia, Spain. Note 2: Dashcam, Traffic Sign Recognition, and Real View are part of the new feature SmartCam. SmartCam merge all camera features into one. The SmartCam is a part of our Premium+ subscription. **Wrong-way driver feature is available in Sygic GPS Navigation for Android, version 22.2. or higher. More information about features can be find in glossary: https://www.sygic.com/what-is By installing, copying, or using all or any portion of this software you accept all the terms and conditions of this agreement: https://www.sygic.com/company/eula
descriptionHTML:
Sygic GPS Navigation & Maps is innovative GPS navigation app with monthly-updated offline maps and with precise live traffic & speed camera alerts, both updated in real time. It‚Äòs trusted by more than 200 million drivers worldwide. Offline 3D maps are stored on your phone for GPS navigation without an internet connection. We update the maps multiple times per year for free, so that you can always rely on Sygic GPS Navigation.

NAVIGATE ANYWHERE, EVEN WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION
‚Ä¢ 3D Offline maps of all countries in the world, from TomTom and other providers
‚Ä¢ Free map updates multiple times per year
‚Ä¢ Voice-guided GPS navigation with precise directions and spoken street names
‚Ä¢ Millions of interesting Places (POI)
‚Ä¢ Pedestrian GPS navigation with walking directions and tourist attractions (POI)
‚Ä¢ Satellite Maps - search for your target address, point of interest or favorites in the satellite view.*
‚Ä¢ Customize your navigation arrow. Try everyday car, van or even formula.

ESCAPE THE TRAFFIC
‚Ä¢ Avoid traffic jams with the most accurate real time traffic information with data collected from more than 200 million users worldwide*

ANDROID AUTO CONNECTIVITY
‚Ä¢ Just connect your phone to your car's screen and stay focused on the road
‚Ä¢ You can use your car's touchscreen, knobs, or buttons to control the app

STAY SAFE
‚Ä¢ Advanced safety features make driving in unfamiliar territories easier
‚Ä¢ Speed limit warnings show you the current speed limit and the upcoming speed limit changes
‚Ä¢ Dynamic Lane Assistant guides you into the correct lane
‚Ä¢ Head-up Display (HUD) projects navigation onto the windshield of your car, making driving at night safer
‚Ä¢ Sign recognition detects speed limits from traffic signs as you drive
‚Ä¢ Dashcam records the road ahead and automatically saves video in case of an accident
‚Ä¢ Real View Navigation is an augmented reality feature for even better and safer driving experience
‚Ä¢ Cockpit shows you the real time performance of your car.
‚Ä¢ Real time route sharing lets you share your estimated time of arrival & current position on a map*
‚Ä¢ Wrong-way warning (in partnership with Bosch)**. If you are driving in the wrong way or someone is driving in the opposite direction, we will warn you.*

SAVE MONEY ALONG YOUR ROUTE
‚Ä¢ Park easily with parking place suggestions and live info about prices and availability*
‚Ä¢ Set your fuel type and fill up for the best price with live information about fuel prices*
‚Ä¢ Avoid speeding tickets with Speed camera warnings*
‚Ä¢ Save money on roaming charges with offline maps

Do you want to find out how it feels to have Premium+? Try our 7-day trial for free and discover all Premium+ features. After that, you can decide if you want to prolong your subscription or use basic features only.

Should you have any questions, please visit sygic.com/support. We are here for you 7 days a week.
If you like our app, please leave a review or spread the word at sygic.com/love. Thank you for your support.

*Please note that this feature requires an internet connection.
Note: Sharing videos from Dashcam is forbidden by law in these countries: Austria, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Slovakia, Spain.

Note 2: Dashcam, Traffic Sign Recognition, and Real View are part of the new feature SmartCam. SmartCam merge all camera features into one. The SmartCam is a part of our Premium+ subscription.

**Wrong-way driver feature is available in Sygic GPS Navigation for Android, version 22.2. or higher.

More information about features can be find in glossary: https://www.sygic.com/what-is


By installing, copying, or using all or any portion of this software you accept all the terms and conditions of this agreement: https://www.sygic.com/company/eula
summary: Sygic GPS Navigation with 3D offline maps is compatible with Android Auto.

scraped_reviews.content: This app really messed up my Android Auto. It took over 2/3 of the display with an error message telling me to install a "Prime +" feature to fix the problem. The error message would not go away while driving. I had to stop the car to click the Close button, then restart to get rid of it. I uninstalled the app and the error went away. What a mess.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Navigation via Android Auto/CarPlay works only if you previously purchased a paid addon ("Premium for Android Auto" or "Premium for CarPlay") or have an active Premium+ subscription. For help, please contact us at urgentsupport@sygic.com . Thanks! ‚Äì Martin, CC

scraped_reviews.content: They often have server problems. Updates become problematic. Even though the maps can be stored in external storage, the application takes an incredible amount of internal storage. (It takes over 37 GB of internal storage! Why don't they rewrite the app so that it can be installed in external storage?) Since I'm running out of internal storage, I may have to remove it. The maps are obsolete and items are often positioned wrong. I have high speed Internet. It takes over 2 days to update maps!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your constructive feedback. As there are multiple issues mentioned in your review, we would like to ask you to contact us directly at urgentsupport@sygic.com so we can discuss this matter in a greater detail. Thank you! -Martin from Customer Support Team.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been a Waze user for several years but lately I have found it to be unreliable. sometimes the directions take me way out of the way, and other times it takes me to the wrong address completely. I trialed this app to replace Waze, and it worked well during the trial. So, I paid for a year's subscription. After using it for a month I have found major issues with the app. Quite frankly, Waze is much more reliable. I hope the reliability improves because I really like the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are glad that you enjoy our application and based on your rating there is still room for improvement. Please let us know your ideas, suggestions and issues with the application at: urgentsupport@sygic.com . Customer experience is the most important thing for us, looking forward to your feedback. -Martin from Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: I wish I could recommend this app but I just can't. In general, it's okay and good enough to get me to purchase premium, but there are so many basic UX blunders all over the place that have slowly grated on me over time. Please focus on usability, actually listen to your customers (I'm expecting a generic "email us with your concerns" response to this, for example...), use your own app to see how annoying it is day-to-day!! For now, you've lost a customer, unless you really change things up
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry, to hear about your disappointment and understand your concerns. We will work towards finding solution to these issues. Customer experience is the most important thing for us, looking forward for your feedback. -Martin from Customer Care Team

scraped_reviews.content: I already paid don't need your constant notifications about selling me the caravan extension. It's infuriating but not worth 1 star alone. What does is the map quality. I don't drive a lot but already had 4 times when it wanted me to drive onto nonexistent or under construction roads. Then instead of turning off at the next highway exit it wants to take me for a 50 kilometer detour. I like the UI but this just makes it unusable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please accept our most sincere apologies for the situation. Please contact us at urgentsupport@sygic.com so we can help you more efficiently. We listen to our customer and our devs team are working every day to make the app better for our users. Thank you! -Martin from the Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Very nice app. My wife and I like the 'rest stop' feature on our long road trips... Same with the interesting feature about going around turns of different curves... I sort of wish the "continue" button when setting up a new route would autostart after 10 seconds... More than one time I've set up a destination and started driving, only to find the destination and navigation was ended because I was too busy to hit the continue button...

It's nice. I like it. I also like the 3D geometry of the landscape, I wish it could exaggerate that effect. There a lot of hills where I travel. It's smooth, no jitters or freeze ups. Recalculates route quickly. The menu items and text need to be bigger for Android car unit. I need to find an easy way to enter multiple locations. I would like an icon to show posted speed limit, next to live GPS driving speed.

Seems like it might be OK, but shows spam notifications. Ads are one thing (though I really don't like that you get multiple ads when trying to load the app, a big problem when trying to quickly navigate somewhere, especially when driving), but I get enough notifications without getting random ones pestering me to use this app. I'll use it when I need to go somewhere. Or not, since I'm uninstalling, because I'm not paying just to NOT have an app spam me, not to mention running when not in use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry to hear the app's notifications annoy you, feel free to contact us at urgentsupport@sygic.com if you'd like us to do something about it for you. Thank you very much and have a nice day! Simona, Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Ok, but not there yet, especially when there are free options just as good if not better. It put my home address in a different town completely when I added it ü´§. Navigation was as expected from using other systems. Some of the lane guidance was very iffy, especially at some more complex junctions or where there were multiple lanes, and had I not known the route, I would have taken wrong turns, including a train station access road. Is it worth paying for? Not yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are glad that you enjoy our application. Yet based on your rating there is still room for improvement. Please let us know your ideas, suggestions and issues with the application at: urgentsupport@sygic.com . Customer experience is the most important thing for us, looking forward to your feedback. -Martin from Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: One of the worst app experiences I've ever had. When it re-calculates a route, it takes a wildly long time and then never seems to adjust to new circumstances, instead just trying to force an unworkable route no matter where you drive instead. Also, the voice directions update you on the expected time of a delay ahead maybe once a minute? That's far too often and incredibly annoying. It was, for me, a complete failure.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. In this case, please contact the urgent request email urgentsupport@sygic.com so we can analyze the issues further. Thank you! So≈àa, Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: Switching to a subscription model is a killer for me. I paid a full price for the app and a lifetime world licence. Now they want to charge me every year for the app that crashes, leads to wrong locations, and is terrible at searches. There is a better business model: charge a fixed price once, give updates for the app for 1-2 years, after that offer upgrade pricing. Subscription makes you lazy. You can just sit back, reply to reviews with a lot of apologies, and do nothing else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. The new offer removed lifetime licenses and add-ons to eliminate confusion. All our features are now available as a Premium+ subscription. Your lifetime licenses will continue to work without change. The only thing that changes is, if you want new features, you have to subscribe and you‚Äôll get everything the app offers. So≈àa, Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: I used this for personal navigation. I do not drive in a fleet. This app used to work with Android Auto. Now you want to charge me to use in Android Auto. Pass. BTW, when I paid for the app, connectivity to Android Auto was not part of the premium package. You try to make me look cheap? You look cheap. You changed the service. I didn't agree to the change. That's dishonest and fraudulent I want my money back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry, to hear about your disappointment. Please let us know your ideas, suggestions and issues with the application at: urgentsupport@sygic.com . Customer experience is the most important thing for us, looking forward for your feedback. -Martin from Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: It seems like it may be an okay app, if every little piece didn't cost an additional $4, $5, or $6. But that's not the reason that I am deleting the app. It is constantly sending me the reminders to purchase the additional options. I can't find any way to turn the 'reminder' notifications off so I would rather just delete the app and use Google.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Franklin, we're sorry to hear the app's notifications annoy you, feel free to contact us at urgentsupport@sygic.com if you 'd like us to do something about it for you. Thank you very much and have a nice day! Rudolf from the Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Just don't do it... Even if it's the only map your moto nav will work with, it's not worth the frustrating ux or draconian pricing. Pricing from 2010 - "hey, let's find a way to use "Value Add Services" to differentiate pricing tiers - but let's make them things almost no one needs and attach them to actual navigation. Oh, and then, if they switch platforms, we'll charge them to get something already free in app. We can come up with a bunch of confusing names, they'll never know. So much $!"
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback. Your purchased licenses will continue to work without change. The only thing that changes is, that if you want to pay for additional services, you need to subscribe and you‚Äôll get everything the app has currently to offer in the subscription. Michal from Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: Using the trial, didn't have too much issue with routing. Voice directions however - sometimes it's good enough that I never need to look at the screen. Sometimes it's incessant about turns to the point that instructions interrupt my music only to not even finish a sentence while I'm pulling to a stop sign or turning - why not just 'ding' at that point? On one occasion I was reccomended to add a gas waypoint, I chose to try the feature but then couldn't delete waypoint and had to re-input dest.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please accept our most sincere apologies for the situation. Please follow the instruction on this article to fix this issue : https://bit.ly/3LalfvD . If the issue remains, please contact support team by completing Yes-No questionnaire at the end. Thank you! -Martin, Customer Care Team

scraped_reviews.content: DO NOT BUY - I made mistake of paying them the $20 sub fee. Big mistake, in less than a week I realized I made a mistake. App is not seamless and honestly useless within the Android ecosystem. I emailed the developer ( who admits they buy map data, so why such a high price for app Then ??? ) and gave them 4 examples of how their app failed time and time again, they didn't argue, agreed to full refund. This is a money grab app, stay away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry, to hear about your disappointment. We listen to our customer and our devs team are working every day to make the app better for our users. We also handle all customer data in strict accordance with our Privacy Policy. You can review it here https://bit.ly/40dCjd8 . -Martin, Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: If getting lost is your goal, try Sygic. It's specialty seems to be weirdly unnecessarily complicated and inaccurate navigation. My last session was a 9-mile, essentially straight line and it managed to route me along a path of about 13 miles, a lot of it turning the wrong way. Also, it doesn't announce freeway exits by name, only exit number...which is difficult where I am since the exits often don't have marked or easily seen numbers. I expected more from a pay to play app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, could you please provide us with the details of the route? We need to simulate the same conditions, so I need the exact description in format: Country\City\Street, both for starting and destination point. You can send this data to: urgentsupport@sygic.com , and we will make sure to fix it right away. Thank you! -Martin, Customer Care Team

scraped_reviews.content: STAY AWAY! This app is THE WORST MAP APP on Google Play. I'm a paid customer for 3 different products. The app forgets my account, when I log in the account doesn't restore the products I purchased. It asks me for my payment receipts. It's like starting from the beginning every time you open it. they've added new paid services but don't honor the ones previously offered. I've complained but the company doesn't respond. STICK TO GOOGLE MAPS! It's free and you'll be happier. At least you won't lose any money. STAY AWAY
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, our support team will gladly help you restore past purchases. Please contact them at support@sygic.zendesk.com. Thank you. Martin from Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: I have used Sygic for years. I purchased it many years ago. Then it started with the advertisements everytime I started it. I was assured that my previous purchases would be honored when they went to the subscription model. Now, all of a sudden, I can't even use it. It wants me to log in, which I never have, and don't have an account. I have my purchased activation, product code. It seems that there promise wasn't kept for their long time users that purchased activations.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback, our offer has changed from Lifetime to Subscription, but this doesn't mean we changed anything else - you still get the same service you paid for when you purchased Lifetime. Thank you - Simona, Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: I just completed a Cross country road trip. Round trip in fact. West to east coast and back. I actually paid for the app several years ago as it had features helpful to truck driving. decided to try and use it for the aforementioned trip. I say try, because I found myself using the free GPS map we all have more. Sygic was buggy and slow overall. One feature I did enjoy, when it was accurate (about 80%) was the interest icons. Where it would show that attractions, gas, or rest stops were coming.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry, to hear about your disappointment. Please let us know your ideas, suggestions and issues with the application at: urgentsupport@sygic.com . Customer experience is the most important thing for us, looking forward for your feedback. -Martin from Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Purchased and installed on an Android-based headunit in a car for times where there is no cell phone reception. Sygic worked for 1 month... and then it would just stop loading. A couple years after updating to see if it would help, it still doesn't even get past the load screen. Overall this was a waste of money. For the one time I used it just to check the interface out, it was ok at best.
