In a nutshell, only buy this app if you constantly have the latest and greatest Android phone. It sounds like backwards compatibility is non-existent, and even then it's still buggy. I'm going back to a standalone GPS for emergencies. Edit: response to developer comment: Yes, my head unit more than exceeded the minimum requirements: PX30 | 2GB RAM | 16GB ROM | 4-core CPU | Android 10
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We apologize for any inconvenience. If you need help with our application, I would recommend going through our support page and FAQs, car radio and head units - https://bit.ly/2Z7IvWF. Dorota from Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: Recently, that Android auto got support, I paid the addon and gave it a try. I was disappointed by the number of times the application freezes while in Android auto. It happens on every Google assistant navigation search and some times even while just navigating/driving somewhere. Losing your directions while driving is a huge problem for me, so for that, I can't keep using it. BTW, the maps even when updated do not include everything that other maps do. Same with the traffic subscription...

Works ok. It has gas station and parking notifications that pop up on the left side of the screen blocking the map. I have not found any way to turn that option off. Also it does not display next turn coming up with the current turn so you have to guess what lane to get in after you make a turn. That's a big drawback. Other than that its not bad for the price. Update lets you colaps gas station notifications. Thanks! My only other complaint is it shows a double image on the windshield in HU D.

Help!!! Ever since Samsung Car mode got pushed to my phone I can no longer use Sygic while in motion even with certificates up to date (which looks to do in 1 month increments). I use this app every day since moving to Europe. Help!! ...otherwise good app, gets a little wonky in close quarters with tall buildings and could use a little more warning when having to make a turn. Thx
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, our support team will try to help you with any issues you might have regarding the app. Please create a help request via email to: support@sygic.zendesk.com, keep in mind to provide as much relevant information and screenshots if possible, to ensure fastest solution to your issue. Thank you for your understanding. Martin from Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: Maybe the POIs are better in European countries, but for the US they're horribly outdated. For example, restaurants in my neighborhood that have been closed for more than 10 years are still listed. I use navigation apps to locate POIs -- not addresses -- so one star from me. RESPONSE TO DEVELOPER: Okay, great. You can blame it on your map provider, but since you've opted to use their POI information in your app, the one star is justified.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. The issue you have described is caused by the quality of the map data we have received from our map provider. As soon as we would receive new data for this map, we will implement them in the next update.If you have any questions, please contact us at: urgentsupport@sygic.com for support. Thank you. Jaro from Customer Support

scraped_reviews.content: Instant uninstall. When the most basic of functions are behind a pay wall, and there's chance to preview or test those basic functions, it's a no-go, full stop. Another app with undeserved elevated hype. Edit: In response, I've installed a different app that provides basic functions, with only a small, unobtrusive ad banner at the bottom. I will not be needing your app any time soon. What you consider "premium services" are included in a host of other apps at no cost.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, unfortunately, we cannot provide premium services for free, because they're subject to additional licensing fees and also involve considerable development costs. If you would like to activate a free trial please contact us. So≈àa, Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: You can't imagine how incredibly happy I am that I found this Sygic GPS map {I bought the premium version}. There are extremely beautiful views in this system, such as the skies, realistic 3D mountains, and realistic 3D buildings, which is the only reason I wanted this in the first place. The only negative thing about Sygic, is, they have absolutely no customer service whatsoever. So far I sent them two emails explaining how they can improve their app, but they actually blatantly ignored me.

GPS for you vehicle or while walking. I bought the lifetime license. It navigates even "without" internet or phone signal. Map downloads are free as are updates. Download only the states you need. Much more accurate than Google maps and it can be customized. Save favorite destinations. Easy to find fuel, restaurants and more. The "heads up" display option is cool as it lets you see nav info on the inside of your windshield. Both my wife and I have Sygic on our phones. We love it!

Lots of new free add-ons, features & options! Current maps are updated more often than the other Navigation programs that I have tried! The Nav unit in my jeep costs $100+ every 3 mths to have the current maps. Their maps&features compared to Sygic is very poor! I would like to see some of the Truck features available to the regular car version, like height & weight restrictions because, I drive a lifted Hummer H2... and, it's too wide, too tall, & too heavy for some bridges and parking garages

When it loads without an internet connection, I would say that it is the best navigation AP that I have tried, and I have tried a lot. BUT, when the phone is turned off and than restarted or exited, it will not load, rendering it useless. This happens frequently. I know it can be fixed because it has been several times, but then without warning , returns to the need for an internet connection requirement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gerald, we're sorry for any inconvenience. This problem should be solved in the latest version. Please, make sure you have the latest version of the app, if it does not help, please contact urgentsupport@sygic.com and tell us more. Thank you! So≈àa, Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for the full version. Added several modules. Then they activated Android auto functionality. Not only does the screen freeze on the car, they want more money to enable sounds. Let's create a quality product that work properly first. It's difficult to justify spending the money they want for a product that doesn't work. Support is non existent. Both times I've escalated to support, I get a robo email with instructions to clear the app cache, the reboot and reinstall. Not impressed

Very dissapointed trying to navigate this stupid app. Poor layout, map inverts common orientation for no reason. Difficult to navigate through steps in a trip if you're trying to look ahead. Trying to look for a university in search and it literally won't come up in top 5 results, I mean what the heck. Desperate for user to go premium. If you can't even do basic stuff right, why would I give you money. If you're looking for an alternative to Google maps, this isn't it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, if you need help, or if there is something else we can help regarding our application, please contact us at urgentsupport@sygic.com. Keep in mind to provide as much relevant information as possible to ensure the fastest solution to your issue. Michal from Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: They keep asking for money whether you have a license already or not, ok that's understandable they have to eat too, but.. Navi makes you take forbidden left turns, fastest route is not fastest (if you zoom out you can see how stupidly it makes the route when it could go in a straight line), voice direction is retarded - after x miles make a right and then move along the (name of the road you're already on - even though you're going on a new named road), better just delete the "and then" dev.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback, in order to forward the error to the department in charge of the route calculation algorithm, we need specific information from you about the error https://bit.ly/3zbklI8. Our colleagues will then investigate it and use it to update the route calculation algorithm. Dorota from the Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: As a Google maps and Waze user I was COMPLETELY unhappy with this app. It get 2 stars for the visuals but it ends there. In a long road that had been around for 30 years, it was only able to identify 2 street numbers and mine wasn't one. There were literally miles between the 2 given numbers and mine was in the middle of that. Also, I've now lost $5 due to buying an add-on that I can't get any credit for after having an unusable app. Lesson learned and I'll never buy like that again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Bryan, thank you for your feedback. We would like to know why our application did not meet your expectations. Feel free to contact us at: urgentsupport@sygic.com; with more feedback. Thank you in advance. Rudolf from Customer Support Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Before the last update, everything was good. I always opened this whenever I first started my car. Now, things are terrible, making me suspect they are intentionally implemented some kind of problem to make me to buy a subscription model. If I start the app without WIFI, it does NOT get GPS for 5 to 10 min. And whenever I make a turn, this app does not detect my direction and change my direction (rotate the map) a LOT. Sometimes, even while I drive a straight road, it suddenly turn 180 degrees saying I am moving backward. At first, I thought my GPS antenna was a problem, but GPS info states I have strong GPS signals from more than 10 satellites, and all other navigation apps does not make such a problem. I think I should have never updated the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. In this case, please contact the urgent request email urgentsupport@sygic.com. Thank you! So≈àa, Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: Been searching for a Google maps replacement and I thought this might be it. It has everything that you might want in a navigation app. It's fast, accurate and is highly configurable. The only reason I'm not using it is because I can't backup my settings, favorites, etc to anything besides DropBox. I don't have (or want) a DropBox account so I have no way of saving any of my setup. If that ever changes then I'll try again. Otherwise nice app.

The few times I have had to use this, it is wrong. First issue I ran into is many city names are wrong. It shows streets that don't exist. Speeds are pretty much 90% wrong. The only place they have been correct is on the hiway. I have entered addresses and I end up a few blocks away. A lot of addresses I have tried you can't find because it does not know the city name, it uses a subdivision name. Over all very unhappy I bought this. The truck version is slightly better but still has many issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback! Please report map errors you found in Sygic GPS Navigation by following the steps in this article - https://bit.ly/3y4LZaF. We are depending on our map provider and our valuable customers regarding the actuality of the map. Thank you. Simona, Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Used Sygic for long, works well. Years ago paid for a lifetime license with voice navigation, lane guidance, etc. which still work on the original device. However, when I put the app on my new phone and signed in, all the bells and whistles are gone, it's just like the free version. Contacted tech service by email, they said those features have moved into Premium. What good was paying for a lifetime license? Don't pay for extras, just use the free version, because the future isn't guaranteed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we can't offer premium services for free due to licensing fees and development costs. We've transitioned from Lifetime and Premium Lifetime licenses to a Premium+ subscription. You'll still receive support as you did with the Lifetime license. Thanks for understanding. - Martin, Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Not worth the money! The dashboard is cluttered with options I don't use or I don't want to pay extra for. I have a paid version, but the search feature is so much less helpful than the Google free versions. I haven't looked at this for over a year but since it is advertised as being available with android auto I thought I Would look at it again. Nothing is changed. Doesn't work with AA and the dashboard is still cluttered with ads to buy more options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback. Our developers are being notified of the issues which get reported by the users. We will be trying to improve or solve them through one of the future updates. If you need more support please contact: urgentsupport@sygic.com. Thank you for your understanding. Martin from Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded, purchased some add-ons. Add-ons are expensive when not on sale. Feels kind of nickel and dime to me. I found a bundle after I had already purchased one add on that would have been included in the bundle, so I wasted money there. Better bundle options would be preferable. Update - They released a new update that allows you to use Android Auto, which is fantastic, but they want another $50 for that privilege which is a rip off. Google maps and waze does that for free. Minus 2 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, unfortunately, we cannot provide premium services on Android Auto for free, because they're subject to additional licensing fees and also involve considerable development costs. Feel free to ask us any questions you might have at urgentsupport@sygic.com, we'd be happy to answer. Mat√∫≈° from the Customer Care Team.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app. The only thing I would change and I went through settings doesn't look like you can but I think you guys should make a way to remove the navigate now box in the top left-hand corner. Or at the very least keep the navigate now box with a dropdown arrow. That way recents favorites and places of interest don't need take up a portion of the map. I like a full screen display myself and then if I need that box I can just hit the arrow that would be cool

paid 49$ for add on camper mode, where is it? Received order # but no changes to the app. It's a great app so far and I'll change to 5 stars when I get what I paid for. Update. I found the plus sign above vehicle choice, but I hope it does more in the map after inputting the dimensions. Giving it 5 stars for know because of its ease in changing routes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please kindly send us an invoice and a screenshot from the Sygic app Menu ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Information ‚Üí About to urgentsupport@sygic.com, so we can help you further with activating your paid services. Thanks a lot!  - Viktoriya, Customer Care Team

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this program for about 4 years and now. I really like it because it gives you the most incredible terrain view especially on mountain roads where we need offline maps the most.  They have finally gotten the multi-point routing of way points for the rallying we do so I get to pick the exact roads I want to stay on. Cumbersome but if you save your way points as favorites and then add them into the list,  you can even save the whole thing if you click on the I at the bottom.  UPDATE The program has gotten a lot better in the 5 or 6 years I have now owned it. Real Time is awesome and the traffic is getting better. Love it on overseas travel its the bomb!

Well, I bought this app the other day because I was quite impressed with it. I paid for the full lifetime version for the whole world and also purchased all the other extras that came with it, including the HUD, which is pretty cool. I often travel in places around the world where I do not have a data connection, so I have to rely on offline maps. What I like about the Sygic app is that you can actually download maps for entire regions and countries as opposed to only downloading small sectors, which is all you can do with Google maps. However, the app seems to have *one big flaw*, which I consider significant and which is the reason why I‚Äôm only giving three stars. The app does not seem to reroute in offline mode. I tried it out on several routes the other day on the west coast of Canada, and there were a number of times where I took a different route than the app suggested. Unlike Google Maps, which adjusts the road immediately even in offline mode, the Sygic app did not do that. Even after several minutes the app would not reroute. The only way for me to get the app to guide me again was either to drive back to the originally suggested route or cancel the route all together and start over from the point where I‚Äôm at. I hope they will address this issue in a future update.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Martin, we will gladly help you with any issues you might have regarding the application. Please create a help request at: urgentsupport@sygic.com, keep in mind to provide as much relevant information as possible to ensure fastest solution to your issue. Alex from customer care team.

scraped_reviews.content: My biggest frustration is with the menu while using this with Android Auto: I cannot get it off the screen when not navigating to a destination. There's is never a clean screen to look at. I've been using this for years & it lacks the polish that Google has. I have been reinstalling it a few times per year to see if it's improved but unfortunately this paid product still cannot compete with the free ones. It has potential, but it's untapped.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you very much for your feedback. I have forwarded your request to our product specialists and they will discuss it and possibly implement in one of the future updates. Thank you. So≈àa, Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: How am I supposed to know if I want to buy it if I can't try it? I downloaded this for the heads up display. It took forever to download one map and then eventhough it says premium, you can't try the premium features. The total comes to 60 something dollars that you want me to pay for all of the separate licenses but I can't try them first. RIPOFF!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, you can try the features off before buying them, please, contact our support team, they'll be glad to provide you with a trial - urgentsupport@sygic.com. Thank you and have a nice day! Rudolf from Customer Care team.

scraped_reviews.content: This may or may not be a good navigation app. The problem I am having is with the extremely confusing business model which is poorly described on the website.  Apparently I have accidentally purchased Sygic Car Navigation when I should have purchased Sygic (go figure). I paid for the full World+Traffic to be used on "Sygic Car" and cannot figure out if I can use this subscription, which was $24.99, on plain "Sygic".  To make matters worse, it's impossible, or at least extremely difficult, to contact support to see if there is a solution to my problem.  So 2 stars on a confusing, voluminous web site that has a very low information density.   Later: I gave this app 2 stars and I am reducing this to 1 star because it is impossible to get assistance from the company. If all goes well, I suspect you will like this product. If anything goes wrong you donated to the cause if you purchased anything from this company...beware.  Even later: ok, no way to contact company on their website, but it is on the Android Playstore. I will send email to support for help I really want to up the star count.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We apologize, but we are limited to 350 characters in replies to application reviews. Therefore, we would like to ask you to contact us directly at urgentsupport@sygic.com so we can discuss this matter in a greater detail. Jaro from Customer Support Team.

scraped_reviews.content: I have Premium Plus. I like the interface and the turn by turn directions. But I'm very disappointed with the database of business names & locations. I tried searching for a hospital, a gas station, and a restaurant. Sygic couldn't find any of them. When I searched for a store, Sygic "found" a location that closed 6 years ago. I'm in SE Pennsylvania.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your feedback. If you could provide us with specific info I would be able to fill out a report to our map data provider (https://bit.ly/3zbklI8). Once they provide us with the correct map data, we will release the fix. Thank you! So≈àa, Customer Care.

scraped_reviews.content: Ive had this for over a year. It works good, but there are a few bugs in the system. Also, there is missing streets even with the monthly updates. One thing particular is when put on to navigate to in laws house, it takes you out of the way and adds 9 miles to the trip. Wish there was a way to get a better selection of vehicles to use on the maps except for just 3. All and all it is pretty good. Line the 3d buildings that show up when in big city.

I bought a lifetime back in the time. They were adding new features (paid - premium+) - ok. Then, they put Android Auto, which is very BASIC feature in 2024, to this new premium+. I already paid for the app and now should pay for something that is free everywhere else. I did. Mostly because I have had the app for years just to give it a chance. It is a trash, expensive trash. The app never stayed in the navigation mode for more than 2 minutes. It freezes and app crashes. I want my money back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sorry for the situation. We would like to know more about issue. Please follow the steps in the article below and if these do not help, send us a message from the article, following the instructions in the article: bit.ly/3Oz8e1W. Thanks a lot! Mey from the Customer Care Team.

title: Collage Maker | Photo Editor
description: Collage Maker is your go-to photo collage maker and photo frame app in pics art trip. Just select several photos in your photo lab, Collage Maker instantly remix them into cool photo collage. Pick the layout you like, edit picture and decorate it with filters, stickers, texts and much more. AI Photo Enhancer launched! Transform your blurry, damaged or old photos into stunning HD quality with just one tap. Say goodbye to low-quality shots and hello to stunning results! Features: ‚Ä¢ Combine up to 100 photos to create pic collage. ‚Ä¢ 100+ Layouts of frames or grids to choose from! ‚Ä¢ Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from! ‚Ä¢ Add stylish photo frames for love, celebration, and everyday moments. ‚Ä¢ Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage. ‚Ä¢ Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style. ‚Ä¢ Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text. ‚Ä¢ Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram. ‚Ä¢ Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to social apps. üì∑ Side by Side Photos üì∑ Lots of inspirational uses to create side-by-side photos. You can make a before & after SNS cover, create YouTube thumbnails side by side, and even make side-by-side outfit comparison Instagram posts. üñº Grid Photo üñº Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom grid photo size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage. üì∏ Edit Photo üì∏ All-in-one photo editor & photo frame app provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker, photo frames, and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate... üé® Freestyle üé® Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a scrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories. üåü Story Template üåü 100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper‚Ä¶ Have fun with this Insta story maker, share your most memorable moments with friends. üì∑ Multi-fit üì∑ Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose multiple ratios, 1:1, 4:5, 9:16 ratios, etc. Easily post entire photo with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time. About our permissions: Collage Maker asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos/videos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose. Collage Maker is your go-to photo collage maker, photo frame app and photo editor for Instagram and printing. Follow @gridart.app and remember to post with hashtag #gridart on Instagram. Win chances to be featured and get a ton of likes! If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photostudio.feedback@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Collage Maker is your go-to photo collage maker and photo frame app in pics art trip.

Just select several photos in your photo lab, Collage Maker instantly remix them into cool photo collage. Pick the layout you like, edit picture and decorate it with filters, stickers, texts and much more.

AI Photo Enhancer launched! Transform your blurry, damaged or old photos into stunning HD quality with just one tap. Say goodbye to low-quality shots and hello to stunning results!

Features:
‚Ä¢ Combine up to 100 photos to create pic collage.
‚Ä¢ 100+ Layouts of frames or grids to choose from!
‚Ä¢ Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from!
‚Ä¢ Add stylish photo frames for love, celebration, and everyday moments.
‚Ä¢ Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage.
‚Ä¢ Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style.
‚Ä¢ Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text.
‚Ä¢ Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram.
‚Ä¢ Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to social apps.

üì∑ Side by Side Photos üì∑
Lots of inspirational uses to create side-by-side photos. You can make a before & after SNS cover, create YouTube thumbnails side by side, and even make side-by-side outfit comparison Instagram posts.

üñº Grid Photo üñº
Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom grid photo size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.

üì∏ Edit Photo üì∏
All-in-one photo editor & photo frame app provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker, photo frames, and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate...

üé® Freestyle üé®
Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a scrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

üåü Story Template üåü
100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper‚Ä¶ Have fun with this Insta story maker, share your most memorable moments with friends.

üì∑ Multi-fit üì∑
Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose multiple ratios, 1:1, 4:5, 9:16 ratios, etc. Easily post entire photo with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time.

About our permissions:
Collage Maker asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos/videos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

Collage Maker is your go-to photo collage maker, photo frame app and photo editor for Instagram and printing. Follow @gridart.app and remember to post with hashtag #gridart on Instagram. Win chances to be featured and get a ton of likes! If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photostudio.feedback@gmail.com
summary: Pic collage maker & background eraser: 1000+ layout, grid, filter, sticker, text

scraped_reviews.content: ‚òÜBetter than expected‚òÜ I don't like change & had to get a new phone. I didn't know that Instagram stopped its collage app. It was simple & easy & gone. I found this one & made 9 collages. Ads are very short. There's a lot of FREE options. I didn't know there was an icon to zoom in & out until I was done with my last one. It would've been helpful because doing it manually, the photo slips & slides & doesn't stay in its original, upright position. I look forward to getting to know it better.

It's good. Free, does what it's supposed to do, pretty easy to get the hang of, straightforward, dependable. My kind of app üòéüëç I often use it to make a collage of art references if I need to look at several at a time, and it doesn't damage the resolution of the images which is the major plus. Only downside is you can expect some ads, but I get it, you gotta make that bank. The ads don't seem to affect functionality for me at all.

Been great so far. Wish they had better boarders. Everything is VERY kiddie. Great for 10 year olds tho. But I mostly use it for simple photo collages so not a huge issue. Ads aren't too annoying. It's how the app is free so I can't be mad about it. If you really can't handle an ad or two each time you use the app their yearly fee is just $6.57 which is extremely cheap and reasonable.

This app is very user friendly and it does multiple things. I regularly utilize the grid art to arrange multiple photos in one. I also enjoy the options to simply edit one photo. There are more color options, filters, stickers etc. to bring a basic photo to life. I've never had an issue with the app. In fact, I've had people ask me how I take and arrange such beautiful photos on Facebook and I've given kudos to Collage Maker.

Used to be awesome - now it is a major pain! I used to be able to edit a little at a time, take a break to do other stuff and come back to where I left off without the app messing up my work by undoing everything! If I don't stay on the app, everything I was editing is lost! I also used to be able to click on the back arrow and make additional edits AFTER saving but now it just undoes everything!! I now hate this app!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi friend,
So sorry for the trouble. We really need your help to locate the problem. Can you provide us with screen recording information and send it to photostudio.feedback@gmail.com. Thanks a lot in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: I use this app so often! It has minimal ads and plenty of free options. For example, you can save items for free just by watching a single ad. As far as making a collage of any sort, simple or complex, this is the way to go. I look for a review like this before I download. If you're thinking about it, definitely give Collage Maker a try!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Stacy Clark,
Thank you very much for your feedback. We will keep working to bring you an even better experience. ü§©

scraped_reviews.content: Free Features are Fabulous! Super user friendly! Choose your pics, it automatically chooses a layout for you, that you can seriously customize - swap, rotate and edit each photo right there - or even resize each individual part of the collage. You don't have to stick with the one they choose, you have a ton of other options, even some cool shapes and styles, borders and spaces- all customizable - FOR FREE! If you did decide to go Pro, it's only a $1.50 for the month. üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

Update: I realized my issue was editing low resolution photos, not an issue with the app. Obviously, garbage in, garbage out. Should have realized that before. I love this app. The option to add fonts is awesome. I make tons of memes, and this app is what I use 75% of the time. From drawing on pictures, to stitching them together, to writing on them, etc...it does so much. It will continue to be my go-to app for editing and memeing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Josh,
We apologize for this experience. Do you mean that photo quality dropped after updating? May we know the operation you did before the problem happened? We need to know more details to better understand the problem you encountered. Please contact us at collageteam.feedback@gmail.com so that we can resolve the issue. Thank you.
InShot Team

scraped_reviews.content: Freaking obsessed with this app, so far. There are lots of options, and you can watch ads to gain access to pro features instead of having to pay. üôè There are different fonts, filters, stickers, and other photo editing features. Large selection of font colors, you can choose whether otlr not to have a shadow on the text; the sticker selection I'd say is fairly wide. This app makes it easy and almost perfecttt for creating moodboards, and that's why I love it so much. <3 Loving it tons, so far!

I only edited one picture. App works smoothly. No bugs so far. I would give 5 stars but too many ads and it's easy to not understand where the "next/enter" button is. Colors of the app kind of hurt my eyes trying to figure out where the border lines were. ( I was making a collage of photos that were white and the borders were white until I changed the border colors. Personal problem.)

If you need an easy-to-use collage app, this one is it. Yes, there's a free and a paid version. But the app doesn't severely restrict you if you choose to only use the free version. Sure, some designs are locked and you might have to watch some ads after making a design. But the templates are really great and unique on this app. I mainly use it for my daily journal entries and this app helps me put in multiple pictures under one frame, which they offer w multiple colors. I totally recommend it!

Great app! Works well and is fun and easy to create with. Perfect for overly enthusiastic dorks like me who just can't help but melt when seeing many different things that you like on one page... I've gotten into a habit of just making collages of random sh that I happen to find cute. The app allows you to arrange up to 20 images, and to add filters, adjust contrast, saturation etc. Even without paying for extra features there are good enough options for the average user to make something nice.

I absolutely love this app. I used it to help design the cover of my first book and make my Instagram posts for my social media platform. It's easy to use, fast, and offers multiple backgrounds and font colors. I gave it a 4 star because sometimes the pictures are pixilated. Once they're "posted" they may clear up sometimes, but if they dont it sucks to go back and make a new one. Although, if I was looking for perfection I could always use photoshop. But like I said, this is easy and fast.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We really appreciate your nice words and feedback. We would like to know the editing steps you took before posting the photo on ins. Do you apply the filter or do the cropping? This will help us locate the issue and improve our app in the new version. Feel free to contact us at photostudio.feedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is AMAZING and does everything I need for my collage creations. You can change the ratio of the overall size and the app rearranges the photos for you. My favorite part is being to adjust each photo individually if needed, like brightness, contrast, etc. or add an included filter. I can't say enough about this app and best of all, it's free!

This FREE app has a great selection of collage templates to choose from and it is one of the easiest apps of its kind to navigate (verses, for instance, the impossible to use Canva). There are also tons of extras for you to add to your work; stickers, multi-colored texts, variety of fonts and plenty of filters to use to change up the view of your photos. I highly recommend for anyone who wants a simple and totally free way to collage their photos.

This app works okay. I had trouble trying to get the pictures the right size! I was moving the pictures and was never able to get it to fit correctly. It is a very easy app to use and it has it's perks but there could be a little fixing when it comes to using the app. I was able to make a collage and it looks pretty good but for some reason it turned out a little blury :(. If i could insert a picture i would but i almost never shows the entire picture. It's a little frustrating but overall fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Layla,
Thanks so much for your suggestion. We will definitely bring your feedback to the team for future improvements. Any other feedback, feel free to contact us via photostudio.feedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I've only use this app for collages but have so for years. While the ads are annoying I don't use it enough to get the paid version. The good thing is once you're past the ads the app works nicely and plays nicely with Google Photos or your on device gallery. It's very intuitive and is an easy way to make a collage quickly and easily. Other apps I've tried complicate it too much so this is the only one I use now.

For just basic photo collaborations, and minor editing; it's great. Easy to use, simple processing & programming. However, if you're looking to edit photos in more of a major manner; such as, erasing/replacing the initial background scenery or photoshopping- this isn't going to be very successful for your needs. But for the basics, it's exactly what you need.

I've been using this app for a few months and I love it. It works well and does mostly what I need it too. I haven't quite figured out if I can change the ratio for the size of pictures I need manually. Sometimes I have some really odd sizeds photos and need a particular size but have to make do with what is there. On another note the ads are really frequent (Before picking photos, before creating collage, and after getting collage) But I dont really mind since I can quickly close the ad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, really appreciate your feedback. We support ‚ÄúFree" in ‚ÄúCrop‚Äù to manually resize the ratio of your pictures. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at photostudio.feedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Just got it by accident (I thought it was one I'd previously used), and have only used it for one collage but so far I LOVE IT! I have a lot of photo (and video) editing apps/software and was just looking to combine 2pics for Instagram bc they don't make creativity outside of their 1:1 boxüòâ very easy; it not only does that but (from the looks of it) a whole lot more, and in a really easy way! I don't often do "I just got this" reviews - only when I'm very pleasantly surprised. Which I am!

Ok I usually ask my son to do these things for me, picture edits,collages etc. He knows everything Lol!! My patience is too short for some of these apps,I feel like my mother trying to figure them out. I came across this app and HUNNY, I love it!! It's easy to move around in,as well as add/remove pictures and text as well. I'm really like it!! I'm going back to create more collages!!! **Side bar...I can do without the ads,but I get it.

The ads have gotten a lot worse in this app. You have to watch a 5-second ad for every single collage you make. What prompted me to make this review was when the close button on an ad was not even in English (it was Japanese or Chinese) so I had to click the ad (opening another window each time) in many places before I could figure out how to close it. One good thing about this app is you can choose custom dimensions for your collage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi friend,
So sorry for the trouble. About the ads popup, there must be some misunderstanding. We promise InShot Team will NEVER DO THAT EVIL to hurt our users or break Google's policy. If it happens again, you can take a screenshot and contact us at photostudio.feedback@gmail.com. We are glad to help. ü§ù

scraped_reviews.content: It just does what it should do, Easy to use, not too many ads even when its free and gives you enough freedom to arrange your pictures. It's like PowerPoint but without the power hahaha. Fair to say it's close enough to that benchmark, about 70% for me so OK. Keep it up, dev team!

Fantastic Collage Maker!!! Allows for making some fantastic collages. It even allows moving individual pictures to the proper positions within the collage frame before saving. It says it allows up to 100 image collage, I have not tried it yet, the most I have done is about 6 pictures, which comes out really well within a perfect square to be used as a profile picture on certain apps. Highly recommend giving it a try before features are removed on the free version!!!

I've been using the free version of Collage Maker for years and it's hands down the best software to make simple collages with text. The ads are easy to exit out of when working on a collage. If I had funds to spare, I'd upgrade to the paid version immediately.

I loved this app, but now so many warnings and pop ups now. Threats to update pdf and photo retrieval warnings. Takes ages to collage now because of continual clicking back and trying to close off warning screens. If I want to update something, I will, my choice, sick of being told off by an app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Starr Kendell, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. When ads pop up, you can simply tap "‚úñÔ∏è" to close them and proceed with our app. You don't need to install any other apps to continue using ours. We'll keep working to improve the ad experience. Thank you for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: A nice application easy to use. it was my first time, I got my result in 30 min . Normally it took me 1- 1.5 hours. No ads to disturb in between. we can work continuously and properly. no problem I am satisfied with my results. the way I want my photos I got in that way.üòäüôÉüòâ

I've been using this app for years now. My only gripes are that you can't adjust picture *at all* in instasize mode, zoom in to edit, flip or mirror collage templates, or move outside the photo to grab the editing edge for frames/text. However, my biggest gripe is w/ cropping. First it automatically crops for you so you have to readjust. Then if you have to make changes after viewing, you have to start all over, not just make the adjustments. Still love it though. Pls add seamless carousels.

Collage maker is an amazing and user-friendly app! It has so many creative features that make photo editing and collage making super fun and easy. I love the wide variety of templates, stickers, and fonts. The app runs smoothly without any lag, and the layout is simple to use, even for beginners. It‚Äôs perfect for making birthday cards, Instagram posts, stories, and creative designs. Highly recommended for everyone who loves editing

I hate when an app asks me to rate them way before I get to fully explore and then begin to understand the app better. This app is no different. All I'm going to say is after editing my very first collage pictures I was asked right away to rate my experience and although I haven't had the chance to do much I have to admit... so far so good. If my experience changes my mind then I will change my comment, thusly.

Just joined and having a ball I am going to have a lot of fun with family photos, friends, new love, videos, and design creations. Love the app I am excited to create some amazing memories ahead. Great collage app. Easy to use when you have experience with other layout apps. There are a lot of options to choose too. Fantastic job.

Does exactly what I need... combine pics into a collage. It has a bunch of layouts and it's easy to use. You can swap pics, resize, and all that stuff. I've tried other apps but this one is by far the best in terms of ease, cost, and features.

I installed many apps for making collage and templates but remained unsatisfied. This is the best app for making collage, templates and for editing photos. It is so easy to use too. Some template are paid but the free ones are also good. Finally got a perfect app...‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Bubble BD Comics Mangas
description:
Bubble is EVERYTHING for comic book, comic book, and manga fans. Organizing, discovering, and purchasing effortlessly is simply Bubble.

**Bubble does not support reading digital comics, webtoons, or mangatoons**

**Bubble is a free service** for managing your comic book and manga library. It allows you to list your comic books, comic books, or manga, view incomplete series like Star Wars, Dragon Ball, Largo Winch, Asterix, or Fairy Tail in 1 second, receive notifications of upcoming releases, and order them in just two clicks. Thanks to its 9emeart (https://www.bubblebd.com/9emeart) and ComicsBlog (http://www.comicsblog.fr) media, Bubble will also help you keep up with the latest comic book and manga news and discover your next favorites.

- Add hundreds of albums ultra-quickly with multiple uploads (by series) and barcode scanning
- Share your collection or wish list with your friends and family
- Receive personalized release notifications
- Order your albums online (they are packaged with great care)
- Reserve your albums at your bookstore and pick them up in-store (at no extra cost)
- Ultra-responsive customer service: our team responds via chat or email

**Bubble Infinity**: It's all Bubble plus advanced features like advanced management (read/unread, advanced stats), loan management, and much more, all ad-free.

OUR USERS LOVE IT
***** A little gem *****
"No complaints, perfect management app, and I have a feeling new features will expand on it!" by MisTeRmO1
***** Top and essential *****
"No more wondering which volume I'm on when I'm standing in front of a shelf and searching for it unexpectedly! And it's not just comics, there are manga too! Essential" by Sisters
***** A well-designed and effective app *****
"Simple and intuitive to use for an up-to-date list and alerts on new releases, with quick and friendly help when needed via chat, and very quick additions... In short, a well-designed and effective app" by Clash 2324

CONTACT
Advice or questions? We love hearing from you: contact@bubblebd.com

title: League of Comic Geeks
description:
The League of Comic Geeks app makes it easy to stay on top of the hottest new releases and track your ongoing collection or pull list.

With League of Comic Geeks you can:
- Browse recent and upcoming comic book releases, even months out!
- Discover new books with community reviews and discussion
- Catalog your growing comic book collection without limits
- Create and manage a pull list to keep track of your favorites
- Save comics you're missing to your wish list to remember later
- Mark issues read to save your reading progress
- Learn more about thousands of creators and characters
- Search our comic book database containing over 350,000 comics
- Find local comic book stores

The Comic Geeks app will periodically sync with your activity from LeagueofComicGeeks.com and vice-versa when connected to a network.

Stay tuned for new, exciting features and improvements!
descriptionHTML:
The League of Comic Geeks app makes it easy to stay on top of the hottest new releases and track your ongoing collection or pull list.

With League of Comic Geeks you can:
- Browse recent and upcoming comic book releases, even months out!
- Discover new books with community reviews and discussion
- Catalog your growing comic book collection without limits
- Create and manage a pull list to keep track of your favorites
- Save comics you're missing to your wish list to remember later
- Mark issues read to save your reading progress
- Learn more about thousands of creators and characters
- Search our comic book database containing over 350,000 comics
- Find local comic book stores

The Comic Geeks app will periodically sync with your activity from LeagueofComicGeeks.com and vice-versa when connected to a network.

Stay tuned for new, exciting features and improvements!
summary: See the newest comic book releases and manage your comic collection or pull list

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app! My only wish is that they had more Underground Comix listed so I could keep an accurate database of what I own and what I need. Also, I do all my logging in my phone app; when I go to the app on my tablet, my collection doesn't update for a long time. Interesting that they aren't immediately synced. It is also very slow to scroll through a series, it's not very responsive to thumb gestures and the screen doesn't glide after releasing your thumb. But, otherwise great app!

Super useful! üíö It's been a big help since I'm prone to accidentally buying duplicates if I don't keep track, on top of making it so much easier to keep tabs on what all series I'm actively collecting! Extra useful is it helps me track my pulls and can tell me when they come out! Only issue so far is having a comic or variant they don't have catalogued and needing to enter it as a similar one or just not at all. Haven't found how to yet in the app, well bump up rating if I'm just blind. ü•¥
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Abby, missing variants or issues can be submitted through the website through the contribution process. Alternatively, feel free to email me at support@leagueofcomicgeeks.com with what you need added.

scraped_reviews.content: An essential tool for any collector, lapsed fan, or newcomer to comic books. This app is so deep. You want to know the reading order of a series that came out 25 years ago, someone made a list. If you want to see what books are coming out next month, there is a release calendar. If you want to find a local comic shop, you can search the area. This app has helped me catalog my collection, list books I'm looking for, and helps me minimize buying books with overlapping issues. It's great!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: A wonderfully written review. Thank you so much for your support.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best app to track your collection, I appreciate how full featured it is. The feature that allows you to pull comics with a participating shop is very useful. I wish the icon would focus on the orange box with white background & not zoom out to include a blue background, makes it seem dated. I have had a lot of success using the barcode scanner too. My only gripe is that I have some friends who also use this platform and I can't view their collections on the app, only on the website.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I don't control what reviews are placed on Google, so I'm not sure what you're referring to there. You can get your accrued value overall in the Collection Stats (and more if you have a Pro subscription). As for the app icon - what's wrong with it? That's the LOCG logo on a dark blue background.

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app! It lets you do a ton of stuff without requiring any money. I love how it tracks what I own, and what I've read and haven't read. Super useful! Unfortunately in the latest update the barcode scanner seems to be broken, which I use quite a bit for adding new stuff to my collection. Hope it gets fixed soon! Edit: The barcode scanner was fixed shortly after I posted this, I just forgot to update my review. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ryan, the update with the barcode scanner is now available. Let me know if this fixes it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app to catalog, track, and review your comics and new releases! The community is a particularly fun place for discussing topics and getting reccomendations. I have always found it to be an extremely respectful and fun place to engage with others. My only major issue is that I can't bulk edit fields in the "My Details" tab (especially Purchase Store, Price Paid, and Storage Box), and I can't jump to the bottom or middle of long issue lists. It proves rather cumbersome in many instances.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, the website has some additional bulk features via a subscription, but ultimately more will be coming for mobile app users soon. Stay tuned.

scraped_reviews.content: there's a lot of books missing from its database. sometimes, you have to type it in physically rather than using the barcode scanner. it would be cool if there was a way we could upload unknown books to its database. it would be a lot more engaging, and the app would benefit from it. other than that, it has been a great app for cataloging my small, start out collection.. I like that it adds up each book into a total estimation of how much my collection may be, and ads don't bother me at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cody, if we're missing an obscure comic - you can add it via our website. For more info, check out our knowledgebase. Also there are no ads on this mobile app, so I'm not sure what that is referring to.

scraped_reviews.content: Can be glitchy at times & they took away option to mark a comic both read & want. I hope they bring it back in next update because it was helpful when you wanted more than 1 of a comic. Also a lot of comics variants don't have covers. And when you use search it's very picky how you have to type it. Other than a few other minor things this a great app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jodie - you can mark a comic as both read and wanted, that has not been removed.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, while there's always room for improvement. Certain little features, like half-stars, sorting and rating by run or by story arc, or marking/rating a trade automatically marking each of the issues contained, would be nice, and the search function can be a bit finicky for finding the issue or story you actually want, especially with punctuation. Otherwise, it's still easily the best app of its kind, and my preferred way of cataloguing my collection.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hopefully the latest update improved search for you - regardless, we'll keep improving it over time. Thank you for taking the time to send us your suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Been on this app for a minute and it's mostly great! Notifications for pulls would be nice and the search function on the app being mostly worthless make it 4 stars. BUT website access on mobile makes it easy to find the back issues you're trying to add just very annoying having to switch out of the app. Also, I like being able to download a csv of my collection. tl;dr: FOR A FREE APP IT'S PRETTY GREAT but there a few tiny things that are annoying.

Decent App, Major Bugs Though. The barcode scanner is a useful feature, but it only works about 25 percent of the time. It could not scan DC comics TPBs, which is just pitiful. Search function on Android is also very poor and needs serious work. If they could get the app working a bit better that would be great, but for now I recommend using the website instead. It's a lot less buggy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, could you elaborate on your issues with search, etc via support@leagueofcomicgeeks.com? As for the barcode scanning, if we do not have the ISBN/UPC in our database - it cannot find it. With that said, you should via Search. It is an ever-growing library and will eventually meet your expectations.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the website. I also like the app's potential. I just installed it, and whenever I go back (hit the back button/gesture) it stops responding to touch, I need to restart it. I'm sure it's just a bug, but frustrating. Update: got a response very quickly - on a Saturday night - not less, so I'm adding a star. I am indeed on a OnePlus. Hoping this gets fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Seems to be happening with OnePlus users following a recent Android update. I am looking into it for a future update.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been trying to bulk scan comics and no matter what I do, it eventually bugs out and adds a bunch (like 15-20) of incorrect comics (usually from a similar series but wrong number) and trying to remove the incorrect ones also removes the correct ones. Way too finicky/sensitive to be useful. Guess I'll keep looking for an easy way to catalog my comics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Adam - if you're scanning a bunch at a time, this means you are not including the 2nd part of the barcode. The first is the series, the second is the issue/printing. Tap EXT to ensure it only scans with both. Mind you, nothing is added to your comics until you select to add them yourself.

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is pretty good at keeping track of future purchases and release dates. Though it is incredibly frustrating trying to log into my account on the app and my computer. I log into my app without issues, but then logging into the same account on PC tells me the password is incorrect. EDIT: Resolved. Was a password manager issue. Sorry, leaving this here to hopefully help someone who might run into the same issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - it appears you are not logging in with your correct Username and Password on the website. Username is frequently mistaken for Email Address, but it is indeed not the same. With the correct credentials you will have no issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Like the app, but some issue can't be found. After adding most of my collection I have a small stack of big name character issues that can't be found on the app. Superman, Fantastic four, Dr. Strange. Was able to add most of my FF and Superman, though. Odd. Wish there was more entries for short run story arcs or limited series. (I.e. FF v. X-Men #1-4). Overall good app, just can't add my entire collection. Also, wish there was a price guide involved.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - sometimes the naming conventions might make them difficult to find - we do have Fantastic Four vs. the X-Men #1-4, so I would suggest trying shorter searches like Fantastic Four vs. and you'll find it.

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty cool app, albeit sow and buggy. Don't like that it subscribes you to an email listing that you can't unsubscribe from easily. That's very annoying. The "account settings" section doesn't seem to work for me. Not sure why. It would also be great if I could edit tag names without having to do each individually.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - reach out to support@leagueofcomicgeeks.com and I can fix the Account Settings / Email issue for you quickly.

scraped_reviews.content: Great for a free app. However, the app says the barcode scanner needs permission from my camera. I checked camera permissions and Comic Geeks permissions, and it is set correctly. The app still says it needs permission. I un-installed and reinstalled. I turned my phone off and turned it back on. No change.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi David, the update with the barcode scanner is now available. Let me know if this fixes it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly, above and beyond what I wanted out of an app like this. So glad I found it. Just for the sake of transparency, I'd say the only tiny critique I'd have is I wish I could sort searches by year and the barcode scanner doesn't always work for me (but maybe I'm doing it wrong?) But those are so small compared to how much I genuinely love this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the 5-star review! You can sort by date for the Issue Search, but not Series Search. A series can run for many years. With that said, looking to make search more intuitive. With the scanner, select EXT if there's an additional mini barcode. If it still finds nothing, it just means the community has not added the UPC/ISBN yet.

scraped_reviews.content: Really needs an option to get a notification on the day a comic in your subscription is released. I have to set a separate alert in another app and hope the date doesn't change. They do send an email every Tuesday, but that seems slow and bizarre to do. It does tell you if you have the app open, but that defeats the point of notifications. Just a popup on your phone like any other app on release day would be good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Violet - all League of Comic Geeks users receive email alerts every Tuesday if they have pulls along with in-app reminders on their Dashboard.

scraped_reviews.content: Ever since the most recent update, the app struggles and lags then crashes if I scroll and/or click through things too fast. However, I am not going through the app particularly quickly. I didn't actually wanna rate this app low, because prior to the most recent update it was great. But now I have to use it at a snail's pace for it to even be functional for me. EDIT: The app keeps getting worse and worse and it's near unusable at this point. I cannot contact support through the app either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - try the latest update and if needed, delete data from the app in your storage settings before reinstalling.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is almost flawless. It is like a 9.5/10 only down to small details that I'm sure they are working on. The free version of the app is beyond what I want to use it for, but because it's so good, I may go pro just to support them. If you are looking for a comic organizer, value assessor, and release scheduler, look no further. And that is absolutely not where it stops. Enjoy
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the wonderful review! Always improving - stay tuned for the next update with new features and enhancements.

scraped_reviews.content: For the past few months I've been using this app because it's just the thing I wanted to keep track of my read comics. Overall it's fantastic but I do wish the mobile version was caught up with the web version. Edit: Devs replies to my comment asking what features I'd like to see. Well for one on the web you're allowed edit comic information and wait for approval. I also find it odd that you can't subscribe to Pro in the app. You would think out of all places it would be here but nope.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - what particular features would you like to see on the mobile app that are on the web?

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: changed to 5 stars simply because this is the best free app I've seen for comic collectors with excellent features. Old review: Overall, app is great, there are some issues: 1)search function. If I search for "the mighty thor," it is the 21st result in the search, bringing up other series like spiderman. 2)would be helpful to select multiple issues at once & then be able to add to collection - instead of selecting 1 at a time/adding the entire series via "add missing issues to collection."
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - it appears your account does not have a Pro or Patron subscription, but you can upgrade through our website for additional advanced bulk controls. As for the search oddity - it should now be fixed and tighter moving forward. Feel free to let us know of other suggestions by contacting us at support@leagueofcomicgeeks.com

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app but to track your collection closely you really need to also access your desktop. Unfortunately the desktop version is down A LOT. At least a few times a week. The app is really nice and is completely free. I did pay to help support development but you can totally use it without any cost.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - the downtime was limited to the server migration that spanned two weeks. That has been completed as of this weekend. You should not see much, if any, downtime moving forward.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely love the app, but there's one problem I've had with it. Living in the UK, there's versions of books that aren't on the app. Panini Comics have versions that arent on the app. More annoyingly is Hachette Partworks have so many books that I have that arent on the app, even though its just Marvel and DC reprints. I would LOVE a submissions tab that let's you catalogue a book, with ISBN, contents, covers, ect, that can help those outside of the UK
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you've got an international reprint that's not in the database, they can be added via the website relatively easily through the Contributions system.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. I use it multiple times a week and frequently when I'm flipping through back issues. I think a useful option would be to be able to indicate comics ordered but not yet received. This will help users know what to look out for in the mail, and avoid purchasing a duplicate copy of.

Edit, in response to developer: Perhaps update it to actually say that clearly? It still states to 'Tap the contenstant within each round to move them forward'. Original: Some of the features won't work. For example, I'm trying to participate in the bracket for the Absolute event. It doesn't work when I tap the character. then trying to use the Contact Support results in the same issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The deadline to submit your brackets passed when DC KO #1 was released, as is indicated in the app - both at the top and in the challenges list. You won't be able to participate. [Edit: The last sentence in the first paragraph indicates the bracket voting has concluded. The Challenges list also states this deadline.]

scraped_reviews.content: One of the most amazing apps I've ever come across. The library is insane, it's super user friendly and my favorite feature is being able to scan a cover whether I want to add it to my collection or just look up info on it. It's a must-have for comic lovers

Great app for tracking comics, but could be even better if they added the additional post features like text bold and italics etc. also there's no notification option. (Edit: I wanted to give it 3 and half but since there's no option... changing it to 4 now lol)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: 3 stars doesn't sound like you're finding it a "great app", but you can do all of those things in posts. It uses Markdown. **text** for bold and so on. Notifications are currently disabled at the moment, but will be coming back.

scraped_reviews.content: My local comic shop used to use Preview World to coordinate their pulls. I was having to use DC Connect to locate and type up lists manually to request comics. this app has been extremely helpful in making that process easier by being able to print my pull list and bring it into the store for them to order more.
The comic book details NEEDS to have the age ratings for the newer comics that have them. I'm trying to find comics for my son, but it looks like we'll have to go to the store to dig.
Will not ever open. I always have to use the browser version. - it's been like this for the year that ive has the app and it just refuses to open no matter the update.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You should go to your storage settings and completely delete the data for the app. Then, install fresh. It's very likely just that.

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't display all the comics available this week or next. only gives me two, I have no filters set up and everything is up to date. lame
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Go to your settings in the app, then click Complete Resync.

scraped_reviews.content: Great for tracking comics and logging them for your collection. But the app keeps not updating release schedules - showing Marvel having only 3 books next week, which is obviously not right, and the customer service button doesn't actually do anything at all which is pretty funny and irritating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Go to the settings page on the first tab (top right) and select Complete Resync. If that persists, contact support@leagueofcomicgeeks.com

scraped_reviews.content: It's a pretty good app when it comes to tracking what you have or want, but my main issue is when it comes to knowing when something releases.. I wouldn't put too much faith in it. there's been many times when the app has stated the wrong date, and it's pretty annoying tbh.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aaron, for most things the dates are as accurate as possible, as they're straight from distributors. If you find ones that are not, it's more likely the comic was delayed to the distributor or retailer in question. You won't find a more comprehensive and accurate list. This is why publishers and retailers leverage the app.

scraped_reviews.content: love the whole process. can be tedious but there's also fun in going through the older stuff. the app is very functionally handy, love seeing all the individual prices. but im wishing there was a spot to show the total value of my comics, that dopamine hit would be lovely.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joe - leverage the Cover Scanner to make it easier on adding comics to your collection, it's fast! With that said, there are additions like enhanced stats (total value and more) as part of the pro subscription. You can learn more about it on the website.

scraped_reviews.content: Very nice app! Easy to scan your books and have them in order immediately. As well, I'm happy there's a few independent and underground comics not found. Keep the obscure obscure, right? I give it thumbs waaaay up.

This app is incredible. It has room for readers, collectors, trade-waiters, omni bros, digital readers, stores ‚Äî any type of comic fan will find a home here. It has a phenomenal database for the hardcore stats guy. It has a great feed for new and upcoming stuff. If you want more personal recs head to the social feed for reviews, ratings, and generally positive discourse. There's AMAs with top creators in the field and sometimes even giveaways! The dev comes up with new great features constantly

Love this app! So much information! You can catalog your collection, follow your favorite series, create a pull list. Chat with other members. Read reviews. Great app and community. Now that I've used it, I'd hate to not have it. Absolutely recommended.
the app is a wonderful tool to track your collection and know what's comic out next in the comic book world. the tool seems to suffer from some lag and requires me to close it out often.

the most amazing comic book app on the world!!! I will say though, developers, LOCG app developers, PLEASE, next update include more of the features from the website in the app!!! seeing how many people have added issues to their pull lists, simpler navigation around the app (make it identical to the siteü§∑), ability to upgrade to Pro version, etc.

Great app for searching & cataloging comic books, graphic novels, and collected editions. Read, rate & review features & stats. Small, engaged online community that plays well together for the most part. (Very LGBQT+ friendly)

This has got to be one of the best apps I've used for tracking my comic collections, what's coming out soon and even pull the whole series to keep track of things. Really impressive app. Although the search could be a little better as it can be slow at times really. Otherwise, fantastic app. For first timers getting into comic, it can be an app that they can start off with and not feel overwhelmed.

Edit: Seems my concerns were not founded, there is a way to add comics manually via the website. It looks like a very good app, didn't use it that much yet but the features are great. My only problem is that a good part of my collection will never be registered. It would be fun to be able to add comics manually, outside of the database, especially for people who also collect independant comics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, while we have over 350,000 comics, LOCG is community-driven, so if you're finding some independent titles missing you can add them to the database via our website leagueofcomicgeeks.com. It's fairly easy to do.

scraped_reviews.content: An essential tool for collecting that is excellent if used free and dang near perfect if you pay the very, very low monthly subscription. My only note to the devs would be that adding a custom item to pull lists would be amazing, as things aren't always 1:1 with mail in pull lists.
its really good. But trying to pay for the pro version is such a hassle. it seems you can only do it through the website and not the app, because I cannot find anywhere on the app to subscribe.

I love love love this app!! It's the most useful tool out there for anything to do with comics. The only thing i wish was possible was that in the search functions, characters also showed team affiliations and that you could search teams by name. Otherwise..I can't imagine not having this app. I literally use it every day for every I do that's comic related
I love this app as a Comic Book Collector it helps me easily keep track of what I own. An track prices of books I want to buy prices. Highly recommend for Comic collectors.

Almost my favourite comics app! It has a great idea for pulling and tracking new and existing comics, but the experience for adding a new comic to your collection is subpar. I needed an app that would easily allow me scan the barcodes on my comics and TPs but I really did struggle to find that feature! The interface is quite nice, albeit with some dodgy UX when it comes to adding new comics to your collection, but overall a decent app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there - you can scan barcodes on the search tab. Tap the barcode scan icon on the top right.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app! The UI is intuitive, plus the feed's awesome for talking to other people about anything and everything comics related. You can even manage your pulls here. Just an all around awesome app with tons of features for anyone in the hobby of comics. If you're looking for a place to catalogue your comics collection, then this is it!

title: Google Chat
description:
Google Chat is the best way for teams using Workspace to connect, collaborate and get things done.

AI-first messaging & collaboration, transformed by Gemini
‚Ä¢ Stay on top of things with conversation summaries¬†
‚Ä¢ Automatically translate messages across more than 120 languages
‚Ä¢ Find what you‚Äôre looking for with AI-powered search¬†
‚Ä¢ Capture action items so the whole team is on the same page

Everything teams need to stay connected and get work done¬†
‚Ä¢ Start a chat with a colleague, a group or even your whole team¬†
‚Ä¢ Tell your team when you‚Äôre heads-down or ready to connect with personalized status updates
‚Ä¢ Share detailed updates with audio & video messages
‚Ä¢ Connect in real-time, anytime with huddles¬†

The full power of Workspace to transform your teamwork¬†
‚Ä¢ Integrated with Workspace apps like Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Tasks, and Meet
‚Ä¢ Streamline teamwork with smart chips to link files, people and spaces¬†
‚Ä¢ Stay on top of requests, comments and approvals with the Google Drive app for Chat
‚Ä¢ Install powerful, popular Chat apps like PagerDuty, Jira, GitHub, Workday, and many more
‚Ä¢ Build no-code, low-code and pro-code apps with Chat APIs¬†

Secure
‚Ä¢ Protected by Google‚Äôs cloud-native, zero-trust architecture
‚Ä¢ No desktop apps to patch, no data stored on end-user devices¬†
‚Ä¢ Keeps data safe with AI-powered data loss prevention (DLP) plus phishing & malware detection¬†
‚Ä¢ Migrate away from insecure legacy platforms

Chat is included as part of Google Workspace for consumer, education, and business customers.¬†
Some premium features require a paid subscription. To learn more or start a 14-day trial, https://workspace.google.com/pricing.html.¬†

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace¬†
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
