summary: Collaborate seamlessly with Google Chat, part of Google Workspace

scraped_reviews.content: Quite often during video calls the conversation is distorted. My main issue is "read receipts" is not available. I have no way of knowing if and when ny messages are read. That's important for me. Seriously think of moving someplace else. When looking for an answer online, the message pops up, "This answer is locked!!!!! That makes no sense and not at all user friendly.

Such A GREAT APP Google chat is one of the best platforms to interact and enjoy talking with one another, you can change the fonts of your text ,put cool GIF , make meetings in an instant click . And the best of all if you think that no one saw your message in a group chat ,,(you can see ,how many people saw your message) . You only need a person's email to text with them .

It's like they took Hangouts and thought "What if we just made everything a little bit worse" Can only send one photo at a time, chats are indistinguishable from eachother, can't save photos by holding down on them anymore, grouptexts & individual texts are separated (which could be good for some, but it's a pain imo), and you can't even just call or video chat someone anymore. I like the dark mode and @ing features, but that's about it. They tried to fix what wasn't broken.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Leah. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback with us and helping us make the Chat app even better. We'll pass this on to the team. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I mean, if forced to use, ok, but really, the chat kinda sucks! If forcing a replacement, the least it could be is better than what is replaced. For desktop, there's no browser extension and the desktop app is basically just a browser without tabs. What is spaces and why? If this is something for businesses that use Google products, leave it on that side of things. Setting up groups worked perfectly fine. No separate space needed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Google Chat. You can continue your conversations in Chat in Gmail, or in the Chat app. For more information, please visit our help center article here - https://goo.gle/34j6SE5.

scraped_reviews.content: The entire conversation is left justified, instead of my chats on the right and everyone else on the left. Since there's not even individual chat bubbles, it's hard to scroll through and annoying to try to read through the conversation. Also, only being able to attach 1 photo at a time is a waste of my time. Furthermore, the video chat isn't convenient nor is it easy to utilize. Overall, a junk app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Keith. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better.

scraped_reviews.content: It's an adjustment from Hangouts for sure. Chat is clunky in comparison and doesn't work as consistently. I want the option to combine chats and rooms into one page. I just want to see all of my most recent messages at the top of the page regardless of whether it's a "room" or a "chat". And like someone else said, I miss being able to see who has seen the messages.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Debra. We suggest you follow the steps in this article: https://goo.gle/2xEgGEA to fix issues with the app. If you need more support, our community experts can help: goo.gle/3hjjwp5. We hope we helped. Also, we ask that you submit feedback within the Chat app by clicking the Menu button then 'Help & feedback' and tap 'Send Feedback'. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Review would be way better if notifications would always appear, as I've had a few occurrences of them not showing, leaving me unaware of what my friends and peers are messaging. I've also lost access to the ability to send voice messages. I was able to before, and I'm unsure of if it was the last time I updated Chat that it got removed or if it just happened at random. So, yeah, other than that, my experiences with it are very good, otherwise. Thank you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. If you don‚Äôt get Google Chat notifications, we recommend you to check your notification settings. For more information, check out this article: goo.gle/3qgqwa2. Hope to have helped.

scraped_reviews.content: Google is shooting itself in the foot by killing everything that actually worked. Google Chat is a copy-pasted version of Microsoft Teams. Not a single unique thing about it. That would be all well and good if they weren't killing Hangouts to make it! Hangouts was never great, but at least it was meh. Google Chat removed the side separation of chats, doesn't allow you to send more than one image at a time, you can't scroll between images, and in general is not a personal communication app. Bad.

Oh wow, we got rid of hangouts for this? File sharing is a mess and sometimes decides to open an external webpage to load videos (why?). Also uploading pictures is a mess too since it doesn't give the option to choose your preferred file manager or gallery, and it doesn't even work half of the time (you find the picture you want to share, select it, and you return to the chat without the picture you were trying to share). Overall, it's been a mediocre experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Rene. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Google Chat. You can continue your conversations in Chat in Gmail, or in the Chat app. For more information, please visit our help center article here - https://goo.gle/34j6SE5.

scraped_reviews.content: I use Chat on my phones and tablet computers. It's fine, but just last week on the tablet (in portrait mode) it started to display in a side-by-side split screen mode (existing chat contacts on left and messages on right), which I DO NOT like, and there's no way to select it back to its original mode. This is definitely NOT an improvement. Instead of a nice wide view of your message you have to focus on a tight, narrow space while typing and reading.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Tom. We suggest you follow the steps in this article: goo.gle/2xEgGEA to fix issues with the app. If you need more support, our community experts can help: goo.gle/3hjjwp5. We hope we helped.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a huge downgrade from hangouts, and I did not have a choice in the matter. I've been forced out of using hangouts. Using this app is an accessibility nightmare. I can't differentiate between who is talking because everyone is listed on the left, even me. There are no longer bubbles to encapsulate messages to be able to tell where one person's message ends and the next person's begins. There are zero accessibility settings, so I can't change colors or font size or spacing. Awful.

Works, but Hangouts was much better. As other reviewers have said, the lack of left/right chat bubbles isn't helpful. If someone sends a pic and I view it, then close it and re-open, it seems to have to re-download the pic, every time. I also cannot swipe to view previous pics in the chat. Then, it appears to be non-trivial to initiate a voice or video call with someone; but chat-in-gmail has that option right at the top, as did Hangouts. Overall, other posters were right, big step backwards.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jim. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Forced to use this because they blocked hangouts from working. It's worse. You can only attach one image at a time. It seems to struggle with sending/playing videos, but succeeds eventually. It splits chats between groups and individuals in different tabs for added time/clicks to access. There are probably other things, but the above is enough. It is simply worse than the app I am being forced to replace.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Colin. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Chat. You can continue your conversations in Chat in Gmail, or in Chat app. For more information, visit our help center article - https://goo.gle/34j6SE5. Also, follow these steps: goo.gle/2xEgGEA to fix issues with the app. If you need more support, our community experts can help: goo.gle/3hjjwp5.

scraped_reviews.content: Hangouts was better. This chat feature really sucks. The way you send photos sucks. You can only send one at a time. And you can't click on a photo and scroll through what you've already sent. You have to keep scrolling up forever to find it in chat. Not to mention now the text us all on the same side which makes it confusing to figure out who typed what. And your messages muddle together. So when you send 2 messages it looks like one. This app sucks. I would not recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Adrian. We really appreciate you taking the time to give us your opinion and feedback. Please know that we are working hard to add this feature. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I wish I could give it 0 stars. I don't understand why they wanted to change chats into a commercial like app. It's a wannabe Microsoft teams. I don't want to use a platform like that outside of work. Getting rid of the chat bubbles makes reading chats difficult. "history is on" displayed in the type field is very distracting. The stickers are gone. I am livid about this change. There are also no options for customization other than the background color. Thanks for ruining a good thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jill. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Google Chat. You can continue your conversations in Chat in Gmail, or in the Chat app. For more information, please visit our help center article here:  https://goo.gle/34j6SE5. Also, can you please submit a feedback report following the steps from this article: goo.gle/3yq6LjX. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Not a good replacement for Hangouts. If it were a near 1:1 experience, it would be fine, but now everyone's messages are on one side, you can't view pictures that well (thumbnail inadequate, selecting picture opens browser window). Poorly fleshed out, frankly. Microsoft Teams may not be great, but holy cow can they really take it to the users and get feedback. They know what to do. Google doesn't care. Time to find a new chat client.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Timothy. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. We ask that you submit a feedback within the Chat app by clicking the Menu button then 'Help & feedback' and tap 'Send Feedback'. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Inferior in nearly every way to Hangouts. I can't figure out why some of my group chats are under "chats" and some are in "spaces," and am consequently always looking in the wrong one. The app also can't navigate to a Space from a push notification if the last thing you were reading was a Chat, and vice versa. Left-aligning everyone's text in a white background makes it very difficult to scan through conversations. The only improvement is that it seems to compress photos now for quicker sending.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Emily. We suggest you follow the steps in this article: goo.gle/2xEgGEA to fix issues with the app. If you need more support, our community experts can help: goo.gle/3hjjwp5. We'll pass your feedback along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Google Chat is the worst. I can't place my settings to see links in a web browser, I can't see all images in a chat and when I click on it the image is super huge and I can't adjust the size, I can't place more than one image or attachment at a time, I can't video call without creating a "team" or whatever that is. Please quit trying to be like Microsoft Teams or Zoom. It's just so many steps backwards from Hangouts. Bring Hangouts back!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Stephanie. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Compared to Hangouts, we traveled about half the Earth's diameter in distance going backwards. Everything in Hangouts was simple, right in one area and easy to access. Now, everything is everywhere, and not to mention that core functions are missing, it's much slower, I rarely get notifications, and it's 20 times more tedious to use. And the fact that you're forced to switch from Hangouts makes this downgrade a waste of space on your phone. Use something else if you want a good messaging app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great chatting app and is good for the basics but I feel like it could have some improvements. First, the group chats should have more management options like being able to have the space managers timeout people from talking. Second, once you talk to someone, you can't remove them from your list when you press @ in a group chat. Please fix this I keep seeing people I don't want to talk to when I try pinging someone. Last, Google chat takes up a lot of memory. Overall good chatting app.

Zero stars. Forced out of hangouts. Google chat is far less intuitive, infuriating, and extremely glitchy. Only about 20% of the images/files I attempted to send successfully go through. You cannot attach more than one image at a time, the spaces versus chat add extra steps to access your conversations and is clunky. I can no longer see who has viewed the message. Overall, I am beyond disappointed and frustrated with the chat platform and will be transitioning to a different platform asap.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jessica. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Chat. Also, follow these steps: goo.gle/2xEgGEA to fix issues with the app. If you need more support, our community can help: goo.gle/3hjjwp5.

scraped_reviews.content: I honestly liked Hangouts way better than Chat. I sometimes don't get notifications that I have a new message or how many new messages I have. The view of the chat is too simple. I liked how their was a clear separation of messages (my messages on one side, then recipient(s) on the other side). More ability for personalization of the chat would be great.

scraped_reviews.content: I was forced to update 6 hours ago and I've already run into an issue (several times). For some reason, whenever I try to share a screen grab, I have to pick from accounts. Neither account is my main account, and there's no option to add another. I'm pretty lazy with things like this, but due to the frequency with which I use this function, I'm finally considering an alternative messaging app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Meredith. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Google Chat. Also, can you please submit a feedback report following the steps from this article: goo.gle/3yq6LjX. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Not the consumer product to replace Hangouts with. Not enjoyable for business either. Media integration is terrible, you cannot attach multiple pictures in one message. Instead it needs to be one picture at a time which is miserable. Clicking on an image does not allow you to swipe left and right to browse the selection of pictures. You have to back out and click each individual picture. There's no way to tell in named rooms who has actually seen a message which is miserable for business.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Peter. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. We ask that you submit feedback within the Chat app by clicking the Menu button then 'Help & feedback' and tap 'Send Feedback'. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Really annoyed by having to switch to Google Chat. I've used Hangouts since the beginning and I'm going to miss it terribly. Chat is hard to use visually with the left alignment and no clear distinction between different people. Plus the all white (or all black) look is hard on the eyes. The only good news is that it is a separate app from my email, which would have been a damn nightmare!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Dacia. We're sorry to hear that. We will pass this on to the team as we are working hard to make Google Chat better over time. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Nightmare. Why force us to use this instead of hangouts? As if we've time traveled to the 90s. Can't send more than one photo at a time. Then opening an image is like opening a super slow loading webpage in the browser. Hangouts was the perfect mix of instant messaging and text. Chat makes me want to throw my phone into a lake and start sending letters instead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Taylor. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Google Chat. You can continue your conversations in Chat in Gmail, or in the Chat app. For more information, please visit our help center article here - https://goo.gle/34j6SE5. . Also, can you please submit a feedback report following the steps from this article: goo.gle/3yq6LjX. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible, by no means a replacement for hangouts. Not to mention how hard it is to convince people to go to chat when there are so many, better, alternatives. Also the lack of google Fi integration, I'm probably not going to last long in FI either. I know google is a big company, but I hope you lose some customers because of this. Replacing a single app with half a dozen inferior apps.

I mean, it's an okay app. Basic format, really the only thing going for it that makes it different from other free messaging apps is that it's created by Google. However, when compared to what it's trying to replace, Google Hangouts, it's awful. The format is way worse, the notifications don't give you image previews anymore, and it's overall harder to navigate and use. Will probably switch to a different messaging app, as I only used this hoping it would be similar to Hangouts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Maddie. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: It's worse than Google Hangouts. It's frustrating this app is being pushed when Hangouts was much better for the majority of people. Image sharing is not great (only one image at a time), though Chat is better at sending large files like videos. I can't find read receipts. My hangouts groups turned into Spaces, for some reason. All of the texts appear on the same side, including your own (this is a small thing but really bugs me!). I really like the addition of the file sharing tab, however.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Grace. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: It's very hard to share photos. It takes multiple steps to reach photos and then you can select multiple photos. But Chat finally shows only 1 photo! So frustrating! Also, when sharing from photos to Chat, it lists all people & rooms in a very condensed list. Very frustrating to select there. Can't believe how bad the Chat UX is compared to Hangout.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Abhimanyu. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. We ask that you submit a feedback within the Chat app by clicking the Menu button then 'Help & feedback' and tap 'Send Feedback'. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: App is fine, platform is not. As a direct messaging system, it's minimal. Read receipts are hard to understand and give you no extra information like when a message was read. And groups/rooms are a mess. There is no moderation, so you can't delete a member's bad or off-topic post. The best you can do is scrap the room and start over. Threads have little purpose and can't be pinned or reordered or titled. On the positive side, I like the Drive and Meet integration.

I had to switch from Google Hangouts to Google Chat. I wish I hadn't. It seems like Google just doesn't know how to make good software anymore. This app has fewer features than what it replaced. It's like Google Chat is a D student just doing the bare minimum to pass high school, not really caring about how they present themselves. You can't share or view multiple photos. You can't customize the look and feel of the app with different colors and themes. There are no chat bubbles with the left/right presentation normal in all other chat applications. There are no stickers. The desktop app on Windows is riddled with annoying bugs, like when you have multiple unread messages and unlock your computer, it plays notification sounds all at once, blasting your eardrums if you have your speakers on. Not to mention that it doesn't even flash the taskbar when you get a message so you barely notice it if you're not paying attention. It doesn't even have a dark mode. It's really just completely pathetic and makes me want to quit using Google products all together.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jeff. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. We ask that you submit a feedback within the Chat app by clicking the Menu button then 'Help & feedback' and tap 'Send Feedback'. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Hey, it's ANOTHER Google chat product that will get cancelled in a year or two. Make up your mind about which app you want me to use. Notifications are unreliable, leading me to miss messages. The suggestion to other people bringing this up is that you can get an email if a message is unread for 12 hours. If the message didn't need to be read within 12 hours, it could have just been an email in the first place. "Terrible app" is a trending review tag, lol
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Philip. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: At first I like using Google Chat, but the more I use it in comparison to other messaging and voice apps, the more I dislike Google Chat. I mean, when picking up a call request, I have to click too many buttons to confirm that I really really want to join a conversation. Not to mention that it doesn't remember my choice to use the speaker volume, and in most cases I'd missed calls because the default sound is very soft. Google Chat wouldn't be my first choice for voice chat.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Quoc. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: They made 2 upgrades, a dark mode and a search function. Every single other aspect of this app is a major downgrade from Hangouts... and now we're being forced to switch. This is so bad, I'm about to switch to basic phone texting. It's noticably slower than all other messaging apps I've used; it's formatting is trash and hard to look at even in dark mode (no bubbles, bad spacing, no left/ right justification for conversation organization); plus it's inconvenient for uploading (1 at a time only).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Cynar. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback with us and helping us make the Chat app even better! We'll pass this on to the team. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Going back to Hangouts until we can have more control over the notifications. I don't need my phone to vibrate with every message. EDIT: Responding to developer below. There's no options to modify notifications in either the Android Application setting, or the Setting in the Google Chat app itself. You can only turn them on or off. I'm on a Google Pixel 2 phone ironically. Also, your link is not clickable, and typing it in just takes me to the Google search page.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Josh. You can customize notifications within the product you use, such as Google Chat or Gmail. You can set up email reminders for messages you haven't read in more than 12 hours. Click here to learn more: goo.gle/3l91t6I. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: hangouts was by far better. it may have been a little slower, but it far outpreformed this app in almost every way. i think if the switch wasnt mandatory, i wouldnt even have much of a problem with this app, but the fact we have to downgrade to this drops it down quite a bit. the notifications dont always work, it feels clunkier despite the more "modern" look, and do NOT even get me started on what happened to calls. it doesnt even open on my older devices. i choose hangouts over this any day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback with us and helping us make the Chat app even better. We'll pass this on to the team. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the update, it's nice being able to edit my messages. I swear me and my friends live on this app, it's all we use to text each other lol. The only thing I would love to have added is to delete messages that you don't want the other person to see. Especially if you accidentally send a message meant for another person (totally not speaking from past experiences). But def download if you're looking for a good way to text you're friends, it's super cool.

Someone was mad at me for missing notifications so I checked my settings and found my mobile push notification were turned off, which I wouldn't have done. I turned them on and waited. The next day I log back in and find I once again had messages I wasn't notified about. Yeah this happened with the occasional message in hangouts, but this is beyond. We're switching to a different chat.

This app sucks compared to the previous Hangouts version. You can only send one picture at a time and you can not download pictures directly from the app. You have to send it through your email first. I also do not like that you have to send a link for video chat unlike hangout where you can just video chat with a click of a button. This app makes communication more difficult. We are looking for an alternative now. We miss hangouts. üò¢
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Crystal. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We're sorry to hear that. We'll pass this along to the team so they can review and make the Chat app even better. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Was pushed here from Hangouts by Google, but this app is much worse than Hangouts! It's more cumbersome to use, you can only send one photo at a time, and you can't call someone or video chat directly from the app. You have to set up a link to a Chat and invite the person to join. It's totally unnecessary if you are just trying to call or video chat with one person. It turns what used to be an instantaneous thing into a multi-step process. Super disappointed in this change, Google. Do better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Christine. Apologies - we don't yet have ringing / calling available, but it is coming to the Chat app in Q4. For now, you can share a meet link to start a video call.

scraped_reviews.content: This app ...works?? You can send messages but can only send pictures one at a time. Also to view the app on my phone (lg G8 thin Q) it requires me to set a lock code and fingerprint. I don't have sensitive information shared on this app but there is no way to change this setting that I can find. I say use it if you have too, don't if you have a choice.

I have never written a review for an app, that I can recall. This app is a worse version of what it replaced. It's honestly like they took a step back in time. Features missing that the old app had are gone (video calls now routed through another app is a waste of time), no more archiving of chats that you can easily retrieve if needed, no more ability to see when a user saw your message (just that they have or haven't), etc. This app was a solution looking for a problem. Poor decision, Google.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Brad. Appreciate you taking out time to send your valuable feedback our way. We're always looking for ways to make the app more useful and your feedback is super helpful. Can you please submit feedback report following the steps from this article: goo.gle/3yq6LjX. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible! Terrible! Terrible! Forced to download this app with the elimination of Hangouts. After agreeing to switch I couldn't even open the chats! This app is terrible. Notifications don't work. I literally have a message I can see unread on my computer but still no phone app notification. I've changed all the settings, restarted my phone and nothing. These bugs need to be fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jessica. Classic Hangouts is being replaced by Chat. You can continue your conversations in Chat in Gmail, or in the Chat app. For more information, visit - https://goo.gle/34j6SE5. scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for over 10 years for all of the various versions of it. The latest update does not work. It crashes as soon as it tries to open. I have tried it three times because I have let my phone update to the newest version three times, and it immediately starts crashing on my OnePlus Nord N10. I have had to download and install an older version from the beginning of March. ETA: I already did all of those steps, Developers. None of them made the slightest bit of difference.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Katie! We suggest you follow the steps in this article: goo.gle/2xEgGEA to fix issues with the app. If you need more support, our community experts can help: goo.gle/3hjjwp5. We hope we helped.

scraped_reviews.content: Google owes me nothing for this free app. That being said, it is disappointing. As far as I can tell, there is no way to ask Google Assistant to send a chat. Google Assistant ALWAYS tries to send a text message. This is a problem when driving. How is this not the default integration? You cannot select multiple pictures at a time. There is also no Chrome extension so I cannot be auto signed in on each Chrome browser that I am logged into. I still have to use the Hangouts extension. It's a basic chat app with similar functionality to Messages. Compare that to Hangouts which was a full functional communication application. Hangouts was easy to start a group call or video call. Hangouts was fully featured. I got iPhone users to use Hangouts... IPHONE USERS. As a chat program... it's fairly basic. Compared to Hangouts... it's sad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Cary. Apologies, we have no plans to build a chrome extension for Google Chat at this time. But we are exploring ways to improve interactions between Chat in Gmail with the Chat PWA app, similar to how Hangouts in Gmail interacted with the chrome extension.

scraped_reviews.content: This app repeatedly fails to notify me when receiving messages. There are few options to increase the amount of notifications or type (for example, having repeat notifications after a certain amount of time or notifications for each message). But more to the point, it often doesn't notify at all until minutes to hours after the message arrives (this after hours of going through support articles and my own phone settings). For communicating with other people this app is unreliable at best.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi again, Alexa. In that case, if it continues to occur after following the recommended steps, we suggest visiting our Help Center (goo.gle/2Sr1o47) or visit our Community Forum (goo.gle/3hjjwp5).

scraped_reviews.content: This app is unable to authenticate on a brand new tablet. Didn't have a problem putting it on my phone. The PC version is annoying with everything that pops up with an accidental mouse over. The side expanding chat list, even collapsed, will still expand itself nearly half way over the text box whilst typing is going on. At least warn us that you're dumping a beta on us before you decide to push it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Make sure your device is running Android 5.0+ and give these basic troubleshooting steps a try: https://goo.gle/2kYVczo. We ask that you submit feedback within the Chat app by clicking the Menu button then 'Help & feedback' and tap 'Send Feedback'. Hope it helps.

scraped_reviews.content: No feature to delete a message if you accidentally send something. It is also hard to add a reaction to a post and you cannot reply directly to a post. It feels very basic compared to FB messenger. It's getting worse. Messages and images have not been sending on Wifi and data. I even restarted my phone multiple times. Downgraded to 2 stars. 7/14 Update. I reviewed the steps in the link. None of these are the issue for me.

scraped_reviews.content: This app isn't great. I really miss hangouts. I struggle to save a photo that family sends me 'cause half the time clicking on the image doesn't work for it to load to another page to then save. It's also hard to differentiate who sent what if there's multiple people in the chat 'cause it's all lined to the left. Very disappointing. It's also hard on the eyes. I miss the green. Everything is too bright. This is so disappointing. it also doesn't have the face call anymore. Bring back the old app!

title: Height Increase Workout

This science-based app provides effective height increase exercises, diet plans and height-increasing tips. You can maximize your height naturally at home and get a better body shape in weeks! For Everyone - Male & Female - Teens & Adults Increase Height Workout - All workouts are designed by professionals - Easy-to-understand animation and video guidance - Effective stretching exercise, yoga, aerobic exercise, etc - Fast workout, just 8-14 minutes a day Diet Plan - Daily diet plan aims to up your chances to maximize your height - Recommend different nutrient-rich foods (calcium, protein, vitamins) for height growth Height Increase Tip - Useful tips to help you achieve your goal faster - Tips on food, exercise, posture, dressing, etc Sleep Tracker for Height Growth - Set target sleep duration to get enough sleep - Record your daily sleep time - Track your sleep in graph Features - Height increase for Teens & Adults - Effective and scientific height growth workouts - Nutrition suggestions - Height increase tips about growing taller in the best way - Witness your progress in weeks - Customize your own workout plan - Track your sleep in graphs - Easily exercise at home or anywhere, anytime - Set a daily reminder to motivate you to exercise Workout at Home It's possible to increase height with the proven taller exercise. title: Canva: AI Photo & Video Editor
description: Canva is your free photo editor, logo maker, collage maker, and video editor in one editing app! Design digital art faster with powerful magic AI tools built-in, like the AI image generator that allows you to transform text to image in just a few minutes Make stunning social media posts and reels, presentations or flyers, create logos, CVs, photo collages and video collages from customizable templates. Edit photos & design anything with the AI art generatorüñåÔ∏è: Video editor, collage maker, meme maker, CV maker & logo maker ‚Äì Canva is a simple & easy content creation app for anyone! üé® Canva features: AI art generator, photo editor and video maker ‚Ä¢ Facebook posts, Instagram layout designs, banner maker, Instagram post-maker & Instagram reels maker. ‚Ä¢ Professional invitation maker, flyers & resume templates. ‚Ä¢ Display data with templates, presentations & slideshow maker. AI EDITING APP üì∑ ‚Äì free, no ads, no watermarks ‚Ä¢ Image editor to crop, flip, & edit photos. Background eraser and blur editor. ‚Ä¢ Picture editor to adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, etc. ‚Ä¢ Auto Focus to sharpen photo subject & blur background. ‚Ä¢ Add text to photos in the picture editor. ‚Ä¢ Use the photo grid, photo filters, photo layout & photo collage maker to create digital art. AI VIDEO EDITOR üé• ‚Äì create videos in a few taps ‚Ä¢ Produce professional videos in the video editor with 5GB of cloud storage and real time collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Explore video layout & audio tracks in the video maker. ‚Ä¢ Crop, resize, and flip videos & images in the video editor. ‚Ä¢ Easy video editing: Make images move with one-tap animations & page transitions in the video maker. ‚Ä¢ Apply effects like slow motion and reverse playback, add subtitles to a video collage, or a new background to your green screen video. ‚Ä¢ Magically sync edits to music with Beat Sync, for quick video editing ‚Ä¢ Automatically translate captions to over 100 languages ‚Ä¢ Add your favorite music tracks via Popular music* (regional restrictions apply) SOCIAL MEDIA üì± ‚Äì make and match trendy content & graphic designs ‚Ä¢ Design for Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, YouTube or LinkedIn. ‚Ä¢ Plan posts with Scheduler [Canva Pro]. ‚Ä¢ Use our banner maker for thumbnails & ads. ‚Ä¢ Collage maker, picture editor & video maker to create photo grids & collages. FREE CONTENT LIBRARY ‚Äì over 2M+ assets ‚Ä¢ 2M+ royalty-free images & photo filters ‚Ä¢ Thousands of watermark-free videos to use in the video editor ‚Ä¢ 25K+ pre-licensed audio & music tracks ‚Ä¢ Add text on pictures in the photo editor with 500+ fonts & effects ‚Ä¢ Or create your own images with our magic Text to Image tool AI MAGIC BUILT-IN ‚ú® ‚Äì Bringing magic and ease of use to your designs We‚Äôve supercharged design across the Visual Suite with incredible magical AI-powered capabilities. Including; ‚Ä¢ Magic Design - Upload an image and let Canva make designs for you ‚Ä¢ Magic Edit - Swap, or add anything to your existing images ‚Ä¢ Translate - Automatically translate designs in 100+ languages ‚Ä¢ Magic Eraser - Remove objects from any image. CANVA PRO ‚Äì The editing app to boost your graphic design ‚Ä¢ Access premium templates, images, videos, logo maker, audio & graphic design elements + create stunning videos in the video editor ‚Ä¢ One-click Background Remover & Magic Resize for photos and videos ‚Ä¢ Brand Hub - Create logos with the logo maker, fonts, & colors ‚Ä¢ Schedule posts for Instagram & Facebook GRAPHIC DESIGN FOR EVERYONE üé® ‚Ä¢ Personal - Layout designs for Instagram templates, resumes, photo editor, photo collages, logo maker, video editor, etc. ‚Ä¢ Entrepreneurs - Grow your business with our logo maker, video editor, poster maker & Magic Presentations. ‚Ä¢ Students & teachers - Engage with presentations & worksheets ‚Ä¢ Social Media Managers & Content Creators - Use the photo editor, logo maker, collage maker & video editor for brand visuals & mood boards

scraped_reviews.content: I'm absolutely flabbergasted by the poor interface of this app. Much of it is unintuitive but even when you figure things out they make no sense. Even word processing apps work with shapes and objects better than canva. I got a subscription because i liked the templates but if you want to do anything your own you're out of luck. I've been a graphic designer for 20 years and this app is one of the worst.

scraped_reviews.userName: She Walks It, She Talks It!
scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy Canva and creating milestones within the app. What I do not like, is that canva used to be super mobile friendly--now its not. The amazing tools that you used to be able to do with the swipe of a finger, is either gone or is now better to do on a computer with a mouse. It's now cumbersome to edit, align, pinch in/out or stack text; so for a business owner, its majorly annoying. Please fix it.

Downloads great on the phone but the app preforms terrible(scrolls to page 1 at random times, freezes, etc.). Download is terrible on the computer but preforms great with no issues. 3 stars because this was not always a problem. Work flow is interrupted constantly when on the phone and on the go. I have to back out of designs and come back in to make the next edit, sometimes even restart the app.

I'm so incredibly disappointed. I'm a pro subscriber and I've used Canva for over a year almost daily. I've made hundreds of designs. The latest update has completely changed the way Canva works. SO SO SLOW!!!!!! Crashes constantly, freezes, the video editing (which I use extensively) is basically unusable unless I use my old files and make copies so I don't use the new interface. I've contacted customer service but almost nothing has resolved. I'm so close to canceling my pro subscription.

They purposely hide their trial subscription from your phone and Rocket Money. I just had to buy winter clothes, earlier than expected, and don't have any extra money for the week, cancelled everything I had coming up from my Google account, but guess what? Canva wasn't on that list. So when things are tight I get charged out of the blue, because I had forgotten about wanting to try out the app and it doesn't report to the play store. It isn't like I manually entered my card...

needlessly complicated. outperformed by a generic app called "photo editor" but sadly that superior app has been removed. Y'all really be doing way too much. all we wanted was a simple app that let us apply filters and overlays and text additions with a user friendly format. THIS? This is a nightmare. from what I hear it technically has these functions but I have yet to find them. edit to add: they really locked the most basic photo editing function behind a paywall. like I said. too much.

The last few updates to Canva have made it progressively buggier. Now when I try to do something as simple as make the font size larger it will freeze for a moment and after that the only thing it will let me do is delete or add letters until I close the app and restart it. This happens every time and it's extremely frustrating especially since I pay for the premium version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi M, thanks for reaching out to Canva. Sorry to hear you're having troubles accessing and using the app. We're aware of an issue that's currently affecting some of our users and our engineers are already investigating the issue. For further concerns, reach us at canva.me/android. Kind regards.- Cynch

scraped_reviews.content: so I made my one business cards with canva (free version). then I proceeded to pay them to print then for me. (I made a mistake) told them about it 2 days later when I realized. they proceeded to redo the cards for free even though it was (my mistake) then they shipped both sets of business cards. I mean...if that isn't customer service I don't know what is. I will continue to only use them. high quality print as well.

Has saved my life with instant birthday cards and flyers to print asap. Love the app once you learn how everything works compared to the online version. this one is compact, so looking for things in their usual place can take some time, but worth it. Sometimes, loading can be slow depending on what you're working on, but I've never had any big issues.

The font is squished down, one of the photos is showing up narrow. Please don't tell me to clear the cache or reset the app. Been there and done that!!!! Canva has always been my go to app for my thumbnails. This is absolutely frrustrating and ridiculous, it needs a major fixing!!!!

It's gonna save a lot of people out there....

I really love this app, I print alot & make posters invitations etc, I like that you can make something from scratch or a template already on the app & can customize every bit of detail to your liking. I think $15 is a bit drastic for the app though so if you can do the free trial and create as much as possible that's what I'd do then go back to the free version.

Absolutely trash navigation of a project. Can't scroll side to side, can't rotate to landscape without using an app that forced every app to rotate. Can't turn off bold or italics or underline and make a punctuation mark or it reactivate. Can't scroll left or right on a text box. Can't scroll all the way left or right on the project slide. EDIT: Devs reached out and that alone is worth raising my review. I'll be keeping an eye on this. Canva as a service is a fantastic piece of software on PC.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for reaching out to Canva. We're sorry for the inconvenience you have when editing your designs. Please check these links for more info: bit.ly/3bQJ4uG and bit.ly/3DLAfge. Keep your app updated to enjoy its full features and improvements. For concerns, reach us at canva.me/android. Regards. - Lily

scraped_reviews.content: Good great app for graphics and video. I will rate this app 5 star if text have solid color just like elements. I want to be able to give my text two or more different colors.. the team should make it possible for one to use two or even all the text effects on a text at once. I notice that if I apply stroke effect to my text, I will no longer be able to apply Shadow effect unless I deactivate the stroke effect. same thing applies to elements and images. consider in your next update please ü•∫
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, thanks for the feedback and for using Canva. Make your text pop, and add more impact to your designs using text effects. Please refer to this link for more info: bit.ly/3xIekDn. Kindly update your app to enjoy its full features and improvements. For concerns, let us know at canva.me/android. Regards. - Lily

scraped_reviews.content: The new user interface is way more complicated. Older one was easy to use, user friendly. Even after having full internet connection, app says no internet, it starts to hang. I have to close and open the app minimum 2 times, every time I create something. Problem persists even if I am free or paid user, I have tried both. Earlier it was way better.

I love using Canva! Although it is my go-to for any visual presentation including videos, flyers, and posters, I do have one small issue with it: sometimes when I try to give it too much information or too many instructions in a single sitting, it freezes up slightly, so that the only way to fix it is to close the app entirely and then reopen it.

Canva is a very good all-in application, especially for someone who is running a small business and doesn't have the budget to hire a professional designer. Yet lately the app has been extremely slow! I'm using a phone that was released a year ago, so it shouldn't be a device problem, nor a service problem since my other apps are running just fine. Yesterday, it took me 6 hours to edit 6 pages. 6 HOURS!!!! Very appalling! It's so hard to simply move a text. Please fix this asap.

I always loved this app, and everything about it. The look, the easy use interface and the speed in which it allows team members to work on one project simultaneously LIVE. But there are now so many bugs and crashes that I HATE the thought of using it. I have to close and reopen it every 6 minutes because it wont allow me to select a thing! Can't even zoom in or out. It freezes. TERRIBLE. THEYVE RUINED THE ENJOYMENT OF DESIGN.

The app is great, and I had an amazing experience using it. But lately, the app had been having a lot of bugs and took a long time to load even though my network and phone were working just fine. Sometimes, it even crashed when I was using it. Thankfully, it always saves my progress just in time, so none of my work ever disappears. It is just very annoying and a big inconvenience when I'm doing something very important and urgent. Please fix it. Thank you.

Great app, easy to use, though it differs when editing on a mobile phone. One major problem is when I select a few words to copy, but then it glitches out and goes everywhere except the chosen words. This has made transferring certain chunks of text from one page to another quite hard, needing to instead copy the entire text box and paste it on the desired spot, then making adjustments to your liking. Besides that, highly recommended

Canva has been a great and easy functional place for me to design personal projects! There are lots of options to choose from when creating, which I really appreciate. Their printed products turn out very nicely, and the delivery is quick and smooth. I would definitely recommend using this platform, whether it's for schoolwork, a business, or just personal creations! Thank you, Canva!

needs improvement, add a non printable grid, a snap on off, no pop-ups to print and purchase on paid subscription, super annoying, if I want that I'll select that but I don't want that popping up every time I use my app. also features come and go, one minute the features and menu are at the top of each sheet, next they are nowhere to be seen and there's a completely different menu on the bottom. stop changing the access to the editing features and lock and unlock.

Hi! I'm experiencing the same issues as many others. I was recently charged P 949 even though I don't have an active subscription. I signed up for a 3 days free trial and without any notice, you automatically deducted from my account. I'm kindly asking for a refund, but always declined. Please give me some consideration. I badly needed the money for my school expenses. I am requesting a full refund for the amount. I was not aware of this auto deduct subscription.

Absolutely horrible, a waste of time, and unusable. When I'm trying to edit a video, not only is progress somehow not carrying over between phone and iPad (iPad only gets the preview picture and overlays), but when it FINALLY lets me save it to my Google Drive, the video is completely white(except for the overlay again). I've spent 2 hours trying to get this video to work for a project due tomorrow, and I'd be better off engraving the video on rocks and bringing them to class.

Good for ppt and printing but despite my device in optimal condition, it's just so buggy. One time I wanted to resize an element, can't zoom in on my ppt anymore and need to restart. Sometimes, it just freezes. And despite my stable network speed, it takes too long to load and even freezes up when I just tap at something. And I know that when putting too many elements, it's bound to slow down, but when I haven't put anything on it yet or not that many?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mary, thank you for reaching out to Canva. We're sorry for the inconvenience. The issue that has affected some of our users from performing tasks like uploads, downloading designs, etc., has been resolved. Update the app and if the error persists, reach us at canva.me/android. - Dan

scraped_reviews.content: Has changed way too much it used to be simple and now it's complicated way too complicated for me, I went to make something tonight, wanted to add text to it but it kept saying the page is locked.. Ugh how do you unlock it there is no icon or anything.. I will not pay $120 a year for something that is no longer simple, I will be cancelling my subscription and not renewing it

I pay for Pro, it used to be fantastic, but it's really gone down hill over the past few years. Text jumps out of the text boxes onces placed, the cursor moves to the second to last letter when typing for no reason, parts of text went missing when downloading a presentation as a video. In all, it's pretty poor now, which is a real shame. I won't be renewing next month
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jay, thanks for using Canva. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by an issue affecting some users' ability to upload or download designs. This issue is now resolved. If the error continues, please report it at canva.me/android, and ensure your app is updated. - Mira

scraped_reviews.content: I had an issue with my account and was quite worried at first, but Canva‚Äôs customer service really impressed me! They replied to my email very quickly, explained everything clearly, and handled the situation in such a professional and kind way. Even though I had a problem, their fast response and genuine support made the whole experience so much better. Truly one of the best customer service teams I‚Äôve ever dealt with!

I love how it is easy to edit videos now thanks to the new update. I can now add the overlay on all pages without having it limited to one page only. What I don't like is the automated captions since I cannot edit the duration esp if I need to correct a text, I also cannot apply the edit to all pages when I edit the format of the captions. AND PLEASE if you see this please create a fillable pdf feature so I don't need to use other tools. Thank you! üíó

I used to absolutely love canva, but now idk what happened that they made the worst update in it. Now everything in a frame of a video is a different element, which means if you increase the duration of the actual frame, the elements' time doesn't increase. Nor I can select them all and extend them simultaneously. Further the elements of different frames get overlapped while extending one frame.

Canva is an amazing website that works and is amazing for presentations and school work. However, you have to pay to get premium features, which means you have to pay for MOST of the stuff on Canva, which is annoying. It says you can try it for free for 30 days, but it has now gone down to 14 days. What a rip - off. We don't want to pay just to get these stupid little features so we can make posters look better. If you want more people to use your app, make everything free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Paige, thank you for your feedback and for reaching out to Canva. The app is free to install, you only pay when you subscribe or use premium elements in your designs. Keep your app updated for more amazing features and free elements that you can use in your designs. Send us your concerns at canva.me/android. Regards. - Cynch

scraped_reviews.content: I cannot put into word into how much I loath this app so much, I use it for my school projects and the amount of times I have to restart a project just because ts can't save properly, I have to redo a whole research paper just because it didn't save. and don't get me started on the laggines of this app, I can't even zoom it properly without it lagging, and it's not the device's problem either since it was just brand new. do better

I'm rating here in appstore when I'm using my laptop with this app but Idc. It's very stressful going to the upload tap over and over again. Where's the feature when I drag a picture from my photos that it immediately appears?? It sucks going back and fort and it wastes my time. My school depends on me to edit 112 photos and it took me 3 LONG HOURS to finish when I'm also accompanied other work. I don't know if you really removed the feature or my laptop isn't just working right.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Angel, thanks for using Canva. We care about your feelings, and every little push makes us better. Mind telling us more about your concern at canva.me/android? We'd be happy to assist you. Please keep your app updated to optimize its functionality. - Dan

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly? I'm basically being nice. because you click on the canva app and what does it do? it says "not connected, try again." except it didn't work when you got 'try again' it just says the exact thing over and over again. so basically I can't even do anything because it won't even let me get into the app!!

I hate the updated "Create" tab. The previous one was the best in my opinion. That was easy for creating an A4 size doc because I could easily find the page size by only typing "A4" in the search tab. But, now if I search "A4" it shows only the templates, not the page size preset. It's very disappointing üòî

I had beef with Canva at first. really struggled to understand the features and transfer over to this. But in the end I got used to it and have made some pretty incredible things with this. The 5 stars also comes from the fact it helped me finish an assignment when every other money hungry app wouldn't let me use basic features. But Canva has many free features that are absoloutely amazing.

Great in app experience. Terrible business model. Canva claims to have directions on how to cancel your subscription but when following the steps there is no evidence of the subscription or trial I initiated. Without the evidence in the playstore or in their app settings you cannot go through the cancelation steps they direct you to. I also attempted emailing their suggested email address and was returned with an email stating its not a "monitored email". Quite simply, its robbery.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Rachel, thank you for your feedback and for reaching out to Canva. Sorry to hear that you are having this subscription concern. We understand how important this is for you and we are here to help. For us to check, kindly provide us more details here: https://bit.ly/3PwYDsi or at canva.me/android. We'll wait for your response. - Cynch

scraped_reviews.content: The Update Sucks: is not user friendly at all anymore. simple task is adding a local to the front of your reel is now almost impossible or complicated.I have to relearn how to use the program all over again after years of using it for about ten years. this is very frustrating and it doesn't make sense to make a change like this.At this point. i think I'm gonna have to cancel my subscription and find a new program. Because I can't even do the simple things that I want to do.

I've been using Canva for years and last few months decided to use their Premium features. it was good at first. but in the last month, I've been experiencing some errors while trying to save my design. i reached out to their customer service, done everything, but still nothing happened. I won't renew my subscription and will look for a new app

It could be a lot easier to do stuff but no these developers are a bit low IQ imo. Stretching a photo manually to 3 minutes the match my audio is ridiculous. There is no clock icon, there is no option in the options menu for the length of timeline. It should be, click add audio, it adds audio to the actual length of the audio, click add photo, it adds photo then click make photo length of audio BAM easy. If I wasn't using my mobile I'd use Premiere Pro or DaVinci that's stuff is easy. be a pro.

Honestly, it's a great app. By far the best app of this type... But SO many bugs and issues when creating designs. Rogue letters appearing in text lines, disappearing text in others. Alignment unpredictably jumping around. It's so far from being as easy to use as it was this time last year. Please tell me changes are coming.

Not great. Especially on mobile. Too fiddly, and things don't work as they should. Quite frustrating to use, plus lots many options but too hard to find things and don't feel like they're in their logival place. it's better on desktop, but very frustrating on mobile. things leep getting stuck/not loading and i have to keep refreshing.

title: Coinbase: Buy BTC, ETH, SOL
description:
Coinbase is the world‚Äôs most trusted cryptocurrency exchange to securely buy, sell, trade, store, and stake crypto. We‚Äôre the only publicly traded crypto exchange in the U.S. and the only crypto company listed on the S&P 500.

SUPPORTED ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP (XRP), USD Coin (USDC)¬π, Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Solana (SOL), Tether (USDT), Dai (DAI), VeThor Token (VTHO), Pepe (PEPE), SHIBA INU (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE), and hundreds of other cryptocurrencies.

Here‚Äôs a taste of what Coinbase offers:

POWERFUL TOOLS FOR ADVANCED TRADING
- Buy and sell crypto using advanced trading tools and earn staking rewards¬π
- Access in-depth technical analysis, advanced real-time order books, and charting powered by TradingView.
- Advanced tools to research and analyze crypto markets to inform trading decisions.

BUY, SELL & MANAGE CRYPTO
- Coinbase is the most trusted platform to build, manage, and track your crypto portfolio.
- Pay with crypto: Securely and seamlessly send and receive crypto.
- Stake crypto and earn yield on cryptocurrencies like Ethereum and Cardano¬π
- Earn rewards on stablecoins like USDC.¬≤
- Easily set up automatic or recurring buys.
- Seamlessly transfer crypto internationally.

SECURE & REGULATED CRYPTO EXCHANGE
- Coinbase is the only publicly traded, US-headquartered crypto exchange (NASDAQ: COIN).
- All customer assets are held 1:1, and we never trade against our customers or leverage their funds without consent.
- Our financials are public and audited quarterly by a Big 4 accounting firm.
- State-of-the-art encryption and security are at the core of our platform, and our security team is constantly working to make sure you and your assets are protected from emerging threats.
- From auto-enrolled 2 factor-authentication (with security key support), password protection, to multi-approval withdrawals in Coinbase Vault, we provide powerful security features to all our users.

COINBASE ONE
Get more out of crypto with Coinbase One.
- Zero trading fees, boosted staking rewards, priority support, and more.¬≥
- Exclusive access to sweepstakes.

COINBASE WALLET
- Prefer self-custody? Check out Coinbase Wallet‚Äîa secure crypto wallet compatible with the exchange that puts you in control of your crypto, keys and data.
- Store crypto assets in your cryptocurrency wallet safely and securely.

NEED MORE HELP?
Visit help.coinbase.com for information and to contact Coinbase Support.

PRIVACY
View Coinbase‚Äôs legal privacy policy at https://www.coinbase.com/legal/privacy
‚Äî
Coinbase
248 3rd St #434
Oakland, CA 94607
USA
‚Äî
¬π Available in select territories.
¬≤ Upon purchase of USDC, you will be automatically opted in to rewards. You can opt out at any time. The rewards rate is subject to change. Customers will be able to see the latest applicable rates directly within their accounts.
¬≥ A Coinbase One subscription renews automatically and requires recurring payments. Benefits vary by region. Boosted rewards rates are subject to change and the amount eligible for the boost may be capped. Zero trading fees: Coinbase Advanced excluded; a spread applies.

You earn rewards from the protocol, not Coinbase. Coinbase acts only as a service provider connecting you, the validators, and the protocol. We pass along any rewards earned from staking, minus a transparent Coinbase fee.

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use and very informative. However. Starting to lose trust as now, when I buy, sell or trade, it isn't accurate live pricing. And always in coinbase favor. Never mine, so im converting higher than the true live price and losing and on the other end, when I was to sell, getting a higher loss as the price is lower than the live price. This is disappointing.

Edit: To whoever responded, there's no way to access that link when you can't sign in -- Original: There's something wrong with the app. Yesterday it signed me out, and it wasn't until I uninstalled it and tried going through the browser that I was able to access my account. There's no way to call or email customer service without being able to sign in, which I couldn't do from the browser for a while either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We‚Äôre sorry to hear about the trouble you‚Äôre experiencing. To resolve the issue, please contact our live support team at help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us. Our team will be happy to assist you and provide the support you need.

scraped_reviews.content: used to work fine until recently. it forces a login via webbrowser and when I follow the prompts and do as asked, it gets stuck in an infinite loading loop and doesn't log me in. if I reload, it forces me to repeat the process and it ends the same way, almost it's forcing ME into an infinite loading loop. Good thing there is a website I use on my desktop otherwise I wouldn't be able to access my crypto. if I can get a fix to this, I'll change my review; I am a reasonable man.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey, Ace! Thanks for reaching out. That sounds frustrating, especially with the login loop. Here‚Äôs a quick troubleshooting steps: https://help.coinbase.com/en/coinbase/other-topics/troubleshooting-and-tips/app-troubleshooting

If the issue persists, please reach us here: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: This app was wonky. Always freezes up mid transaction. It's not a wifi issue. The app has consistently gotten worse. Now all funds are dotted out. Trying to withdraw money freezes the app. When I have access I'll be shutting down my account. It'll probably be a year. I feel like this was a scam app. Fees and a like are not low. They could do a much better job.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear about the trouble you're experiencing with the app, Adam. Please try reinstalling it to see if that resolves the issue. If the problem continues, our live support team (https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us) is available to assist further. We‚Äôre here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Won't allow me to create an account. I put my email address in & hit continue, I immediately get a notification that it is too many attempts & try again later. It doesn't matter what email address I use or what device, I get the same exact response. Also support is only available via web/app AFTER you log in which I obviously can't do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shawn. We're sorry for the hassle. This error message is a security cooldown. Please wait and try again later, and submit only once. You may turn off any VPN, clear cache, or try a different browser and update your device and app to the latest version. If it persists, please contact us :https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us, so we can help.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a coinbase user for over 5 years and it used to be pretty great. They have added several very useful features however, over the last year or less, the app has been getting worse. It is constantly freezing up, pages won't update and it crashes making it extremely frustrating! It's borderline miserable to the point where I'm gonna have to start looking at other crypto trading options. It's a real shame cause I do love the coinbase app, when it's working.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, Robert. It‚Äôs essential in helping us improve as we‚Äôre committed to delivering a smooth and enjoyable experience. Please always ensure your app is updated to the latest version or try reinstalling it. If you need further help, our live support team is here for you: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: the last update is terrible if you are just looking to quickly see where all your positions are in terms of price. you have to click into each one. this is terrible. it was bad enough with all the freezing up before the update, but now you have to spend more time clicking into positions to see where its at. I want my screen back where I can see how much things are selling for... guess im moving to an exchange that has a better app. why would you make it difficult to quickly scroll through?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, We're sorry to hear about your issue. Please follow these troubleshooting steps: https://help.coinbase.com/en/coinbase/other-topics/troubleshooting-and-tips/app-troubleshooting. If the problem persists, our live support team is available to assist you here: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: When the app works, it's fine. However, it frequently doesn't, maddeningly stalling out when attempting to place a trade, with the "review" button greyed out, waiting for... who knows? The only solution is usually to close and restart the app, sometimes repeatedly, until it allows the transaction. It's extremely frustrating, and unacceptable in a situation like this, where time may well be a factor.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Edward, We're sorry to hear about your issue. Please follow these troubleshooting steps: https://help.coinbase.com/en/coinbase/other-topics/troubleshooting-and-tips/app-troubleshooting. If the problem persists, our live support team is available to assist you here: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is not intuitive at all. I also pay for advanced membership. When using the app in advanced and clicking on one of my portfolio assets, it tells me the current total worth and if I scroll down transactions. I have to click to another page in the menu to see my orders. that isn't too bad as it is.Only one step extra or two. But, being advanced.I should also see the actual live quote of the asset with the other information without having to look for it like in basic settings.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dee, thank you for your feedback! We understand the importance of an intuitive app experience, especially for advanced users, and will share your input with the team. For further concerns or suggestions, feel free to reach out here: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: I‚Äôve been using Coinbase for about five years and usually find it easy to use. The recent change that removed the price labels on the chart spikes - where you could instantly see the high of the day, week, or whatever time range you selected ‚Äî is really disappointing. That quick visual cue was one of the most useful parts of the app, and it feels incomplete without it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Andy! Thank you for the feedback that these are important ! High and low points of the chart were removed due to more sparse data from some new DEX assets that were just added to the app recently. We are looking to bring these points back shortly for all non DEX assets.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a scam, very easy to buy crypto currency, but then selling them and getting the money back is almost impossible. If you manage to sell, cost of the transaction is very high, and in some cases hidden. Support is also useless in addressing the shortcomings of the app. I've had 4000usd locked into my account for a week and it seems it's impossible to get it back...highly recommend choosing a different and more reliable crypto platform.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Carlo! We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience with us, and we would really like to make it right. Could you please reach out to our support team again here: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us so we can get this resolved for you.

scraped_reviews.content: The fees are insane!!!! Get higher the more the transaction is. On 25k is like 300$ fee. the app is often very slow to show chart data and transaction history. very concerned. on the default transaction it executes at a much higher price compared to the actual price which is a huge red flag. Huge loses on just a buy order is outrageous! Before the price even moves. The interface and most features are easy to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Viktor! We truly appreciate your feedback and understand your concerns regarding fees, app performance, and price discrepancies. Your experience matters, and we‚Äôre constantly working to improve. Additionally, we recommend contacting us through the Contact Us page: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us, so our team can assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible experience. Everything took a very long time. I bought bitcoin to send to my husband to close a deal But thankfully I put in a small amount to test before sending the larger amount, or we would have lost the deal. It's been a week already, and they told me it would be available for withdrawal today, November 14th But I tried several times to withdrawal it, It was only after getting stressed out that I was able to withdraw the money.I don't recommend it unless you want to get stressed ou

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for all of your crypto needs. You have all the tools offered by any exchange right here. scraped_reviews.content: Can't even get past the ID upload. I've tried DL, passport card, passport, and nothing works. I've tried different lighting, different backgrounds, and nothing works. Your clever little "green box" captures only half the card after I'm instructed "down, left, too close, up, down, left" be cause the green box can't identify the ID and will only capture parts. I finally got it to capture the passport (fully) and it said it couldn't verify me. Yet you easily found my address! Couple hours wasted.

scraped_reviews.content: My main issue comes to converting crypto. For example, let's say I wanted to convert some Bitcoin for ETH. But I want to receive 0.5 ETH, or a full coin. I want to have the option to convert to the amount that I want to receive. It's almost good on the UI, but every single time I go to tap on the icon/crypto that I want to view, I have to press the button multiple times in order for it to work. scraped_reviews.content: Basically perfect For those review bombing about the new look, it has the classic simple look that I, and most people use...just click the button. Also, COIN is in the S&P 500 now.

this app was good but the face verification doesn't work. It doesn't recognize my face. Another thing is support tell you to do a 2FA recovery but when you try to do it the app is linked to your old number and it won't let you add a new number without a code verification from your old number ü§î make that make sense. scraped_reviews.content: every time I try to send btc I have to call support and then blah blah blah theres never anything restrictions or thing wrong with my account but somehow it goes through when im on the phone except this time now I lost $45 just on this transaction have to wait 2 whole days for my money to go back to my bank account because I chose the free option because they want $25 to take the same amount of time to wire it back to my bank account trash app I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy.

scraped_reviews.content: App is cool, platform is cool. scraped_reviews.content: Probably one of the worst apps on the market. I'd say 10% of the time the app hangs indefinitely on the splash screen. title: PUBG MOBILE
description:
„ÄêEpic battle royale masterpiece„Äë
Lots of events for you to explore.Climb to the top in PUBG MOBILE and fire at will. PUBG MOBILE is the original battle royale game on mobile and one of the best mobile shooting games.

„ÄêExtreme battles in 10-minute matches„Äë
Prepare your firearms, respond to the call for battle in PUBG MOBILE, and fire at will.

„ÄêTons of maps and modes„Äë
PUBG MOBILE has many maps and gameplay mechanics that give you a thrilling survival experience. Find your friends and play the new modes together! Play however you like and fire at will!

„ÄêPlay anytime, anywhere„Äë
Relax and play PUBG MOBILE to your heart's content! Enjoy the smoothest gunplay for an unparalleled gameplay experience.Feel the call of duty, move forward with courage, and lead your friends to victory

„ÄêMade especially for mobile phones„Äë
Features customizable controls, training mode, and voice chat with friends. Experience the smoothest control experience and the most realistic firearms on your phone.

PUBG MOBILE has the highest fidelity items and gameplay experience. PUBG MOBILE can fulfill any wish you might have. Choose from countless firearms and test your marksmanship. New items, maps, and modes are constantly being added to the game.

PUBG MOBILE offers the most intense multiplayer battles on your mobile phone. Join the battle, gear up, and play to win. Survive in epic 100-player battles in Classic Mode, Payload , fast-paced 4v4 Arena battles, and Infection Mode. Survival is all that matters. Be the last one standing. Accept missions and fire at will!

Even the guys choose female heroes‚Äì simply because their wardrobe is wider and more aesthetically pleasing üòÑ
