We are more than happy to help you solve any issues you may encounter. Please contact us through the in-game customer service and provide some detailed information so that we can better assist you. Thank you for your support of PUBG MOBILE!

scraped_reviews.content: PUBG Mobile is still one of the stronger mobile battle-royale games, especially if you have a decent device and are looking for multiplayer fun with friends. However ‚Äî and this is important ‚Äî it is not without flaws. The experience can vary a lot by device quality, region/server, and how you feel about in-game purchases and events.

Player Unknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG) offers an unparalleled gaming experience that keeps players on the edge of their seats. With its immersive gameplay, stunning graphics, and intense battle royale dynamics, PUBG stands as a pioneer in the genre. The game's vast maps provide endless opportunities for strategic gameplay, whether you prefer stealthy maneuvers or all-out aggression. Its responsive controls and fluid mechanics ensure seamless gameplay, allowing players to fully immerse themselves.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê PUBG Mobile is one of the best battle royale games ever! The graphics, sound effects, and gameplay are top-notch. Every match feels exciting ‚Äî from landing to the final circle. The new updates keep the game fresh, and the weapon system is perfectly balanced. I really enjoy playing with my friends; it‚Äôs full of action, teamwork, and thrill. Highly recommended for everyone who loves real gaming experience! üî•üéÆ

title: Block Heads: Duel puzzle games
description:
Get ready for the block puzzle experience with Block Heads. With Block Heads, Bombay Play aspires to bring to the players an exciting and hilarious block puzzle game on Google Play! Block Heads is not your ordinary puzzle game - it's an adventure that combines gameplay of block puzzles with the strategic challenge of sudoku. Get ready to dive into the world of block puzzle madness!

Block Heads takes the beloved block puzzle concept and adds a twist of Tetris blocks for extra excitement. Strategize and arrange the tetris blocks within a 3x3 square to score big and showcase your logic skills. It's like sudoku, but with a playful twist of tetris blocks!

But wait, there's more! Block Heads isn't just about solving puzzles. It's about taking on opponents in epic duels and intense battles. Engage in thrilling PvP matches and challenge your friends or random opponents to see who can outsmart the other. Prepare for a block puzzle duel like no other!

So, how do you conquer the block puzzle battlefield? It's simple! You have one minute to strategize and arrange the tetris blocks to create horizontal and vertical lines, or aim for the coveted 3x3 square. Stay sharp and be quick, as the clock is ticking and your opponents are ready to engage in a fierce battle!

To claim victory in Block Heads, you'll need to unleash your logical prowess and make the most of the unique boosters available. Harness the power of meteorites, comets, and magical wands to clear those challenging blocks and gain a competitive advantage over your opponents. These boosters will give you the edge you need in the block puzzle duel!

And what's a victory without rewards? In Block Heads, the triumphant player will be rewarded with shiny trophies. But that's not all! By accumulating enough trophies, you can unlock advanced arenas where you'll face off against even more skilled and formidable opponents. It's a battle of logic and strategy like no other!

Calling all block puzzle enthusiasts, logic masters, sudoku lovers, Tetris block fanatics, duel enthusiasts, battle warriors, and PvP champions! Block Heads is the game to put your skills to the test. Prepare for a block puzzle adventure that will challenge your logic, test your skills, and provide long hours of entertainment.

Download Block Heads now and immerse yourself in the world of block puzzles. Show off your logic skills, engage in thrilling duels, and conquer the block puzzle battlefield in epic PvP battles. Are you ready for the block puzzle challenge? Let the battle begin!

I tell all my friends about it I love it so much I can't wait to play it again and again love everything about it the graphics , the competition everything also the choices it gives you are fantastic. The characters are really great their expirations are great at encouraging you to keep playing everyone should give it a try.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Linda, thanks for your awesome review and feedback. We look forward to receiving a 5 Star from you! To provide more feedback, feel free to reach us at our customer support team from settings in the game. Thank you and good day!

scraped_reviews.content: At first it was great, then now it won't go past 40% to download after I even reinstalled several times to see if it is a mistake on my end...even uninstalled a few old games that I don't even play anymore...!!! So can the developer look into this fix this issue please because it was a cool game to pkay...!!! It was a cool game until the glitch hit the fan...!!! PLEASE FIX THE ERROR ...!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're very sorry you've encountered this issue! Please contact us at support@bombayplay.com. We'll do our best to resolve it. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Haven't gotten passed the first level but it seems fun, but I do have 1 problem with this game which is why it's not a 5 star review, I go to turn the vibration in the game off but everytime I start the level it still vibrates! I also make sure all of the other settings are off those stay off the vibration doesn't! And it's really annoying
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sabby, we're very sorry you've encountered this issue! could you please reach out to us at support@bombayplay.com. We will look into this matter ASAP.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is fun. I like the mechanics BUT! I can't listen to anything in the background even after I turn off all the sounds in the app. The app always suppresses the podcast/music that I'm listening to. Bad design to do this and so unfortunate for a fun game with great art and mechanics üòû
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Logan, thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre so glad to hear you‚Äôre enjoying the game‚Äôs mechanics and art it means a lot to us. We‚Äôre really sorry about the issue with background audio being suppressed. We understand how frustrating it can be we‚Äôll share this concern with our team so we can look into addressing it in a future update.

scraped_reviews.content: A challenging game with simple but very nice graphics. Unfortunately, I will no longer be playing it because of the ads. While I can still understand the ads between levels, I cannot understand the ads that pop up on the screen during gameplay, covering the entire screen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Piotr, thanks for your feedback! We're glad you enjoyed the game, but we're sorry to hear that the ads affected your experience. Thanks for reporting! If possible, could you please reach out to us we shall look into it right away, please go to the game settings, click on contact us and send us an email from there. We await your mail.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a nice PvP game. Much better than Match Masters. The only issue I have is, the games prompts you to use 800 coins to eliminate advertising for 7 days. THIS IS FALSE!! I used 800 coins to have 7 days game play AD-FREE, and I'm still viewing advertisements. THIS IS A RIPOFF. If I had purchased the coins, the developers DON'T Deliver as promised. "DO NOT USE YOUR COINS FOR AD-FREE PLAY". Other than this scam, game is Okay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Daryl, thank you for the feedback! We're very sorry for the problem. We need to further evaluate your situation. Please contact us at support@bombayplay.com. with all your details. Include your Game Id, the device you use. We'll do our best to resolve it. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: would give 5 stars as the game overall isn't but however the forced ads are doing my head in and I'm at the point of deleting the game
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your honest feedback. We understand how frustrating this can be and will share it with our team. If you‚Äôd like, you can check out any item in the in-game store marked ‚ÄúNo Ads Forever‚Äù to remove all forced ads permanently. We hope you‚Äôll give the game another chance.

scraped_reviews.content: Loved the cartoonish art style and how they have included tons of cats in game :D. As for gameplay felt as if this game Block Heads combines the classic fun of Tetris with intense PvP battles. The strategic use of blocks adds a whole new level of excitement to the gameplay. Highly recommended blockheads to all puzzle game lovers! üéÆüî•
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ketan, thank you so much for the detailed review! Our team will be stoked to read this :) Enjoy playing!

title: Wattpad - Read & Write Stories
description:
Wattpad. Where stories live.

Read and write original stories in your own language!
Discover the social storytelling platform that connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. 

Download Wattpad today to start reading or writing.
Join Wattpad to become a member of an international community of story lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly on stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original creations. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you‚Äôre reading.

Get your story discovered.
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share your original story and book ideas with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey.

Think your story could be the next blockbuster?
Wattpad WEBTOON Studios discovers untapped, unsigned and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies. The Kissing Booth, Perfect Addiction, and After are just a few of the stories first discovered on Wattpad‚Äîand adapted into TV shows, movies and books that captivated fans around the world. 

Why Wattpad? 
Book lovers: The Wattpad app offers millions of stories, novels, books, fanfiction and poetry in over 25 languages from writers around the world. You can read and write your own story using our app and publish it online to join Wattpad's community of avid readers and writers.

Features of Wattpad, the top story reading and writing app!
- Read millions of free stories 
- Readers can browse popular book genres including romance, fanfiction, scifi, historical fiction, LGBTQ+, fantasy, mystery, comedy, young adult fiction and much more, or discover other thrilling genres such as werewolf, mafia, dark romance and billionaire
- Search popular trending book titles
- Build your own free library and save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go
- Download to read offline
- Share your comments and vote for your favorites
- Get alerts when new book chapters are added 
- Start your writing journey today!
- Connect with a community of book readers and fanfiction lovers 
- Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you‚Äôre reading or writing on your computer, mobile phone, or tablet. 

Explore popular stories on our ebook reading app, including Float, Lost Luna, Ex-Husband Turned Boss, and Chasing Red, or newly added stories like So I Married a Rockstar, Wild Fangs, Submitting to the Mafia King, and many more for a seamless ebook reading experience.

Already a fan? Follow us on social media to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests and more! 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/ 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

summary: A story reading app: Read stories, novels and books, or write your own.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app since 2016, and I never had a problem with logging into my account. I even paid premium just to read more stories that require coins, and now, lately, it has been logging me out constantly, and I can't even get the reset instructions. It's completely frustrating, and it needs to be fixed ASAP!

I've had this app since November of 2014. That's almost 11 years. I'd say I'm a loyal user then at this point, and I use this app very often. I was orginally mad at the ads before and after chapters, but then I got over it because I know the company needs money. But now? Now the ads are way too excessive! Ads on chapters, ads before and after chapters, ad banners on book descriptions, ads in comment sections...ads are everywhere! It's just too many ads and disrupts the reading experience.

At first wattpad was a great place to read free books. However now it's Ad after Ad. I read a chapter, than get an ad, next chapter than another ad. Just ad after ad after ad and I am getting sick of it! I am hoping that Wattpad actually reads their customer feedback and fixes this issue because they used to be such a great reading app but not anymore. If this continues on and nothing gets fixed I am going to find myself another app to use for reading.

The app is great for reading fanfics and other stories. However, there's too many ads. I get every single ad every time I complete reading a SINGLE chapter. It's really annoying, and I do not want to waste $60 on just a year of ad free. I would suggest reducing the number of pop-up ads when reading chapters . For example, an ad shows up after reading around 5-7 chapters. I don't see a reason as to why there should be an ad after reading a single chapter.

Ads can be a pain, but otherwise I find it a good app. You can find practically anything you want to read about; and you can publish your own stories for others to enjoy. plus, you can read stories offline or online. besides from ads popping up, I also dislike when even if you log into a previous account, it will still ask about settings and stuff that pop up while you're reading.

I love the most recent update of watching ads to get 3 ad skips. Yes, 1 ad skip is used after every chapter, but I'm able to stack the ad skips, and I love it. while I watch a movie or something, I can just get the ads playing on my phone so I can read later. I love that the skips don't expire or go away if you exit the app. Another thing I love about the app it that if you open it and are on your main page area, not sure what to call it, it always recommends new stories with your favorite ship

It's mobile wattpad. But I seriously undrestimated the monitization they added. After evrry chapter, regardless of length, an ad will play. One that you can't even back out of, if say, *you miss-scroll to the following chapter. Then, if you intuitively scroll up, it'll play ANOTHER unavoidable ad. And, after the ad plays, it will give you a popup for premium. I don't know if writers are getting credits or compensation for that, but I hope they are.

Gone Downhill I used to really like this app but it has gone so downhill. At one point all my archived stories had been removed. With ads anymore you have to exit out of them 3 time before they actually close, and no I don't want to pay to remove them. If I did I would seek that option out myself. The exclude filtering is limited. I see the same suggested stories over and over. You get logged out randomly and told to reset your password.

If you don't mind terrible, terrible, terrible spelling and grammar, then this is the place for you. Might have a little bit of trouble with them using all of your high-speed internet to show videos of how to write on Wattpad. UPDATE: The newest up date causes add loops (playing the same add or sets of add over and over again). You have to shutdown the app completely to get out. 11/2025

I've been using Wattpad since 2013. it has always been a great tool for writing and publishing work and having a infinite well of new and creative stories to read. but the ads are killing the app. I can understand the company needs to make money to keep things running. how ever ad after ad on every chapter? you're taking away the attention from your users and community and interrupting the reading experience and it makes it hard to want to continue using the app.

IF ALL YOUR DRAFTS GET DELETED: My issue was solved by logging out and logging back in. I've been on this app 11 years now. The ads are out of hand, I barely read at all. However, I do write nostalgically, and they haven't screwed that up with ads. I truly love this app, lots of great memories. If they gave an option to one-time purchase a lifetime of no more ads, I'd buy in a heartbeat. Unfortunately, they don't. The subscription BS that's everywhere is truly evil.

It used to be a wonderful app, but then at the end of every chapter, there are ads! I can't even read using the paging format and had to change to scroll because there's an ad blocking the text. And the downloaded limit! I would be okay with some stories needing coins to read and having ads, however, give us consumers something too like unlimited dl/offline storage. Take the limit off. If it weren't for my love of some stories, I would've left alrdy. The app has become unbearable & unenjoyable.

This app is indeed cluttered with ads. Not only that, the writing interface is horrible if you don't own an apple device or computer. You'd think after all these years, they'd release an update to make the same quality available on other devices. But unfortunately, you'd be thinking wrong. Writing on my IPad or PC is easy. Yet when I switch over to type on my Samsung, the different fonts don't work, centering is a headache, and the same goes for saving. 3 stars for nostalgia.

I lve had this app for years now and only thing I have to say is there's to many ads and I miss the number of offline books you can read. The ads don't make it enjoyable anymore and have become quite annoying and bothersome. not what it used to be. it's still a good platform, I enjoy the books I find and love that you can publish your own work onto the platform and get good feedback here and there. but like I said, the ads are just ruining it for me so I have to give it 3 ‚≠ê

Okay, something weird is going on with the app rn. It worked mostly fine for the months I had it, only not working when internet is bad (which is normal ig), but it says I'm having connectivity issues and need to re-login, but I can still see all my stuff, except the revisions I just made on the desktop version. I primarily use the app because I don't have a computer I can access at all times, but the stuff I wrote works just fine on it, even showing the new revisions. What's up with that?

This app is very easy to use and understand! You can read books made by other people and write your own. It allows inspiring writers to share their creations with the world and gain advise from readers. Edit: Sadly, the ads and payment pushing have become too much for me. It feels like there are ads after every single chapter, and that becomes annoying when you're just browsing to find a specific scene or getting an overview of the story.

I've been using wattpad since 2019 and it's really good. As of lately, it freezes up and closes out. I have lost countless spots on books i was reading and some chapters of my own books aren't being saved. I don't know what is causing this bug but i hope it's fixed soon. I would really hate to change apps after so many years.

Edit: For hours now I've been getting an "Unable to connect to Internet. Please check your network settings" Despite the fact that I am connected to my Internet and I can still read books if I go through my saved lists. Or use the search bar. But the home screen is not working and I can't like or comment on the app. My Internet is working just find, obviously if I'm on the store and can use YouTube, etc. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Your app is getting again broken.

I'm not sure what the issue is, or perhaps it's the latest update, but I'm getting a small ad at the bottom of comments when I look at all comments for a chapter. I pay for the subscription to not have ads, so this definitely shouldn't be happening. (update. let me emphasize that im sill seeing ads on my account. I pay for no ads so this is really starting to piss me off. now they are popping up directly onto the story and not just in the comments.)

I've been reading on this app since I was in middle school back in 2014, love it. yea the ads are annoying now but they give chances to watch ads to earn skips. so im so so about it. I do wish they had a way that we as the reader can go into the settings and change the language automatically. so anyone could read whatever no matter what the author wrote in their native language. Basically where it can translate automatically for anyone and they choose the language they prefer to read in.

I decided to get the ad-free (5.99) package a year ago and had a great time with not dealing with ads anymore. Today 10/20/25 I was reading a story and seen an ad at the bottom of my screen so I was a little confused on why I was paying for a service to not see any ads but got hit with ads. I went to my next story and got hit with ads again and wattpad directed me to earn skips on ads mind you I pay money monthly to not deal with ads. I already canceled my subscription because of this.

I wish I didn't have to rely on wifi to write stories that I've been working on for years. It was so much easier to write offline and only worry about the sync problem between devices because that was an easy fix when I got around wifi again way back when. And some of us broke people don't always have access to wifi or a data plan. I liked it better when it was broke people friendly. Update to this review! All of my drafts have disappeared! Literally over 10 years of drafts are gone! Why!?

It's been fine for the most part other then adds coming in a little early and long lodging time with a few small glitches, until recently. I logged in and figured I'd reread and older book in my library only to find that the app completely restarted were I was in over half my books saved to my library and removed all the restarted books from my different book list, which pisses me off because of how much time I'll have to spend to fix it.

I love coming on here every now and then to read lots of fanfic, gives me a good laugh. but the main thing that I cant stand is the stupid ads. there are too many. in between each chapter, there are 1-2 ads normally. and if i barely scroll past the first chapter without realizing im at the end it just starts the ad immediately and doesn't let me finish the last section I didn't get to read. and if I try to scroll back up? I watch yet ANOTHER ad and still dont get to go back to the chapter after.

Wattpad is acting up, when I try to open it keeps telling me that I have not data when I do. It is quite frustrating. The issues regarding Wattpad is getting out of hand, it's like the app is going obsolete and it is getting annoying even when I want to read offline it takes time to load. Please find a solution to it because Wattpad is like a beautiful family and it shouldn't go extinct just like that.

I am beyond frustrated. I've been trying to write a story for months, but have been facing constant set backs due to this app's inability to save progress. Even if I spam the save option, I get an error telling me that it failed to save the section. edit: I would give negative stars if I could. Wattpad logged me out of my account and deleted all of my drafts. 5 months of work, all gone. Do not download.

I've had this issue for a LONG time, but when I stop typing for a while, Wattpad will go all the way to the bottom of a chapter I'm editing and then change the formatting. by changing the paragraph from left to right to the middle, and it's becoming increasingly irritating and making the app very difficult to deal with and is discouraging writing. I'm unsure if it's the device I'm using, but either way, it's harming my experience using the app.

So, I've been usin' Wattpad for four years, and I've never had any problems 'till last year. My pop-up notifications are gone, they won't show up. When this happened last year, all I had to do was log out and log back in. Now that doesn't work and I have to guess when I get a notification. Give me my notifications back, Wattpad it's *not* that difficult!

This is the worst experience I've ever had with Wattpad. for a few days I was having trouble to access many things in the app,and they're showing "connectivity issues" when my network is working fine,yesterday I couldn't access the next chapter of a book I was reading,I made a report to the team they told me to log out or uninstalling the app and try again. I did. and now my library is empty,every book I try to open or anything I try to do in the app,after buffering "unable to load" üòì

I love the app because of the stories and all that, but there are so many ads it gets annoying. There's one after every chapter, and it glitches sometimes, so it'll reshow you one. And the ad skip things are nice when they actually work. I've watched the ad for them, and sometimes it'll still show me one, or it just won't work after I watch the ad.

As a long-time user, I think it's heinous that the coins you earn expire that fast. Before, at least you could keep them for longer. What's the point in collecting coins? I mean, you can't even collect them anymore, truly. They really took the only method of getting coins without paying away. They just want more money out of you!!! I don't want to play a game to get them and want to keep my coins I do earn when watching ads for a while longer like before. I'm so frustrated.

I've been using wattpad for roughly 7 years now and it's slowly yet progressively getting worse. The ads are out of control. I miss the version with only occasional ads in between chapters, now it's every single chapter and sometimes you have to sit and watch three. Years ago every book used to be available to read it without wifi and how that's been limited significantly. This app now is just money hungry. On the bright side there's a lot of good books available to read and easy to publish

Ads skip and text-to-speech, let talk wattpad. I love this app. It is a way to just lay down and listen to the books. I also like the new ads skip, but my ads skip and text-to-speech apparently hate each other. If I use the skip, it cuts my speech off around a quarter way to the end. I thought it was me, but I have tried everything since the first update with ads skip, including change device and internet. Ads skip is not for people who want to listen and enjoy their books.

I've been using the app since 2016, that's almost 10 years, recentl most recently the books that I read in the past few days were suddenly removed. most of them were recently updated in the last week or two. I have good cellular data and wifi connection. but it doesn't matter if im on wifi or not, it takes a while to load the book. the worst of it is when it says the book/page can no longer be found. can someone tell me is there a glitch in the system? I also pay for a premium membership

I really like the option of getting 3 ad skips per 1 ad, but I'm been running into problems with it. I would be reading a chapter and I would get a notification that says I have one left even though I watched like 5 ads and got around 15 of them. And also I ran into another problem today. My ad skips randomly disappeared not even 3 chapters into the book I was reading and I had freaking 16 of them and used only 2. But overall, great app with great mechanisms.

I love reading and recently been into writing, just for fun. Wattpad is not the app to use for writing or editing. My phone storage and updates and app updates have been well up to date, and I still have constant issues with editing my text with it, even saving in the first place or completely just crashing out the app. I have written over 5 chapters, and all of them have been erased or completely crashed out and deleted. I'll be using this app till I can find a better app.

I like the app since you can read and create stories, but I wished that you can look at your reading history at books you read in the past that you didn't save which makes it hard to find that specific story you forgot to save, the app would glitch when I enter tags which makes the search empty but it says that there's so many more stories, I also would like if you could own more private reading lists instead of only one.

ABSOLUTELY love this app and I would go into a long explanation why but there's two bugs that I noticed that need to be fixed: #1 when trying to leave a comment on perfect wifi sometimes ut glitches out halfway through the comment and it stops imputing what i have to say. #2 Another thing with the comments, on perfect wifi, sometimes the comment won't post. My wifi is the same (I check) and it still won't post. So I have to remake the comment when either one happens. Great app there's just bugs.

I must say I deeply love this app for writing stories and reading. However, I hate the fact that there's 3 ads everytime I go to another chapter and I hate those ads cause whenever I try to press the X button, those stupid ads bring me to their website or the app store when I wanted to get out of the ad, not get the app. This app used to not have many ads, it's stupid, it makes me want to delete this app, as the ad skipping does work but once I stop using it, it floods me with more ads

My Wattpad was working fine. I was so happy with it. But recently, they are constantly saying "user not logged in". I tried to connect Google account. Didn't work. I even tried to log in from another phone, but failed to do so. I can't log out because there are so many stories in my library that are in my reading list. Please fix this issue as soon as possible...thank you! Edit: The Issue is fixed now!

This was my favourite app but since I have re-installed it, I can't see my reading lists, open any books, or read the books I had downloaded to read offline (with or without internet connection). Whenever I open the 'Reading Lists' section, it just keeps on loading for really a while and then shows that I don't have internet connection. This is giving me a real headache. HOPE YOU GUYS FIX MY ISSUE!!

I love reading on wattpad although from the last couple weeks, wattpad isn't working properly. Whenever I try to read a story it says the page got lost or fix your internet connection even though my network is alright and when I logged out and then logged in it stopped showing me the stories I had in my library and I can't even read any ither stories. Please fix it!

Wattpad is a really good app to read and write stories and stuff, I've been using it since 3-4 years but for the last few days, I'm unable to read or write anything, I can't open any books or write any. it just shows that it's loading but it never doesn't no matter how long I wait. I even tried updating and reinstalling the app but it doesn't seem to work. my internet is also working properly so it's the app's fault. please do fix the issue

Edit: It was a good app but now it's not functioning properly. All the stories saved in my library is not showing and even my published story is not showing in the writing section. Fix the problem please. It is good for reading stories and contains some really amazing story. However, Wattpad delete the stories of writer without any further clarification. It deleted some of my favourite stories and now I can't read them. It sometimes lag too while loading new chapters.

Till last month the app was working fine but now whenever I try to read any book it shows this page is lost in a good story and never came back, sometimes not able to see books in the Library. It's disappointing. And another disappointment is ads . after every chapter we have an ad . If this continues you will lose many readers . I hope the problem is solved at the earliest

Once it was a great app but now i am facing so much network issues when I use these app via wifi. I thought maybe my settings were wrong but then I found out that the app doesn't even open if you are not using your own network.. not even library. And all the stories from the library are just GONE. And when I tried to see other stories, it shows error. please fix the error I actually loved it once.

I don't understand, I've had this for a whole and I got through with the log in and sign up problem because of something with my email. It's like it's not allowing me to even be on the app. I wanted to change it if its problem but I forgot my password so I was going to change it but it won't give me the email. I've tried and uncountable amount of times and still won't work. It keeps saying'we are unable to create an accountPlease fix this because now I don't have the app because of this problem.

I've used Wattpad for a very long time. I've never had a problem with it. But recently I'm facing an issue where I can't view none of my saved books. Also, the app is not loading and I, for a fact know that, it's not the fault of my internet connection. I hope these issues will be fixed soon.

Terrible, but would recommend When I am done signing in and everything, I can't even use the app. Cause it will say ,incorrect password' or ,this password is already taken' or 'fix the password: capital letters, no unsupported signs' or it just leaves it red! Terrible app. But since I have not used it, I recommend you try. Maybe it's just a glitch for me üôÇ

this is a great app, it has so many choices but there is one problem tho, recently like from past month now. it's not letting me read or write any stories like I don't know what is happening I tried so many things, I updated it, logged out and in again, I even tried reinstalling the app as well a waiting to just hope for it to work again,but it's not, I don't know if this is only with me but it's really annoying, please fix whatever this is Wattpad, I'm begging you fix itüò¢

title: Photomath
description:
Photomath is known worldwide for helping millions of learners to learn, practice, and understand math ‚Äì one step at a time. 

Scan any math problem with the Photomath app to get step-by-step explanations with accurate solutions and a variety of teacher-approved methods. Math is about the process, so Photomath breaks your problem into bite-sized steps to help you understand the ‚Äúwhat‚Äù and ‚Äúwhy‚Äù along with the ‚Äúhow.‚Äù Whether you‚Äôre learning basic arithmetic or advanced geometry, we‚Äôll tackle it together, step by step. 

Why Photomath? 

Billions of math problems: From elementary arithmetic to advanced calculus and everything in between, Photomath can solve billions of math problems‚Äîincluding word problems! Whether handwritten, in a textbook, or on a screen, Photomath is here to help you untangle your trickiest problem.

Step-by-step explanations: Math isn‚Äôt just about an answer. It‚Äôs about every step along the way. That‚Äôs why Photomath breaks down each step, so you can *really* learn. Less guesswork = less stress, especially with our new Animated Steps, which show you the exact progression of a particular step. Get basic step-by-step explanations at no charge when you download Photomath.

Expert-developed methods: Photomath‚Äôs educational content is centered around the learner‚Äôs experience, driven by the expertise of our own team of mathematicians and former math teachers. 

Self-paced learning: Photomath‚Äôs instant support is like having a 24/7 virtual tutor. Checking your homework before dinner? Stuck on a problem at 2am? We can help. Follow our detailed steps, taking whatever time you need to review definitions, rationale, and more ‚Äì all within the explanation.

Want to dive deeper and explore more ways to learn? Photomath Plus can get you there with custom Animated Tutorials, detailed Textbook Solutions, and more! 

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Step-by-step explanations included in our basic version (free of charge)
‚Ä¢ Word problem instructions
‚Ä¢ Interactive graphs
‚Ä¢ Video learning
‚Ä¢ Multiple solution methods
‚Ä¢ Advanced scientific calculator

Photomath is for learners of all levels, including those studying:
Numbers & Quantity
Algebra
Functions
Trigonometry & Angles
Sequences
Geometry
Calculus

‚ÄúThe step-by-step guide is beneficial to students that do not have access to a tutor and struggle with solving math problems.‚Äù ‚Äî Forbes

‚ÄúA viral video about a new app looks like a dream come true for anyone who struggles with math.‚Äù ‚Äî Time
___________________________________________

‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to your Google account at the confirmation of purchase. 
‚Ä¢ A subscription automatically renews unless it‚Äôs canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. 
‚Ä¢ Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 
‚Ä¢ Manage or cancel your subscription in your account settings on the Google Play after purchase. 
‚Ä¢ Offers and pricing are subject to change without notice. 

Suggestions or questions? Email us at support@photomath.com 

Website: www.photomath.com
TikTok: @photomath
Instagram: @photomath 
Facebook: @Photomathapp 
Twitter: @Photomath 

Terms of Use: https://photomath.app/en/termsofuse 
Privacy Policy: https://photomath.app/en/privacypolicy

summary: Learn math, step-by-step

scraped_reviews.content: It does all kinds of probldms! And shows you the steps to solveing them too. I used to think of it as a cheat sheet, now I think of it more as a tool. Also, a lot of other reviews said they had to pay for things. I have the full app for free and I didn't spend a penny on anything! It would be awesome if they made a "photoELA" or other subjects too. It is 100% ad free. Not even little side ads at the top or bottom. It is great!!

as long as you can write legibly enough your devices camera to get a clear pic of the problem, this app is actually surprisingly powerful. I've run into a few types of problems where its told me that it was unable to do that type of problem yet, but the math wasn't anything a typical person or student would come across organically. i'd wager any math that probably ‚â•90% of the population. would ever need this app for, it's easily capable of computing, and rapidly at that. a "basic" calculator is also included in this app.

Photomath is going to be your best friend in middle and highschool NO JOKE. my homework gets done at least 30 minutes earlier now! It's as simple as cropping the screen to fit the problem, taking the picture, and seeing the answer! And if you need to show 'your' work, you can just press the botton that allows you to see the steps. And if that wasn't enough, it explains the steps if you also want that! This app is a MUST HAVE!!!!

I've always struggled with algebra and mathematical expressions, especially finding a thorough explanation on how to solve it step by step. Websites like "Brainley" simply provide an answer unless you want the full package to unlock. But this app makes it as easy as possible to get an explanation breaking apart the problem in chunks, with just the scan of your phone. To me it couldn't get any easier. Used this several times, and can officially say it's a lifesaver.

Absolute necessity for us parents that have not done algebra, geometry, etc. since we were in school! This app has been such a great help, it makes teaching your child math as easy as taking a picture, literally! I had my doubts about how well the camera would read the problem but after weeks of homework everyday, it has not failed even one time. My only possible suggestion would be to have an option to hide the answer to the problem for teaching purposes. Can't recommend it enough! Excellent!

This app is really great! I've got a lot of school work done using it and now have an A++ in my math class :) I also always make sure to read the explanation, because whenever I don't understand how to figure it out the explanation is really helpful. I would add a feature to solve word problems however, as I noticed it lacks that skill. As well as ability to take more than one photo. I had a really long problem the other day and a tool to take multiple photos would have been great! 4/5 :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Anna, thank you so much for your review & valuable feedback. I would like to offer you to join our pool of users for future media opportunities (we often get offers from media for interviews with our users, who find our app helpful). If you're interested, drop us a line at support@photomath.com, we'd appreciate it if you agreed to testify!

scraped_reviews.content: Best app for someone who struggles with math. The break downs of how to solve a problem are done in a way that even the person who just doesn't understand, will finally understand. Definitely worth the paid version if you're a student. The app explains things better than the textbooks and even the teachers, in my experience! Can't rave enough. Download it, it's brilliant.

Very quick and easy for most any math I need to do. I spent FOREVER looking for a photomath app that actually showed the steps and this did so perfectly! I do wish that I didn't have to pay to get a full in depth explanation but I get that they have to make money somehow so it's not that big of a problem for me. Overall, really easy, simple, explains well, and exactly what I needed. 5 stars!!

the app works fine but when I take a picture of some problems, it shows the correct for a plus version but then for the free version it shows the wrong answer even though it's solving for the same thing! I don't understand why it does this-- UPDATE: it was all fun and games until the calculator told me no ü§°ü§° it's crazy how it's supposed to be a calculator but it can just be like "No! buy our subscription for $100 NOW!!" also I scrolled as far as I could and there were no other answer options..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Could you provide some additional information? You can contact us at support@photomath.com. Please include a screenshot of the problem that you believe has a wrong free solution and a correct paid one!

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app so much! I get so much homework and this makes it go by a lot quicker! Unlike other apps similar to this, it gives you the step by step solution. And because my professor requires showing your work, it helps a lot. I also love how it has no ads! This is very uncommon and I love this aspect. Now my one problem, the camera. The camera is really bad, and you have to take a couple pictures before hand for it to focus. I would give this five stars, but the camera drops it down a star.

Its really good but there needs to be a feature that it can read words and i also need to pay to know most of the stuff when its explaining how to do it. So I can't understand the exact process on how to do an equation. But its really good if you get Photomath plus it will explain everything. But I guess its normal that its paid since the app is free. This is a great app for cheating and learning.

I'm an adjunct instructor in a community college. I teach courses in electronics, automation, and industrial engineering. So, yeah, a bit of math involved. A student brought Photomath to my attention several years ago. I was a little skeptical of how well it would be able to recognize various equations, etc., especially handwritten problems. So I installed the app and gave it a try. I was immediately impressed by the optical OCR and the way solutions were presented. It's outstanding.

Ok so it may seem like a malicious piece of software made to cheat homework... But I have used it a few times to walk me through problems that troubled me or things the teacher had not taught yet. I know it is used to cheat homework and I have seen people use it in this way, but this provides a thorough explanation to each problem that goes in my way. It has a very impressive text reader and can somehow read my [awful] handwriting. When it does mess up though, you can always correct it, too.

this is a MUST have for any student or teacher, it's so easy to use and has great results. it can give you some pretty complicated answers, give you a step-by-step, and even read handwriting really well! it's rare that I come across an app like this that doesn't push adds on you every 30 seconds and you can tell that it was made with the intention of actually helping people. I'm honestly surprised they don't make you pay money for it because I'd gladly pay 5-10$.

It is a very well made app! It is really useful for when you dont want to type in the whole equation and just take a picture of it. It helps a lot when I am struggling on a long equation that I dont quite understand. Photo Math gives you an option to look at how the equation is solved, to learn how to do it, or if your teacher needs to see work on the paper. Very wonderful app! 5 stars!

Awesome app! It's really great for when I'm doing homework or studying and need help understanding the process. The only issue I ever have is sometimes my camera doesn't focus and I can't take a picture, but if I exit out of the app and go back in that usually fixes the problem. Absolutely recommend!! (It does have a premium version, but the free version works better than fine!)

The app works fine, not great, but paying for the premium version is not much better, and is very misleading to Uninstall. First of all, they cancel at the end of the month, so you are still on the hook for one payment. Also, deleting your account doesn't unsubscribe you. It took a month for me to notice this, so, boom, they got me for another months payment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback & sorry for any confusion with subscription fees or periods. We try to make it clear upon signing up that your billing is handled by Google and that your free trial lasts a week. Email us at support@photomath.com providing us your order number, and if less than 7 days have passed since billing, we'd be able to refund you.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. I used it to check my homework along with Wolfram alpha. Wolfram alpha is great too but it kept giving me the wrong solution to a differentiation problem. Photomath gave me the correct solution and steps all for the cost of free. I was also impressed with how easy it is to input a problem. I have not had the opportunity to see what else photomath offers but I am happy so far.

This app has turned into utter rubbish. In order to get help on the answer, you have to pay for a weekly/monthly trial. I understand that the developers need to earn money off of the app somehow, but it has come to the point where it's-pay-to-use. There are some aspects where I understand why there should be trials, like the workbook feature; but using it for the calculation tutorial is over the top. The ads aren't as bad, but still intrude at random without warning.

2 years in and I adore this app. I hate apps that only give you answers, but no work to get to them. If they do, then you have to pay. It incentivizes students to cheat rather than learn. I want to actually learn how to solve the problems, so this app has been such great help in College level Calc 1&2. Only issues is sometimes, the answers are not simplified all the way. Also it's unnecessary to turn every single decimal value into a fraction. It's just makes it harder to follow the steps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Amanda, thank you so much for your review & valuable feedback. I would like to offer you to join our pool of users for future media opportunities (we often get offers from media for interviews with our users, who find our app helpful). If you're interested, drop us a line at support@photomath.com, we'd appreciate it if you agreed to testify!

scraped_reviews.content: absolutely unreliable, can't depend it on for nothing at all, I take perfectly crisp pictures of equations, and it always matches it up with the completely wrong equation, without doubt, like if its actually correct, the it will show the equation, but refuse to show the answer, like if it's incapable of doing so. in general, horrible app, you should only use it for simple math, like 6 - 8 grade, high-school math seems to just jam it's systems too much for it to handle.

I rate this app a 3/5 because you have to pay for more steps!! Me and a lot of my friends have stopped using this app because they are no steps. If you make the steps free, I will change this to a 5/5. If I was the owner of this app, I would add advertisements to cover the expenses. You could pay to get rid of ads could also be an option. Other than that, this is an amazing app üëè üòÉ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre trying to keep as much of Photomath as free as possible, core things like solving equation-based problems, complete with each step-by-step. But as we grow as a company and add more features, like AI tutorials, contextual hints, word problem solutions do currently have a fee. Contact us at support@photomath.net if you have other questions

scraped_reviews.content: I had a new teacher, and they didn't teach me very well, so i was very ignorant of how to do homework, quizes, tests, etc. I used photomath for years because it actually teaches me everything i need to know. Unlike other apps, it gives you direct answers if you're in a hurry and it shows the work in a very simple way. It understands actual handwriting, and that helps with word problems. Photomath is the way to go for anything to do with math, i promise. I<3 Photomath. -8th grader.

Been using this app for several years. Works well when it does but it's not always perfect and sometimes the steps it shows to solve aren't super detailed and some operations don't show other ways to solve it. Also, they recently got rid of the textbook feature to solve problems from math textbooks. Very big bummer to not be able to know what I'm doing wrong.

I love this app! It has helped so much with my sons Algebra! It gives you all the possible solutions, so if you don't know the name of them you don't have to keep taking pictures and starting over. It also gives you the SOLVING STEPS for free!! Which is so helpful, because you can actually learn how to do it the correct way or figure out what you are doing wrong!! Photomath has even taught me easier ways of solving quadratics compared to what the teacher was teaching! This app is AMAZING! THANK

I absolutely love this app. It has saved my buttookis more times than I would like to admit, and it explains the steps instead of just cheating and giving you the answer. Only reason why it's 4 stars and not five: you have to pay a subscription to get the best explanation. I would rather watch an ad or even pay a one time payment to gain access to the premium version. Thank you, photomath. You are truly my favorite AI tutor.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rhiannon, thank you so much for your review & valuable feedback. I would like to offer you to join our pool of users for future media opportunities (we often get offers from media for interviews with our users, who find our app helpful). If you're interested, drop us a line at support@photomath.com, we'd appreciate it if you agreed to testify!

scraped_reviews.content: I like the app. It's a lot of help and it teaches better than halg my teachers. My only problem is an update. When I first got it, the app would scan constantly until it found the problem or equation. Now I have to take the picture myself which is impossible because it makes the camera zoom in and out and focus and unfocus CONSTANTLY! It would be much easier if it just did what it did before and just scanned constantly instead of having to take a picture that's too fuzzy because it won't focus.

Great app. Not only is the scientific calculator fully functional, its also really easy to use (for the most part since there is a little learning curve) the photo ability works as advertised. Great for complex and long problems. There are still some stuff that photomath can't solve but definitely getting better. There is also a premium version that gives even more information on how to work through problems. It's so good that you can learn math throug this app. Recommended to all.

Awesome, versatile app for scanning problems from the computer screen or from paper (hand written or typed) to solve, graph, find the domain, ect. Very useful for checking your solutions before submitting them. They're are a few things it can't to, like graphing linear inequalities and displaying complex solutions to equations in standard form. Overall it's a great app.

I'm not really big on using applications for help when it comes to solving problems quick (and mainly like to do it/figure out things on my own), this app is probably the most helpful, easy and quick way to get answers fast as well as explanations if you dont understand how those answers came to be! Even though sometimes when you photo a problem it doesnt give you exactly what you wanted (for example when you want to factor a problem but instead it gives you a graph of said problem, or vice versa), when it does work it gives you exactly what you need and even a step by step process of how to get to that answer. Though I dont recommend this to people who just want to get homework done and move on, if youre really in a rush and/or want to figure out how the problem solving works, this is a really great app for it! It comes with a normal scientific calculator aswell. (And the the fact that it comes in several languages is pretty cool too.)

This app is incredibly hit or miss. When it comes to simple agenda and arithmetic, it works well, but with higher level math it falters. The steps are often incredibly vague, as if you just entered the expression into a calculator, which isn't what I expect from an app that claims to explain solutions in great detail. I don't want to just solve the equation, I want to understand why the answer is what it is, and you can't get that with this app reliably.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We‚Äôre always on the lookout for more ways to help our users. That‚Äôs why we add new math content and features every month. We‚Äôre doing our best to cover as much as we can, so if there‚Äôs a specific subject or math textbook you want us to solve next, email us at support@photomath.com and we‚Äôll share it with the rest of our team.

scraped_reviews.content: Greed, that's just the simple reasoning for 1 star. It used to tell you step by step of how to solve things now they want to charge for a "pro" version. Edit: Yeah by adding some redundant features and charging for what was previously free. Just use Socratic, it's better and it's free, it offers deep in depth if you wish to pay for it (useful for super high levels)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre trying to keep as much of Photomath as free as possible, core things like solving equation-based problems, complete with each step-by-step. But as we grow as a company and add more features, like AI tutorials, contextual hints, word problem solutions do currently have a fee. Contact us at support@photomath.net if you have other questions

scraped_reviews.content: Literally no one here has $10 lying around for PhotomathPlus. All the responses from the team talk about how it's needed for fees for AI tutorials, etc. However, Im assuming that what we need the most (answers/COMPLETE steps) would still be free to run right? That was how it was done before the update. Could there be a setting option to just turn off all the fancy stuff and go back to no ads/complete steps w/o using money? Or just create another app (that costs $ to download) w/ the new things.

It's pretty good. Shows you how to do a problem step by step and all you have to do i scan the problem with tour camera. You can also use the in app calulator and the app graphs certain equations. So I really like it. So yea, if I were you I'd donwload the app. But I'm not you so I can't physically do that. But you should.

Omg I'm a student and this app is the only thing keeping me sane, I'm so grateful for the reduced amount of ads, the help with calculator symbol ranges, the problem solving picturesque, and I cannot thank the people who made this enough!! It is so amazing using this and I hope you make no alterations because the app is perfect as it is. It has my Algebra math book on the app and provides detailed answers for FREE! I have not gotten the paid version and am perfectly content with the normal one.

Okay, so this app USED to be the best thing on the planet. Part of my job is compiling reports that require me to add countless sets of 2 numbers. It was mind-numbing and used to take me all day to do. I found that by putting a + sign next to the 2 numbers, this app would add then flawlessly. Every time. Even handwritten! However, suddenly, it doesn't even recognize the + sign at all. It literally seems to have forgotten that addition is even a thing we do here on earth. It either overcomplicates the problem and reads random exponential numbers into simple numbers like 732.64,or it tries to convert it to a fraction when there is no line and no decimal! This app turned a day-long mindless monotonous task into a 2 hour task, and now it's back to a day-long crunch of punching in number... After number.... After number. I don't have time for this stupid nonsense, or for this app to suddenly become completely useless for The. Most. Simple. Math. Problems. Ever. What gives?! Ready to Uninstall for good. Fix it and give me back my simple ability to add 2 stupid numbers together, and I'll change my review to the glowing one it was GOING to be before this nonsense started. I was thrilled! Now, I'm furious staring down the barrel of all my wasted time once again. UGGGHHHHH!!!!

Extremely helpful! This app allows me to format an equation in a really nice way, it has different features to make problems less confusing rather than typing them in to a conventional calculator. plus the photo is really nice for quick easy problems that would just be a nuisance to type in. Only thing I'd change is maybe add a advanced mode for higher levels of math (Algebra 2, Trig., Pre-Calc, e.t.c)

Helpful! Been using this for over a year! Clear instructions and steps so I can understand what to do and how to solve the questions! I struggle and now I understand about equations and questions. Its AD free so you don't have to be bothered while working! It also helps me with my math book! I also recommend photomath plus (Its worth it!).

It is very convenient in doing math homework; yet, at the same time, there exist slight inconveniences in the design update, such as the instant problem solving. Before, you had to press a button, and it would scan the problem. You did it when you were ready; now, it immediately solves, scanning other problema on the page and messing up my answer that I need when I turn the phone away.

This was AMAZING. But the last few updates aren't. -1 star for removing the tab system (should've brought it up before): now the calculator gets cleared when you leave it for the camera. It was fine the way it was before. -1 star for the ads. I know you guys need to make money, but this of all things is not the place to do it. If I'm sitting here trying to get my assignment in on time, the last thing I need is an ad to pop up, ruin my train of thought, potentially distract me, and waste my time.

Best thing on the face of earth, even without premium. Very helpful explenations, helps me to see where I messed up and check my work. If it's this good free it makes me wonder how much better it would be to have premium. Additionally it doesn't have very many pop up ads, so it's not an annoying kind of free. Only issue I have is that I always have to take the picture twice, the first time it says it doesnt recognize the problem, even if it's a clear picture.

FANTASTIC ( if you have the right chrombook ) I've used this app for a couple weeks to check my answers and its great. My Chromebook has a back camera if you hold it like a tablet. So it makes it a lot easier to take a photo. But I would not recommend if you dont have that. Aquardly holding the paper in front of the camera is not worth it in my opinion. Thank you Photomath for saving me hours typing in math problems

This app is phenomenal, it clearly solves and explains almost any math problem by using your camera. If your camera doesn't understand it, you can simply enter the problem yourself on it's calculator. This app is a godsend, and it literally got me through high school, and continues to help me thru college. Not to mention it's free. Must have for any math student. I wish I could give it 100 stars

Amazing! Went above and way beyond my expectations! Rarely messes up and if it gets numbers wrong, you can go in and edit it with the smart calculator. Amazing sight. It can read the question in poor lighting, you don't even have to have perfectly steady hands to scan the problem, they can be wobbly and out of control! Lol! Amazing app! Genius! Props to the developers and anyone involved with this app. One of the best apps out there! Get it now!

This was very helpful to use at my school when teachers weren't around. Unfortunately, this doesn't solve A LOT of math out there, and sometimes it solves problems in ways that I was not trying to solve it in. It excludes all word problems, but I am interested in their textbook feature they are adding. Especially since there is a vote for textbook option, that means this could replace my other textbook app.

This is extremely useful for my math class! Ever since I started, my grades immediately skyrocketed!! I especially love that it shows the steps so it actually helps me! Also, the fact that it lets you type what you need if it scans wrong is sooo perfect!!!! My friend recommended it to me, and I would recommend it to someone else! I'd even rate higher if I could! It's so hard to believe this miracle is free, but it is! No fees to use, its PERFECT!!!!!!!

I no longer have to wait for my teacher to have an availability for those singular problems that just don't look right- this gives you not only the answer, but a complete walkthrough with optional additional steps, other ways to solve the problem, and highlighted changes as you progress so you don't get lost. It doesn't work as well for fill-in-the-blank math questions, and won't give you the characteristics of a graph that you take a photo of, but it graphs equations and you can edit wherever.

It helps me when I need step by step help. Good for reviewing fundamental rules...I prefer typing in problems, equations verses photo input. However, app could use more options to input equations and expressions. Math is a challenge for me, I've used the app for two semesters now along with others, makes steady time less frustrating. I like the app.

Super amazing app, and im so thankful to have it. It solves a lot of different types of equations and very helpful, and im glad there is no limit to how many problems i can ask, unlike a bunch of other apps it wants me to pay after like 5 questions. It would be really cool if they were more inclusive to word problems, and getting the equation from a photo of a graph would be pretty cool. Otherwise, such an amazing app.

I LOVE this app! I have always struggled with math since I was little and this has quite literally saved me from failing all my math classes It has the camera that scans your problem and almost always gives you an answer that is correct. The only thing that I think should improve is the step by step problem explaining. I saw a bunch of reviews that said that they used to be completely free. Although this app already makes my life a little easier, it would be even better if they were still free
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, the core features (like equations with step-by-step solutions) are free of charge. But as we grow and add more advanced features (AI tutorials, contextual hints, word problem solutions), we were bound to introduce a fee. We hope for your understanding in this instance. Drop us a line at support@photomath.com if you have more questions. Cheers!

title: Zepp
description:
The official app for Amazfit, the Zepp app is free to use and trusted by top athletes such as running back Derrick Henry and sprinter Gabby Thomas. 

Built for sports and performance, it‚Äôs where you‚Äôll track your training, health and recovery data, log your nutrition, and get easy-to-understand scores with AI-powered coaching and guidance ‚Äî all protected with the highest level of data security.

TRACK MACROS: Snap a photo of your meal and instantly get calories, weight, and macronutrients. No watch required, just the Zepp App. Perfect for athletes balancing training with strict diets. Log as many meals as you want with no limits, or enter them manually if that‚Äôs easier.

HEALTH & FITNESS DATA: Vital health metrics like heart rate, sleep, stress, and blood oxygen, the Zepp App tracks your fitness progress in detail. It captures daily activity such as steps and calories burned, and advanced training data like pace, distance, speed, strength logs, and recovery insights.

SLEEP MONITORING:  The Zepp App monitors sleep with precision sensors and syncs the data to the Zepp App for full recovery analysis. You'll find detailed metrics on stages, duration, breathing, and recovery quality so you know if your body is ready to train hard or needs more rest to perform at its best.

HEART HEALTH: See all your essential heart health data in one place. Track heart rate, HRV, and resting heart rate (RHR), and manually add blood pressure and blood glucose from external devices for a complete view of the most important muscle in your body.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR WATCH: The Zepp App is where you‚Äôll find software updates for your Amazfit smartwatch, band, or ring. It also gives you access to the Zepp Store, with hundreds of downloadable mini apps and watch faces to choose from.

DATA SECURITY: The Zepp App delivers the highest level of data security, keeping your information safe and private. Safeguarded by Amazon Web Services (AWS), all data is regionally stored, encrypted, fully GDPR compliant, and never sold.

FREE TO USE: The core experience of the Zepp App is free. You won't need to pay to view data tracked by your Amazfit device, upgrade software, or import maps. You'll also get free access to a core version of Zepp Aura, your very own wellness coach. For personalized wellness advice powered by AI, Zepp Aura Premium Subscription is available for a monthly or yearly fee, but there's no obligation to sign up. 

ZEPP AURA PREMIUM: Unlocking unlimited access to Zepp Aura will provide in-depth health assessments, a personal wellness assistant, sleep music and more (region specific).
- Available in: Most countries and regions
- Subscription Plans: Monthly or yearly options
- Subscriptions are confirmed via your Google account and renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours in advance. Any unused portion of a free trial is forfeited once a purchase is made.
- Details: https://upload-cdn.zepp.com/tposts/5845154

PERMISSIONS: The following optional permissions can enhance your experience but are not required:
- Location Access: Used for automatically tracking running or cycling routes, and to show local weather
- Storage: Used to import or export workout data, as well as save workout photos
- Phone, Contacts, SMS, Call Logs: Used to display calls/notifications/texts on your watch and enable call reminders
- Physical Activity: Used to synchronize step counts and workout information
- Camera: Used for taking pictures and scanning QR codes to pair your devices
- Calendar: Sync and manage schedules
- Nearby Devices: Used to discover and connect to smart devices through bluetooth

DISCLAIMER: Zepp is not a medical device and is intended for general fitness and health management purposes only.
